story:
Angela Stewart-Starks and Joshua Barker (that's us) are getting married! We could really use your help with the expenses. We plan on having a relatively simple and reasonable wedding, but even that can be difficult these days. We figured we didn't need any silverware or picture frames; so, in lieu of wedding gifts, we would gratefully appreciate any support you could offer us on this fundraising site. Your gifts will help to pay for our wedding, honeymoon, and furniture for our home together; plus, when you give, you get super-cool rewards from us! In the meantime, please enjoy the pictures, videos, and updates of our exciting journey, and know that you are a great blessing to our life! Even if you can't give, know that the only reason you're aware of this effort is because you have already been a great blessing to our life. Thank you, we love you, and God bless you!
P.S. All prayers are appreciatively accepted.
 P.P.S. This fundraising effort ends September 18!

story:
No one thought that a tropical storm could create such devastation on the Northeastern seaboard. Sandy was the storm of a lifetime, with winds and surging water that took at least 125 lives and destroyed or damaged more than 377,000 homes. Months after the terrible impact, New York and New Jersey are still reeling from the tragic emotional, physical, and financial ramifications of this disaster. A group of Vermont teenagers want to lend a hand.

Our Story

Alternative Spring Break (ASB) is a week-long volunteering program of the Milton Community Youth Coalition for Milton High School students. The application process is competitive - about 35 students apply annually and 13 are selected to attend the trip. This year the group will travel to the New York City and New Jersey area to help with Super Storm Sandy relief efforts.

 

ASB is a focused project that builds leadership skills and new friendships. Past trips have included Biloxi, Mississippi to help with Katrina relief, Washington D.C. to work with the homeless, Macon, Georgia to help build housing for people in poverty, and Joplin, Missouri to rebuild homes destroyed by devastating tornadoes

.

The group of selected youth conduct various fundraising activities to cover expenses for the trip, with this campaign being one of them.

 

The Impact

In October 2012, Hurricane Sandy roared up the East Coast of the United States. As a result:

  • More than 100 people lost their lives
  • Gasoline rationing caused people to wait in line for fuel for generators and cars for up to 20 blocks
  • 20,000 people in NYC alone need to be relocated to new homes
  • An economic loss of over $18 billion

 

Your contribution to the ASB program can make the experience real for these lucky MHS students. Not only will your contribution allow these youth to experience another area of the country, but it will impact people in real need. When the hurricane struck, many buildings were destroyed, almost all of which still need to be rebuilt. Your contribution will assist families, youth, and a community in dire need of your help.

 

Many of the students have never been outside of Vermont. Along with helping those in need, you will provide the opportunity for these young people to explore another area of the country while helping others!

 

Every dollar helps! If the group does not reach its goal, we still keep the funds raised!

 

What We Need & What You Get

The total cost of the program is approximately $12,000. All money earned goes to support travel and housing costs for the duration of the trip and building materials. If we exceed our goal, the group will donate the extra money beyond the cost of building materials to the continued success of the ASB program.

 

Where your money will go and what it can do:

  • $10 - Breakfast for one participant, for one week
  • $25 - Meals for one participant, for one day
  • $100 - Housing for one participant for the week, building materials for one participant for the week

 

Other funding sources for the trip include money from the Milton Community Youth Coalition and Colchester-Milton Rotary Club, bottle drives, and car washes.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help by spreading the word to your friends and family about this campaign and the work that these students are doing! Facebook and Twitter are great ways to let others know!

 

Questions? Contact the MCYC at 802-893-1009 or kcombs@miltonyouth.org

story:
We're happy to invite you to explore our brand new translation product Travis Touch

Travis Blue is your new companion, a light and compact gadget that makes your travel experiences local. Whether traveling the globe for business or pleasure, meeting foreign family and friends, we want you to be able to seize every opportunity without language barriers.

Our Bluetooth translating speaker uses the best 15 translation engines to give you the highest possible translation quality. Travis Blue uses AI and translates 60 different languages so you can go global and speak local.

Travis was founded by Brend, Nick and Lennart who saw the need to bridge language barriers. In their eyes, a connected more social world starts with understanding. In 2017 they introduced Travis the Translator, raising more than $1M and producing over 50,000 devices now being used by travelers, medical staff and more. Today they bring the same technology in a lighter, more affordable package that pairs with your smartphone. Connect via Bluetooth and start translating all over the world.
 

Travis Blue app

Together with the Travis Blue device we've developed a complementary app. Connect your Travis Blue via Bluetooth to your smartphone and use the app to:

  • Select language 1 and select language 2. The physical buttons on the Travis Blue correspond to these selections, for simple one-button translations.
  • A large area that displays your speech to text, together with the same text translated to the second language.
  • See and access a history of phrases you have translated before for easy replay.
  • Set up some basics like a user profile and select male/female for better voice recognition.
  • Access the user guide and find relevant links.

Please note that if you purchased Travis Blue in the campaign, no additional fee is charged to install and use the app.


 

Prototype demo


 

Make a difference by supporting Paper Airplanes

Paper Airplanes is a nonprofit that uses Skype to provide free, quality, one-on-one language and skills instruction to teens and adults affected by conflict. Travis will donate $5 per device to support Paper Airplanes mission of meet the current gap in teen and adult education.

Our Travis Blue is in prototype stage, working well and ready to help the world connect more meaningfully. The funds raised in our campaign will go towards making our pocket translator a reality. As our second, more affordable product we hope to help even more people have a chat, do business or maybe even fall in love.
 

When will you ship?

Currently in the prototype phase, we plan to start shipping to our first backers in June 2018.

Do you ship worldwide?

We ship to most countries, with some exceptions due to regulatory restrictions outside of our control. In the next step you can select your country and see the shipping cost related to that country. You may be subject to your country’s GST and VAT fees which Travis can not take responsibility for.

What are the 60 languages?

Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bengali, Bulgarian, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Filipino, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Malayalam, Marathi, Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, Zulu

Do I need to connect it to a smartphone?

Yes, Travis Blue must connect to a smartphone via Bluetooth to work. The complementary Travis Blue app will be available free of charge on Google Play (Android) and the App Store (iOS).

Do I have to connect to wifi?

Travis Blue will work best and with all 60 languages when your phone is connected to 3G/4G or wifi.

What is the translation speed?

When you have a good connection, Travis will usually translate a sentence within 2 seconds.

Travis Blue es tu nuevo compañero, un joven y brillante amigo que hace que tus experiencias de viaje se acerquen más a la cultura local. Ya sea porque estés recorriendo el mundo, trabajando para cambiar o explorando las junglas urbanas, queremos que puedas aprovechar cada oportunidad sin barreras.

Nuestro altavoz de traducción con bluetooth utiliza los mejores 15 motores de traducción para ofrecerte la mayor calidad de traducción posible. Travis Blue usa IA y traduce 60 idiomas diferentes para que puedas ir por el mundo y hablar de manera más local.

Travis fue fundado por Brend, Nick y Lennart, quienes vieron la necesidad de superar las barreras lingüísticas. A sus ojos, un mundo conectado más social empieza con la comprensión. Un nivel más profundo de comprensión requiere tecnología inteligente y colaboración. Así pues, en 2017, lanzaron Travis el Traductor, un dispositivo que ahora está siendo utilizado por 50,000 viajeros, trabajadores humanitarios, personal médico y más. Ahora, traen la última tecnología para ayudar a la gente de hoy a estar genuinamente presentes, donde sea que estén. Travis Blue usa Bluetooth y es una manera más ligera de traducir por todo el mundo.
 

Paper Airplanes consiste en una organización sin fines de lucro que utiliza Skype para proporcionar instrucción individualizada, de calidad, enseñanza individual de idiomas y oficios a adolescentes y adultos afectados por un conflicto. Travis donará 5$ por cada dispositivo para apoyar la misión de Paper Airplanes de cerrar el hueco actual en la educación de los adolescentes y adultos.

Nuestro Travis Blue está en etapa de prototipo, funciona bien y está listo para ayudar al mundo a conectarse de manera más significativa. Los fondos recaudados durante nuestra campaña se destinarán a hacer que nuestro traductor de bolsillo esté disponible en todo el mundo. Como es nuestro segundo producto, esperamos ayudar a que incluso más personas hablen, hagan negocios o incluso, se enamoren.
 

¿Cuándo se enviarán?

Actualmente estamos en la fase de prototipo, planeamos comenzar a enviar a nuestros primeros partidarios en junio del 2018.

¿Se envia a todo el mundo?

Enviamos a la mayoría de los países, con algunas excepciones debido a restricciones regulatorias fuera de nuestro control. En el siguiente paso podrás seleccionar tu país y ver los costes de envío relacionados con ese país. Es posible que esté sujeto a tarifas de GST e IVA de tu país, de las cuales Travis no puede responsabilizarse.

¿Cuáles son los 60 idiomas?

Amárico, Árabe, Armenio, Azerbaiyano, Vasco, Bengalí, Búlgaro, Cantonés, Catalán, Chino, Croata, Checo, Danés, Holandés, Inglés, Filipino, Finlandés, Francés, Gallego, Georgiano, Alemán, Griego, Gujarati, Hebreo, Hindi, Húngaro, Islandés, Indonesio, Italiano, Japonés, Javanés, Kannada, Khmer, Coreano, Lao, Letón, Lituano, Malayo, Malayalam, Marathi, Nepalí, Noruego, Persa, Polaco, Portugués, Rumano, Ruso, Serbio, Cingalés, Eslovaco, Esloveno, Español, Sundanés, Swahili, Sueco, Tamil, Telugu, Tailandés, Turco, Ucraniano, Urdu, Vietnamita, Zulú

¿Necesito conectarlo a un móvil?

Sí, Travis Blue debe conectarse a un móvil a través de Bluetooth para funcionar. Nuestra aplicación estará disponible en Google Play (Android) y App Store (iOS).

¿Necesito conectarme a Wifi?

Travis Blue funcionará con los 60 idiomas cuando tu teléfono esté conectado a 3G/4G o Wifi.

¿Cuál es la velocidad de traducción?

Cuando tengas una buena conexión, Travis traducirá en 2 segundos.

story:
Are you fed up with ordinary portable showers that are practically all the same?

Are you dreaming of a convenient, water-saving and multifunctional alternative?

You don’t have to dream anymore!

 

Meet HandyShower - a 3-in-1 portable device that can be used as a faucet, a bidet or a shower. Its interchangeable nozzles allow you to quickly adapt the device to your needs and the patented self-closing valve won’t let you waste a single drop of water.

Still not convinced?

We’ve designed a folding pedal that enables hands-free operation - it’s priceless and no other portable hygiene device offers such a functionality.

                           

We’ve worked really hard to satisfy even the most demanding users!

 

 

 

 

HandyShower is the best portable shower solution available. Our device, unlike others, offers a wide variety of features such as:

 

The Basic HandyShower Kit consists of two essential elements: shower head (equipped with a patented self-closing valve) with a hose and a shower nozzle.

 

The Standard HandyShower Kit includes: shower head with a hose, 3 nozzles (short shower nozzle with 9 holes, long nozzle with 5 holes, long bidet nozzle with 1 hole), 0.5 gal. (2l) water container.

 

The Premium HandyShower Kit includes: shower head with a hose, 5 nozzles (short nozzle with 1 hole, short nozzle with 9 holes, long nozzle with 3 holes, long nozzle with 5 holes, long bidet nozzle with 1 holes), 0.5 gal. (2l) water container, suction cup with a bracket, case.

 

Premium +, the complete HandyShower Kit, includes: shower head with a hose, 8 nozzles (short nozzle with 1 hole, short nozzle with 9 holes, short nozzle with 1 small hole, short nozzle with 9 small holes, long nozzle with 3 holes, long nozzle with 5 holes, long nozzle with 6 holes, long bidet nozzle with 1 hole), suction cup with a shower head bracket, neodymium magnet, double threaded bolt, shower head bracket for wood, 0.5 gal. (2l) water container, foot pedal with cable, case.

                             

Whether you're paddling the Missouri River, hiking the Appalachian Trail, or simply camping with friends, at the end of the day you need a... wash! We have something especially for you - HandyShower - the most compact and multifunctional sanitary device, designed to help maintain personal hygiene even in the most extreme conditions.

 

                           

 

                                                   

                                 

 

We believe that HandyShower can help solve the global problem of lack of access to running water. That is why we are constantly developing our product, working closely with humanitarian aid organizations and implementing the Buy-One-Give-One model.

             

By supporting our campaign and choosing a perk featuring "Buy-one give-one", you support the Hope Spring organization.

If you work for a water-related humanitarian aid organization - send us an email (hello@handyshower.pl)! Become our partner, encourage your community to choose the buy-one give-one perk and donate HandyShower to your organization. It doesn’t cost anything but can change someone’s life!

If you wish to, you can choose any charity organization to which one BASIC HandyShower will be donated on your behalf. However, you should consult with the organization first to see if they are able to accept such form of help.

 

HandyShower was first meant to be used in a completely different way - to refill car fluids. Its original name was "teemer". The first prototype was presented at the world's largest motor show - Automechanika Frankfurt. Then it turned out that the mechanism could have a much wider application.

In the following months the engineer focused on the development of the internal construction and designed the first model of a portable bathroom - HandyShower.

We have presented our device on major events, such as  Outdoorshow, WorldWaterWeek, Aidex and Defense Innovation Summit. We have come a long way from prototypes and tests to the device that we’re proud to present to you today.

In 2017 we were voted the best Polish startup in the category of water at StartUp Europe Awards!

We’ve received a lot of positive feedback and more importantly - we got a chance to look at the surprised expressions on the faces of our testers.

 

HandyShower is a family startup, whose members share not only love and blood ties but also common passion, engagement, and expertise.

 

                                           

 

Zdzisław Iwanejko, founder

Engineer, inventor and entrepreneur. His passion has always been to create life-enhancing solutions that ensure safety and help people. He combines rich experience and qualifications with high professional ethics, putting professionalism and social responsibility in the first place. He has been designing technology and working with world technology leaders.  He is a laureate of many awards and distinctions. In private life, he is a happy husband and father.

 

                                         

 

Alex Iwanejko, team member

High school student at the American School of Warsaw. He is passionate about technology and its origins (especially military related). He has been very inquisitive since his childhood e.g.  he found a mistake in a plane crash report of flight BA 5390.

Experiences: presentations of Handyshower at World Water Week in Stockholm; Tankfest at Bovington.

 

                                           

 

Zuzanna Iwanejko, team member

High school student at the American School of Warsaw. She has a passion for exploring and understanding the contemporary world and its problems, as well as proposing interesting solutions. She feels at ease in multicultural environment and enjoys taking a part in social activities.

Experience: World Water Week in Stockholm; Aidex and Innova in Brussels, Wolves Summit in Warsaw.

 

Thanks to your support we’ll be able to produce a foot pedal that allows for hands-free operation. If we manage to collect even more funds, we’ll introduce you to CampTap - a foldable sink with a faucet. We really can’t wait to be able to develop this project.

Our device, unlike others, offers a wide variety of features such as: The Basic HandyShower Kit consists of two essential elements: shower head (equipped with a patented self-closing valve) with a hose and a shower nozzle. The Standard HandyShower Kit includes: shower head with a hose, 3 nozzles (short shower nozzle with 9 holes, long nozzle with 5 holes, long bidet nozzle with 1 hole), 0.5 gal. (2l) water container. The Premium HandyShower Kit includes: shower head with a hose, 5 nozzles (short nozzle with 1 hole, short nozzle with 9 holes, long nozzle with 3 holes, long nozzle with 5 holes, long bidet nozzle with 1 holes), 0.5 gal. (2l) water container, suction cup with a bracket, case. Premium +, the complete HandyShower Kit, includes: shower head with a hose, 8 nozzles (short nozzle with 1 hole, short nozzle with 9 holes, short nozzle with 1 small hole, short nozzle with 9 small holes, long nozzle with 3 holes, long nozzle with 5 holes, long nozzle with 6 holes, long bidet nozzle with 1 hole), suction cup with a shower head bracket, neodymium magnet, double threaded bolt, shower head bracket for wood, 0.5 gal. (2l) water container, foot pedal with cable, case.                             Whether you're paddling the Missouri River, hiking the Appalachian Trail, or simply camping with friends, at the end of the day you need a... wash! We have something especially for you - HandyShower - the most compact and multifunctional sanitary device, designed to help maintain personal hygiene even in the most extreme conditions.                                                                                
                                   We believe that HandyShower can help solve the global problem of lack of access to running water. That is why we are constantly developing our product, working closely with humanitarian aid organizations and implementing the Buy-One-Give-One model.             By supporting our campaign and choosing a perk featuring "Buy-one give-one", you support the Hope Spring organization.If you work for a water-related humanitarian aid organization - send us an email (hello@handyshower.pl)! Become our partner, encourage your community to choose the buy-one give-one perk and donate HandyShower to your organization. It doesn’t cost anything but can change someone’s life!If you wish to, you can choose any charity organization to which one BASIC HandyShower will be donated on your behalf. However, you should consult with the organization first to see if they are able to accept such form of help. HandyShower was first meant to be used in a completely different way - to refill car fluids. Its original name was "teemer". The first prototype was presented at the world's largest motor show - Automechanika Frankfurt. Then it turned out that the mechanism could have a much wider application.In the following months the engineer focused on the development of the internal construction and designed the first model of a portable bathroom - HandyShower.We have presented our device on major events, such as  Outdoorshow, WorldWaterWeek, Aidex and Defense Innovation Summit. We have come a long way from prototypes and tests to the device that we’re proud to present to you today.In 2017 we were voted the best Polish startup in the category of water at StartUp Europe Awards!We’ve received a lot of positive feedback and more importantly - we got a chance to look at the surprised expressions on the faces of our testers.  
HandyShower is a family startup, whose members share not only love and blood ties but also common passion, engagement, and expertise.
                                             
Zdzisław Iwanejko, founder
Engineer, inventor and entrepreneur. His passion has always been to create life-enhancing solutions that ensure safety and help people. He combines rich experience and qualifications with high professional ethics, putting professionalism and social responsibility in the first place. He has been designing technology and working with world technology leaders.  He is a laureate of many awards and distinctions. In private life, he is a happy husband and father.
                                           
Alex Iwanejko, team member
High school student at the American School of Warsaw. He is passionate about technology and its origins (especially military related). He has been very inquisitive since his childhood e.g.  he found a mistake in a plane crash report of flight BA 5390.
Experiences: presentations of Handyshower at World Water Week in Stockholm; Tankfest at Bovington.
                                             
Zuzanna Iwanejko, team member
High school student at the American School of Warsaw. She has a passion for exploring and understanding the contemporary world and its problems, as well as proposing interesting solutions. She feels at ease in multicultural environment and enjoys taking a part in social activities.
Experience: World Water Week in Stockholm; Aidex and Innova in Brussels, Wolves Summit in Warsaw.
 
Thanks to your support we’ll be able to produce a foot pedal that allows for hands-free operation. If we manage to collect even more funds, we’ll introduce you to CampTap - a foldable sink with a faucet. We really can’t wait to be able to develop this project.

story:
Hi! My name is Christine and I am the owner/operator of Wild Rose Flower Farm. For the past seven years, I have faced considerable physical and economic challenge due to having an undiagnosed neuromuscular disease that rendered me disabled. All that changed almost two years ago when I was FINALLY diagnosed following a particularly nasty flare that landed me in the hospital for several weeks. Since beginning regular IVIg treatment, I have improved greatly and thus embarked on a long-time dream of owning a flower farm. This is my first year farming, and while my physical health has allowed me to do what was previously unthinkable, I've tapped out in what I can financially invest on my own. (Getting a farm up and rolling from scratch is no small task!) 

Last winter, I began clearing land for what I envision to be a rose field and nursery, a piece of land used solely for growing, selling, and hybridizing roses suitable for cut flower production in Maine's cold climate. Fortunately, I was able to trade several cords of wood in exchange for the logger's time and labor. Unfortunately, I can't do the same for the excavation, drainage, and soil amendment needs, which will add up to no less than $2500. I'm therefore doing another unimaginable thing - asking for help. Currently, I'm doing everything I can think of to raise money on my own - hosting educational workshops, rose walks, etc, but I'm light years away from what I need to complete this project. I'm therefore setting up this campaign in hopes of being able to finish the field by Fall 2021 so it can be ready for spring planting. If you are unable to contribute, I just ask that you please share and spread the word about this dream for the future of Wild Rose Flower Farm. Alternatively, if you could help get word out about the regular weekly fundraising educational workshops, I'd be forever grateful! Many thanks to whoever is willing to help, and, if we ever meet...a dozen roses on the house!

Unfortunately, I can't do the same for the excavation, drainage, and soil amendment needs, which will add up to no less than $2500. I'm therefore doing another unimaginable thing - asking for help. story:
warning! предупреждение! napomenutí! advarsel! veenmine! varoitus! avertissement! παραίνεση!  waarschuwing!  upozorenje! rabhadh! ostrzeżenie! brīdinājums! įspėjimas! figyelmeztetés! twissija! warnung! avvertimento!  aviso! avertizare! advertencia! varning! varovanie! opozorilo!

This is a Calling to every European citizen to help us solve the issue of illegal migration. The European governments fail to control the situation and now we turn to the people to take action. Join us, make your vote for a safe European Union by helping us create a fund which will be used to improve and strengthen the boarders of Schengen. The crisis is rising, till this day just in Hungary 191 702 illegal boarder crossings occurred. This need to stop now! Together we can make a difference! 

Aufruf an alle europäischen Bürger! Lösen wir zusammen das Problem der illegalen Massenimmigration! Die europäischen Regierungen und ihre Politiker streiten sich miteinander, anstatt ein Konzept zur Lösung der Krise vorzulegen und auf die Massenimmigration adäquat zu reagieren. Deshalb wenden wir uns an die europäischen Bürger! Treten Sie unserem Projekt bei und stimmen Sie einer sicheren Europäischen Union! Errichten wir einen gemeinsamen Fonds zum Zweck der Bestreitung der Kosten für den Schutz, die Festigung und die Entwicklung der Schengen-Außengrenze! Die Massenmigration stellt eine ernste Bedrohung der Stabilität Europas und der einzelnen Mitgliedsländer der EU dar.  Es ist ein immer größer werdendes Problem, in diesem Jahr wurden bisher 191.702 illegalen Grenzüberschritten von Flüchtlingen in Ungarn registriert. Dem müssen wir ein Ende setzen! Gemeinsam können wir dem ein Ende setzen!

Appel à tous les citoyens européens! Résolvons ensemble le problème de l'immigration illégale! Les gouvernements européens et leurs leaders se disputent au lieu de travailler ensemble sur la résolution de la crise, c'est la raison pour laquelle nous faisons appel aux citoyens européens. Rejoignez notre projet et votez pour une Union Européenne sécurisée. Etablissons un fonds commun pour la défense, le renforcement et le développement des frontières Schengen. La crise s'aggrave à chaque instant, à ce jour, pour la seule Hongrie il y avait 191.702 passages illégaux aux frontières cette année. Cela doit cesser!Ensemble nous pouvons agir.

Felhívás minden európai polgárnak! Oldjuk meg együtt az illegális migráció problémáját! Az európai kormányok és azok vezetői inkább egymással vitatkoznak, mintsem egységben dolgoznának a krízis megoldásán, ezért fordulunk most Európa polgáraihoz. Csatlakozzon projektünkhöz, és tegye le a voksát egy biztonságos Európai Unió mellett. Hozzunk létre egy közös pénzalapot a Schengeni határok védelmére, megerősítésére és fejlesztésére. A krízis percről percre nő, a mai napig csak Magyarországon 191 702 illegális határ átkelés történt ebben az évben. Ennek véget kell vetni! Együtt tehetünk ellene!

story:
Short Summary

This is a surprise!

You are most likely accessing this page because you are a friend of Jeremy & Alyssa. As a friend of Jeremy & Alyssa, you know they have and would give up sleep, time, money, and energy to be a blessing or help to you. This is our opportunity to give back. We would like to send Jeremy & Alyssa on an all-expense paid vacation to San Francisco for a time of rest and relaxation. A large group of friends is collecting to pitch in and make this trip possible, and we would like you to be a part.

What We Need

To make this trip happen we need to raise $1,750 before March 17. That is close to 90 people giving an average of $20. Please consider being a part of this awesome project for some deserving people!

Other Information

As we get closer to our deadline we will try to release more specific information about the trip, but for the curious ones:

  • 5-Days & 4-Nights in a 4-Star Hotel
  • Rental Car & Fuel
  • $500+ Cash for Activities and Food

Please note that this is a campaign funded by Jeremy & Alyssa's friends and is not supported or funded by any other group or ministry.

story:
Every day people are denied access to the research they need - you can change that

How we publish research is broken, but it can be fixed and the Open Access Button is here to help. Open Access has the potential to give everyone free access to the world’s cutting edge research. This will help your doctor save lives, families get access to the latest research on their loved one's disease, researchers advance our understanding of the world, and students better further their education. With the Open Access Button we can realise this potential, but we need your donation to do it.

Currently research is published in journals with expensive subscriptions, which hides knowledge behind paywalls away from the public who paid for it. The solution to this is Open Access, which allows research to be accessed and reused by whoever needs it.


Our story so far

One year ago we discovered the true injustice of the traditional publishing system. In response we spent months working with a team of volunteer developers to make an early version of an idea we knew could catalyse change, the Open Access Button.

The tool allows people to report when they are denied access to research and helps them get access to the research they need. This turns the frustrations and injustice of millions being denied access to research into something visible with the potential to make change.

So far we’ve mapped over 6500 moments of this injustice, but we know that this is just the beginning. There are stories of patients looking for information on their condition and treatment, students trying to do their homework, and researchers trying to advance our knowledge of the world we live in.

With your support we can finish building the next version of the Open Access Button, Button 2.0, in time for a release during Open Access Week (October).

All the money raised will go towards a new tool

We have to raise £20,000 to fund the initial development of Button 2.0. A global team of student volunteers manage every other aspect of the project - so every penny of the donations we receive, up to and beyond the target, will go directly into the technical development time.

Button 2.0 has been reimagined from the ground up to make it a true game changer. We’ve focused on creating ways to connect people with the research they need and use research in completely different ways. We’ve worked with the most innovative people and organisations, like Wikipedia and others from around the world. Of course, every line of code will be open source and available for others to improve on.

While we’ve been doing this, we’ve been preparing for an exciting event to launch Button 2.0, and an international campaign using the data we generate to push for change.


Other ways you can help

Donating isn’t the only way you can help us, you can also:

  • Share this page, video or even blog about the campaign!

  • Please get in touch if you happen to be a part of an organisation who can help us, either with in-kind support or a donation.

  • Use the Open Access Button: your stories are the biggest stimulus for change.

Whether you share the campaign, or donate £1 or £1,000, you will be helping to develop a tool that can make the problem of paywalls visible and help free the research we need.

story:
Update     
 
As we approach the final hours of my campaign, I am happy to share that the funds raised thus far will allow me to volunteer and coach at Khelshala, (the NGO founded by Coach Bajwa) with no cost to the organization. Thank you to those of you who have already made contributions. I look forward to keeping you informed. For more information about Khelshala, please visit www.khelshala.in

The Impact

Your donation will make a difference to the Khelshala program in the following ways:


1. Allows Khelshala to spend its exisiting budget directly on the needs of Khelshala children by avoiding to pay administrative costs for officers/volunteers like me.

2. Direct squash teaching and coaching to the Khelshala children by me.

3. Setting up a computer lab from our grant for computer equipment by the State Bank of India.

4. Assist with legal compliance for attainment of FCR approval from the Government of India that will enable foreign contributions.

5. Continue work already in place, to form a non profit allowing Khelshala to seek donations qualifying for tax credits in the US.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to make a financial contribution, you can still assist by:


1. Getting the word out and make some noise about my fundraising campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools.

2. Donate used squash rackets, squash shoes and/or squash balls by shipping to:

Khelshala

c/o Satinder Bajwa

House No. 1815, First Floor

Sector 34D, Chandigarh, (UT) 160022

India

 

 
 
 
 
 

.

story:
We play yoyo.

We played yo-yo before there was a YoYoFactory and we don't plan on stopping any time soon. Its what we do. We do it EVERYWHERE.


The Yo-Yo industry is cosy small. Its a community. One of our goals as a company is to try to have a positive influence on that community. YoYo is so many different things to so many different people. Its an identity, a creative outlet, its a sport, a hobby, a passion.

We support competitive yo-yo as a way to continue the progression of yo-yo trick development and performance. In 2015 we formalized another way we wanted to promote yo-yo and that was as a vehicle for adventure. Usually our adventures are on the way to or from somewhere that we need to be for other reasons. Sometimes adventure is enough of an excuse itself.

We want to inspire our audience to get out there, see and be a part of the world. Leave a positive influence and share the stoke of traveling.

We have BIG dreams

We have already been to ICELAND, climbed Mt Fuji, Visited Everest Basecamp in Tibet to see the highest place on earth and gone to the lowest place at the Dead Sea.


Ultimately we would love to visit every continent. Run YoYo Contests in distant lands for people who have never see a yoyo!

This one however is just the next step. We have visited Europe, Asia and North America. 

Its time for SOUTH AMERICA and we are asking you to help.

In return we want to hook you up with some sweet product at a VERY friendly price AND invite you along.

Our funding request is for $4000. 

This generates enough profit to pay airfare accommodation and other travel expenses for 2 players for the proposed 7 day trip.



The Destination?

Ideally we would like to keep it a secret until the June 24 reveal, but if you are serious on coming, contact us! We can share it with you and show you the breakdown of the expenses and how the $1500 gets spent.

WHEN?

September 2016 We plan to RETURN to LAX September 15 just in time for the USA National Contest starting September 16. So departing SEPT 8


WHY?

We want to share the stoke. Inspire others to get out and see the world and get a better understanding of the world they live in. As part of the trip we meet other like minded travelers who we share yoyo with for them to pass along plus we will visit local communities and share yoyo with them too 

Risks & Challenges

Stuff happens. People get sick, weather doesn't co-oporate but thats life. One of our YoYoFactory Adventure trips was to summit Mt Fuji overnight. It was tough. While we survived, it was more survival than collecting video/photographs to share! Still we met a kendama master at the summit and now, you can find a YoYofactory YoYo and someone to teach you a trick at 13,000 ft every summer in Japan!

The other big surprise element is in ticket prices changing significantly. IF prices did change we would have to offer full refunds to anyone coming along prior to booking.

Whats that other perk?

Oh yeah, you noticed?  The Titanium Shutter!


in 2015 we launched our first Indiegogo campaign for the DREAM Titanium YoYo. We had a a lot of fun, created some amazing YoYos and really enjoyed the process. It's the main reason we are back here!  Knowing people love titanium YoYos we decided this would be the perfect platform to introduce our newest Ti YoYo, to offer our original supporters another great deal.
This item will be produced ONE time. It will be available here, and only 6 stores. After that it will be retired to history.
Performance wise. Its a beast. Sound and sight wise, its a beauty. Spark wise.... well we haven't done that yet....

The Stretch:

AT
$4,000 we go!
2  PROS head SOUTH!
AT
$10,000 A 3rd member of YYF team will get added to the trip.
The super stretch is now $50,000. Its a long shot, But we will throw it out there that if we hit $50k the Adventure after this will be ANTARCTIC Adventure. Seriously. How cool would that be. Ok, we don't expect to hit it but its all about dreaming :)


Calendar

June 10 
LAUNCH
June 15 
Special offer 1: A new perk for a limited time!
June 17 
Reveal B the Adventure Art on YoYos
June 15
Special offer 2: A new perk for a limited time!
June 20
Announce the players confirmed on the trip!

Meet the players!

Player 1: Paul Kerbel
YYF Adventure experience: White Sands Blue Moon, New Mexico USA.
Home Town: Mexico City
Paul was the driving force behind putting this project together. His enthusiasm to get out there, meet new people and see the world will be a big asset on this Adventure. "Everyone else goes to see the world, why did they make me sleep in a tent?" (not an actual quote).

------


Player 2: Gentry Stein
YYF Adventure Experience: Havasupai , Arizona USA. Jordan


Gentry thought he was the driving force behind this trip. Little did he know Paul already had put it together. The only way to avoid conflict was to make sure they both got to go along!


This summer Gentry will be traveling through Australia and New Zealand before attempting to regain his World YoYo Champion title in Cleveland. Big year.
5 Continents in 7 months.  Nice work Gentry!
-----------
Player 3: Vashek Kroutil
YYF Adventure Experience: ICELAND Adventure, Mt Fuji, Jordan


Vashek only comes on the big trips. Mr Jetset. He originally wasn't considered for this trip because South America is a LONG way from Europe but some nice discount airfares and the excuse to visit USA Nationals had him in the right zip code at the right time. 



B the Adventure CZECHPOINT $20

story_txt:
We play yoyo. We played yo-yo before there was a YoYoFactory and we don't plan on stopping any time soon. Its what we do. We do it EVERYWHERE.


The Yo-Yo industry is cosy small. Its a community. One of our goals as a company is to try to have a positive influence on that community. YoYo is so many different things to so many different people. Its an identity, a creative outlet, its a sport, a hobby, a passion.
We support competitive yo-yo as a way to continue the progression of yo-yo trick development and performance. In 2015 we formalized another way we wanted to promote yo-yo and that was as a vehicle for adventure. Usually our adventures are on the way to or from somewhere that we need to be for other reasons. Sometimes adventure is enough of an excuse itself.
We want to inspire our audience to get out there, see and be a part of the world. Leave a positive influence and share the stoke of traveling.   We have BIG dreams We have already been to ICELAND, climbed Mt Fuji, Visited Everest Basecamp in Tibet to see the highest place on earth and gone to the lowest place at the Dead Sea.


Ultimately we would love to visit every continent. Run YoYo Contests in distant lands for people who have never see a yoyo!
This one however is just the next step. We have visited Europe, Asia and North America. 
Its time for SOUTH AMERICA and we are asking you to help.
In return we want to hook you up with some sweet product at a VERY friendly price AND invite you along.
Our funding request is for $4000. 
This generates enough profit to pay airfare accommodation and other travel expenses for 2 players for the proposed 7 day trip.



   The Destination? Ideally we would like to keep it a secret until the June 24 reveal, but if you are serious on coming, contact us! We can share it with you and show you the breakdown of the expenses and how the $1500 gets spent.

WHEN?
September 2016 We plan to RETURN to LAX September 15 just in time for the USA National Contest starting September 16. So departing SEPT 8


WHY?We want to share the stoke. Inspire others to get out and see the world and get a better understanding of the world they live in. As part of the trip we meet other like minded travelers who we share yoyo with for them to pass along plus we will visit local communities and share yoyo with them too    Risks & Challenges Stuff happens. People get sick, weather doesn't co-oporate but thats life. One of our YoYoFactory Adventure trips was to summit Mt Fuji overnight. It was tough. While we survived, it was more survival than collecting video/photographs to share! Still we met a kendama master at the summit and now, you can find a YoYofactory YoYo and someone to teach you a trick at 13,000 ft every summer in Japan!
The other big surprise element is in ticket prices changing significantly. IF prices did change we would have to offer full refunds to anyone coming along prior to booking.


Whats that other perk?

Oh yeah, you noticed?  The Titanium Shutter!



in 2015 we launched our first Indiegogo campaign for the DREAM Titanium YoYo. We had a a lot of fun, created some amazing YoYos and really enjoyed the process. It's the main reason we are back here!  Knowing people love titanium YoYos we decided this would be the perfect platform to introduce our newest Ti YoYo, to offer our original supporters another great deal.

This item will be produced ONE time. It will be available here, and only 6 stores. After that it will be retired to history.

Performance wise. Its a beast. Sound and sight wise, its a beauty. Spark wise.... well we haven't done that yet....


The Stretch:
AT
$4,000 we go!
2  PROS head SOUTH!
AT

$10,000 A 3rd member of YYF team will get added to the trip.
The super stretch is now $50,000. Its a long shot, But we will throw it out there that if we hit $50k the Adventure after this will be ANTARCTIC Adventure. Seriously. How cool would that be. Ok, we don't expect to hit it but its all about dreaming :)

story:
SUNY Purchase has one of the few classical fencing clubs in existence. In the club students learn French & Italian foil, French & Italian epee, Northern & Southern Italian dueling sabre, French smallsword, Italian & Spanish rapier, longsword and the German dusack among other styles.

Every year, the Association for Historical Fencing and Palm Beach Classical Fencing holds an open tournament in the West Palm Beach area.Every year, the SUNY Purchase Fencing Club tries to send as many members as we can, with several fencers interested this year. Your contributions will help to cover travel expenses, which we desperately need!

If you cannot contribute any funds, please forward this to friends and family to help get the word out!

story:
With a breathable hammock body, integrated insect net, and featherlight rainfly, the Mantis all-in-one hammock tent lightens your pack and takes camp off the ground. 

 

We designed the Mantis to make backpacking simpler, so you can pack less and cover more ground. Smaller than your sleeping bag and lighter than a 1-person tent, the Mantis offers a lightweight respite for hikers on trail.

 

 

Available in BackerKit after the campaign,  these accessories help maximize your camp. Each accessory seamlessly integrates with the Mantis and compresses in the Mantis stuff sack for optimal packability.

Organizer (Indiegogo pricing - $19): The Mantis Organizer is a suspended pouch for mobile, small storage inside the Mantis. The Organizer attaches with knotless hooks to the ridge line inside your canopy and moves along the line for easy access. It’s the perfect lightweight storage option for your phone, granola bar and headlamp. 

Gear Loft (Indiegogo pricing - $19): The Gear Loft is a removable, lofted sling to keep your essentials elevated and close at hand inside the Mantis. Suspended from the ridge line in the peaks of your canopy, the Gear Loft is perfect storage for your book, beanie, and a back-up pair of socks inside the Mantis. Storing your gear is easy - no knots necessary to hang your Gear Loft.

Winter Barrier (Indiegogo pricing - $69): An accessory for colder months, the Winter Barrier takes your Mantis to winter temps by zipping seamlessly into your canopy. To create a cozy cocoon inside, the Winter Barrier blocks out the cold and features steam vents to eliminate condensation. 

All accessories will be available in limited quantities after the campaign.

 

 

Set-up fast, sleep comfortably and minimize your footprint by opting to hammock camp. Curving to the natural arch of your back, a hammock provides soft support off the ground. No stiff necks or sore backs in the morning. Set up for hammock camping is quick: simply wrap your python straps around two trees 13’ to 18’ apart, and clip in. Hammock camping also leaves a minimal impact on the environment. According to Leave No Trace, “hammocks generally leave a very small footprint and are good examples of minimum impact shelters.” Learn more here.  

 

Sleep off the ground in a silky soft hammock enclosed in our Stargazer™ mesh canopy. The Mantis all-in-one hammock tent features built-in pockets and a structural ridge line to keep what you need close at hand. Cozy up, campers.

 

 

An all-in-one hammock tent to protect you from the elements, no matter what Mother Nature throws your way. The Mantis’ customizable features - insect net, rainfly, and winter barrier - provide shelter and allow you to shed weight when you need to.

 


Lighter than your tent and easier to set up, the Mantis takes camp set-up to 60 seconds with a knotless suspension. No more knots, no more tent poles. It’s time to put your feet up faster. Early morning starts just became easier, too, with a quick tear-down.  

 

 

 

The Mantis Ultralight™ harnesses new fabrics and fibers innovated to lighten your pack. The Levitas™ 20D nylon ripstop is the strongest, lightest hammock fabric in its class. The included Python 10 Ultralight straps are constructed with SpiraLine™, a high-molecular polyethylene fiber that weight for weight is 15 times stronger than steel. These innovations make the Mantis Ultralight the lightest all-in-one hammock tent with the highest strength to weight ratio. 

See what the pros have to say about the Mantis Ultralight...

Derek Hansen, expert hammock camper and creator of The Ultimate Hang, got a sneak peek of the Mantis Ultralight and Python 10 Ultralight straps and "was delighted to see the attention to detail at every key feature." Watch the video below for his full review.

 

Adventure Alan, trusted gear reviewer and expert backpacker, called the Mantis Ultralight the "easiest and most intuitive" hammock tent package in his review of the gear. One of his favorite things about the set-up? "The suspension (stuff you need to hang the hammock from trees) is a winning combination of light and easy to use!"Read Alan's full review on the Mantis Ultralight here.

 



We are excited to offer the Mantis in Ember Orange, Midnight Blue, Moss Green, and the Aloe Green. Opting for the Mantis UL set-up? Select from Ember Orange, Granite Gray, and Moss Green. 





 

The design story of the Mantis starts in 2017. Our product team had a vision for an easier camp set-up and a better night’s sleep off the ground. Too many cold, wet nights with clumsy tent poles and sleepless nights on the ground called for an upgrade to the backcountry experience. Enter the Mantis. Conceptualized to be the lightest hammock with the highest weight-to-strength ratio, we stepped into the ultralight world with our Levitas™ 20D nylon ripstop fabric and ultralight Python Straps made with SpiraLine™. Countless iterations and product testing in unforgiving weather, we finally said “yes” and cracked open a cold one to celebrate. We’re grateful to bring you the Mantis this season, and invite you into our community-driven design. 



 


Based in Austin, Texas, Kammok designs technical, high-performing  gear to elevate your time outside. We’re a motley crew of designers, wordsmiths, creators, and kickball champs. In all we do, we seek to fulfill our core values of adventure, community and love. Learn more about adventure and giving time outside from our nonprofit partner, Explore Austin. 

This spring, we’re elevating camp with the Mantis all-in-one hammock tent. Designed to match the performance of backcountry gear with the same ease of use as our Roo hammocks, the Mantis takes camp to the next level for hikers, backpackers and first-time campers. The Mantis, like all other Kammok gear, is backed by our Lifetime Warranty. Our gear performs how we say it will, without fault, or your money back. That’s our promise.

Have a question about Kammok or just want to say hello? Don’t hesitate to send us a message on Indiegogo or email hello@kammok.com.

story:
With compact, lightweight and fashionable WinkGo,Mini Electronic Espresso Maker enjoy the pleasure of drinking high quality coffee, from the first sip to the last drop. WinkGo, one machine with dual use, gives more flexibility to you in trying more new flavors.

Compared to traditional coffee machines, WinkGo is small, portable and easy to use. Simply pour water and powder into WinkGo during operation. WinkGo optimizes the extraction process and makes espresso quality even better! Constant pressure of 15 Bar makes the coffee fat rich and fragrant. Nothing worse than modern large coffee machines.

No matter where you are, it allows you to experience the pleasure of high quality Italian coffee, from the first to the last. Just prepare coffee powder, hot water and WinkGo.

Just press the button with your finger to start the coffee making process. The operation is very convenient and the method of use is simple. The machine itself has a powerful power, no need to rely on your hand to press, but just a button operation.

A standard espresso coffee, requiring 15 BAR pressure, is patented to provide a constant pressure of 15 BAR, giving you a cup of rich, fragrant coffee.

Italians are also more rigorous in the extraction time of coffee. The 30s time guarantees uniform extraction, so that every coffee powder is fully penetrated, and the color and delicateness of coffee are just right.

The WinkGo coffee machine can meet the needs of both coffee capsules and coffee powder.

You can use two varieties of coffee powder or coffee capsules, meets your different tastes. It also has DIY function, according to appropriate ratio of water,milk and coffee, Americano, Cappuccino, Mocha, Espresso are not amount to much, which gives you more flexibility in trying new flavors and lets you enjoy the fun of life.  

A spoonful of coffee powder is put into the machine, hot water is poured into it, and a cup of espresso is filtered out by pressing it with a self-service piston on the pot. It is portable and easy to operate without any compressed air or electric devices.

The weight is very light, but no matter where you plan to go, its structure gives you a fairly solid feel.The body length is 21.6cm, small and portable, making it your choice of travel companions. Equivalent to the size of a common mineral water bottle, easy to carry out

Portable two built-in coffee cups, good coffee and friends to share

After each operation, WinkGo takes only a few seconds to clean and maintain. For deep cleaning, every part can be easily removed.

WinkGo has a built-in 2600mAh lithium battery that can be charged via USB, mobile power and car charger.

 

1.How does it heat up?

You need to fill it with hot water. You’ll need to heat the water by whatever method you want (the Nanopresso does not heat water).

 
2. What kind of plastic polymer is this machine made of? Is it safe on hot water?

It is made of Food Grade Engineered ABS Thermoplastic. Yes it is safe with hot water content.

 
3.What pressure does this machine operate at? (in BAR)

15 bar.

Max. speed:15km/h (9.3mph)

Max. travel distance: 10km (6miles)

Max. incline: 15°

Max. load:120kg (264lb)

(※The above information may vary depending on bag weight and incline level)

 
4.How much does it weigh?

It`s 525g.

 
5. Does the unit charge by usb or do you have to have the usb charger plugged up to use it each time?

You need to supply energy from a power bank or a cellphone charger during the operation.

 
6. Can I use both capsules and ground coffee?

 

You can use nespresso capsules with the accessory NS ADAPTER, that accessory will be sold in few month. 

 
7. How many shots will it make with the water storage?

One shot, double will taste water down . But it all depends on the grind, mines are pretty fine. Also very important to pre heat

 
8.Does the voltage is fixed when charging?

Yes, while charging, the voltage is 5V and the current is 1A or 2A. Please check the voltage and current before charging.

story:
All of our shoes come with a coconut coir midsole which helps create negative space like a cavity inside the outsole, making our shoes one the lightest out there! The coconut coir midsole not only acts as a light weight space filler but also offers suspension to the insole placed on top of it.

 

The coconut cutouts at the bottom of our shoes are waterproof and give you a sneak peak into the midsole of our shoes reminding you that wearing these highly sustainable shoes made from natural materials you are treading lighter on the planet. Also they make for a great conversation starter ;)

 

 

Our insoles are made from natural latex, which supports and cushions your feet just like a premium latex mattress. Natural latex outperforms memory foam in every way - be it shock absorption or less sweaty feet. Natural Latex offers a mix of a bouncy and cushiony which is difficult to put in words. It's like having a pep in every step - You've got to try it to believe it :)

 

 

Our insole liner is made from Australian Merino Wool, which is one of the softest wools and is antibacterial offering unparalleled odor control allowing you to wear them without socks.

 

The combination of our carefully selected natural materials such as bamboo upper and merino wool insole lining helps make our shoes extremely cozy, making them ideal for lounging as well as those long days.

Our shoe upper is made from a bamboo fabric blend, which is softer and cooler than cotton while outperforming it in moisture-wicking and temperature regulation. Bamboo is extremely breathable and highly sweat absorbent, keeping your feet cooler and drier.

 

The bamboo upper fabric of our shoes is coated with Teflon Fabric Protector, which is widely accepted as a gold standard for stain-resistance coating in the textile industry. Also makes it easier to wipe off dirt so you can wear them longer without a wash.

 

The bamboo upper fabric of our shoes is coated with Teflon Fabric Protector, which is widely accepted as a gold standard for water-resistance coating in the textile industry.

 

Our outsoles are constructed with a blend of EVA + Rubber which helps keep our shoes light without compromising on the grip.    

 

Our shoes are designed for durability offering great performance for its weight, so you can hit the roads as well the trails.

 

 

Our EVA + Rubber outsole is extremely sturdy and grippy offering exterior support, whereas the natural latex insole in the interior offers better balance as compared to memory foam insoles.

 

Our shoes are flexible and supportive, and perfect for all your travels, daily commute or a night on the town. It is indeed your Ultimate Everyday Companion.

 

Our shoes are made as per standard US sizing. In case you are between sizes, we suggest you size up.

We don't share EU sizes for our shoes because EU sizes vary a lot across brands and it can get confusing and misleading. In case you follow only EU sizes and don't know your US or UK shoe size, we recommend you measure your foot length in CM or Inches and identify your correct shoe size from the chart above.

 

HOW TO MEASURE:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping Countries:

United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain and Sweden, Norway, Switzerland, Singapore, Australia, Hong Kong, Japan, Philippines, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand.

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

BAUBAX is a Kickstarter born brand and we've been in the business of designing and manufacturing travel apparel since 2015. Our team has extensive experience in fabric design and manufacturing high-quality apparel as well as fulfilling hundreds of thousands of orders. This is the 2.0 version of our shoes and the feedback from the previous campaign has been taken into consideration to help improve our designs and sizing. We have our manufacturers lined up, and our production team is waiting for our signal.

We've had our fair share of manufacturing hiccups in one of our earlier campaigns and we've dealt with them in a transparent, responsible way by keeping our backers updated and we’ve always delivered all of our commitments towards our backers. Should any issues come up, you can be confident we will handle them with transparency and utmost care for you.

Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain and are confident that we can fulfill all the orders. But sometimes things happen, such as fabric delays due to the yarn being stuck in customs, etc. We've added buffer time for such events, but sometimes it's not enough. If anything should arrive late we will get through it together.

The BAUBAX brand is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Jamiak, Inc., and is run under the leadership of our President Mr. Jason Akatiff. The new leadership team has extensive experience in international supply chain and we are more confident than ever on our promise of delivering all the rewards to our backers.

Thank you for your support! We'll be grateful to have your pledge to help us kickstart this journey of creating the most comfortable shoes! In case you have any questions, do not hesitate to reach out to us, we're at support@baubax.com

The coconut coir midsole not only acts as a light weight space filler but also offers suspension to the insole placed on top of it. The coconut cutouts at the bottom of our shoes are waterproof and give you a sneak peak into the midsole of our shoes reminding you that wearing these highly sustainable shoes made from natural materials you are treading lighter on the planet. Also they make for a great conversation starter ;)  Our insoles are made from natural latex, which supports and cushions your feet just like a premium latex mattress. Natural latex outperforms memory foam in every way - be it shock absorption or less sweaty feet. Natural Latex offers a mix of a bouncy and cushiony which is difficult to put in words. story:
With its wide and colorful screen, NDL(No Decompression Limit), depth, temperature and compass are all shown on the screen in the most intuitive way.  

 

 

 

 

You can check the dive computer information while taking videos and photos. You can even take your selfie too!!
 
 
 
 
 
 

You know how annoying keeping a logbook all the time after the diving is. With the DIVEROID mini, you can track your diving log in smart and easy way.


 

 

 

 

 

 

The DIVEROID mini was developed to help scuba divers around the world access essential safety dive equipment with just their own smartphones. At an affordable price of $109, the DIVEROID mini was designed and patented as a module. The Mini syncs via Bluetooth to your smartphones and gives divers an all-in-one diving experience with the following tools:

 

 

 

 

Learn more about Housings

 

 

 

 

 

1. Install DIVEROID Apps(iOS and Android)

2. Bluetooth connects mini and smart phones
3. Diving with a smartphone in the waterproof housing

Recommended waterproof housing : Lenzo, Watershot, Meikon, Mpac and more. ​

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The more people who know about us, the more the DIVEROID mini can grow! Your support and input will ultimately make DIVEROID mini a better product!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Our dive computer is dedicated to provide divers the most important safety gear. It would give you essential information and prevent you from decompression sickness. We believe the DIVEROID mini will help with the safety of divers.  This device is for passionate divers like you, and provides you with a reasonable option without the burden of buying an expensive dive computer.
 

DIVEROID mini offers scuba divers an affordable option that doesn’t compromise the safety diving experience. It is compatible with most smartphones. This would certainly contribute to safer diving as your smartphone turns into a dive computer. We plan to mass produce the DIVEROID mini and ship it worldwide. We are entering an existing market of dive computers at a competitive cost. 

 

 

 

 

All of us in our company are passionate SCUBA divers. We tried our best to make a competitive device for a diver in every aspect. 

 

 

 

 

          1. March 2016 DIVEROID Generation 1 interview

 

          2. February 2018 Korea Crowdfunding WADIZ. DIVEROID Mini funding

We established Artisan & Ocean five years ago. The CEO/Founder, Jungil Kim is an experienced diver of more than 10 years. We started with the profound knowledge and experiences in underwater activities, technology and entrepreneurship. 

The first product we launched was DIVEROID Android, the all-in-one dive gear. We included a dive computer, compass and dive log book into a single device. The DIVEROID is the only existing dive computer with built in housing. 

We have continued developing the DIVEROID mini, incorporating many improved features and enhancing the software functions, while being at a reasonable price.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Q. Can I use the DIVEROID mini without a water-proofed housing?
A. No, it’s impossible to use the DIVEROID mini without a waterproof housing for your smartphone.
 

Q. Can I use the DIVEROID mini with another person at the same time?
A. No it can’t. Under water the maximum Bluetooth connecting distance is 3 centimeters between a smartphone and the DIVEROID mini. That’s why you can’t use the DIVEROID mini with someone else at the same time.
 

Q. Can I use other housing instead of LenzO, WaterShot, Meikon and Mpac?
A. Our recommended housings are LenzO, WaterShot, Meikon and Mpack. If you want to use other housings please contact us here on Indiegogo, via email or Facebook, and we'll let you know if your housing is compatible!
 

Q. How deep can the DIVEROID mini work underwater? 
A. The maximum waterproof depth is 200ft but our recommended depth is 131ft.
 

Q. Does the DIVEROID mini use the smartphone's battery?
A. No it does not. The DIVEROID mini comes with a built-in battery and doesn't use a smartphone’s battery. The battery life is usually 2 years but can vary depending on usage habits and number of dives.

Q. While diving, is there a way to reconnect Bluetooth in the case it becomes disconnected?
A. Push the "Diving Start" button for around 1-2 seconds. There is no need to separate the housing from your smartphone. Bluetooth will automatically reconnect to your phone. 

Q. How can I charge my DIVEROID mini? 
A. Instead of rechargeable batteries, we use low-power Bluetooth. Without significant time, you are able to charge the DIVEROID mini using Bluetooth.

Q. While I am diving, am I able to use another application at the same time as the DIVEROID application?
A. No. For the user's safety, we recommend that you only use the DIVEROID application while diving. 

Q. How is the after service of the DIVEROID MINI handled? 
A. The warranty lasts 1 year from the the date of purchase. If there are any problems regarding the DIVEROID mini, please submit your inquiries through the customer service line or website and send the product to DIVEROID. 

 

 

 

Product delivery start date is July 30th, 2018.
*Due to different delivery times in various regions, please schedule accordingly.

Since DIVEROID is a scuba diving device, there will be no refunds and it cannot be exchanged. Please take this into consideration when purchasing.

After receiving the product, please check the following:
(to make sure it wasn’t damaged during shipment.) 

1. Check if it goes on / off .
2. Check the Bluetooth connection with smartphone. 
3. Check the normal operation of the application after it’s connected. 

If a problem is founded during the checking process, we will exchange the mini.
* Customer pays for shipping  * No refund

 

 

 

The warranty period is one year based on the delivery date of the product. To receive warranty service, the purchaser must contact DIVEROID for problem determination and service procedures.

The foregoing warranty shall not apply to any problem that is caused by :

* The use or operation in an environment other than that approved or recommended by                    DIVEROID or the applicable documentation.

* End User’s failure to implement or connect with incompatible device.

* Any damage or malfunction caused by disassembly, modification or repair.

* Malfunction due to natural disasters.

story:
Jason's bike was stolen on Tuesday, March 4th, while he was volunteering with the L.I.F.E. program at Shanti. The bike was brand new, purchased so that he could train for the AIDS/LifeCycle and help raise money for the San Francisco AIDS Foundation.

Jason is a tireless volunteer and a community leader who's smile and warmth touch the people around him. Originally from Georgia, Jason has fallen in love with San Francisco, and he has dedicated himself to supporting the HIV/AIDS community with his countless hours of service.

Jason has faced many challenges, including living his entire life with cerebral palsy. But instead of retreating, Jason faces his struggles head-on and shows everyone around him that with love and support we can overcome anything that life throws at us.

Jason was crushed when he discovered his bike had been stolen, especially since he does not have the money to replace it. But despite that he is still hopeful that things will turn around and that he will be back out there, training for the AIDS/LifeCycle soon.

That's where you come in! The money that we raise will replace Jason's bike and gear, and add some improvements that will make it safer and easier for Jason to ride in traffic (namely blinkers, so that he can signal without losing his balance.)

Any donation helps, even something as little as $5 or $10. Additionally, PLEASE SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN so that many more people can hear Jason's story. We can do this!
