story:
AIRDOT is the smart solution that you now have available to make better use of space, allowing you to save up to 70% more space available through an easy-to-use vacuum pump and storage bags that safely seals your store clothes and keeps them compressed, fresh and odorless for your entire trip or in your home. 

 

1. Make up to 70% more space

 

  • Provides powerful compression while weighing only 172g (6oz) and making less noise

  • Eliminates bad odor and bacteria in the luggage or in the closet

  • Packs away old clothing, duvets, seasonal items and more

 

 

 

2. Store clothes for longer

AIRDOT vacuum storage bags are thinner and stronger than the competition by AIRDOT’s special technologies. Pack once and keep the space you need for your entire trip. Also, compress and store blankets, winter clothes, or thicker items to save space in your closet. 

We designed the AIRDOT Vacuum Storage Bag to keep sealing for more than 6 months with its embossed surface and superior material with excellent tensile and puncture resistance. We are continuing to measure how long the AIRDOT bag can hold the seal. See more details below in the section [AIRDOT Vacuum Storage Bags].

 

 

 

3. 3-ways to use the AIRDOT vacuum bags

You can use the AIRDOT in any situation!

AIRDOT vacuum bags are versatile and can be sealed using three methods:

  • AIRDOT vacuum pump
  • Vacuum cleaner
  • By hand

 

 

 

※ Better Quality Assurance for all.

We promise to keep you informed during all stages of this campaign so you can know exactly what's happening in our production process. See more details below in the section [AIRDOT Development].

 

 

​We will provide the AIRDOT connector for free to all backers.

As feedback from many backers, we decided to make the AIRDOT connector. We are doing our best to make the AIRDOT connector to be compatible with other vacuum bags in the market and we are considering many options and possibilities about the design, materials, molds, etc. with the production factory in detail. Please enjoy the hints of the AIRDOT connector in the AIRDOT Making Film #4 of the section [AIRDOT Development].

 

 

 

▶ PROBLEM: Packing and organizing clothes are tough 

We're travelers just like you. And we hate fighting with our luggage and trying to get everything to fit into one bag.

Also, we need to organize everything in our closet just like you. And in the warm spring, we are especially concerned about how to organize our winter clothing in a wardrobe.

 

▶ SOLUTION: Airdot Vacuum Pump & Storage Bag

With AIRDOT you can pack your bags faster, save space, have more room to bring home souvenirs, and travel stress-free. And you can organize your wardrobe's clothing.

AIRDOT is a vacuum system that combines the AIRDOT vacuum pump with AIRDOT vacuum storage bags.

This system can be used before your trip, during your trip, at home, or anywhere you need to create more storage space.

 

 

 

 

1. AIRDOT IS LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT

The AIRDOT vacuum pump weighs less than a smartphone and can fit inside tote bags, purses, and other carry-on bags.

 

2. AIRDOT HAS MULTIPLE POWER OPTIONS

The AIRDOT vacuum pump works with any power source and can be powered by Portable Battery, Wall Charger, USB port.

 

3. AIRDOT IS TRAVEL READY

The AIRDOT vacuum pump and storage bags can be taken on the plane in your carry-on bag or placed in your checked luggage.

 

 

4. AIRDOT IS QUIET

At just 50dB, the AIRDOT vacuum pump is up to 20% quieter than other portable vacuum pumps and the person sitting next to you on the plane who won’t stop talking.

 

5. AIRDOT HAS MOTOR COOLING SYSTEM

The AIRDOT vacuum pump uses incoming air to cool the motor. This protects the motor from overload and extends its life.

 

 

 

1. A BETTER VALVE FOR A BETTER VACUUM BAG

The valve on AIRDOT storage bags doesn’t have a cover, and they are thinner than any other vacuum storage bag.

A “no-cover” design means that you’ll have one less thing to worry about when you’re traveling because there’s nothing to lose when you’re using the storage bags. 

Thinner valves also make it easier to pack extra vacuum storage bags in your suitcase.

 

 

2. AIRDOT STORES CLOTHES FOR LONGER

With its embossed surface and superior material with excellent tensile and puncture resistance, AIRDOT vacuum storage bags can hold their seal for up to 6 months! Pack once, and keep the space you need for your entire trip. AIRDOT vacuum storage bags can also be used to save space in your closet. Compress and store blankets, towels, or other items.

 

 

In our advertisement, we described the duration of the sealing of the AIRDOT Compression bag as 30 days, the minimum period. However, we designed the AIRDOT compression bag to keep sealing for more than 6 months. We are currently testing beyond 105 days until the AIRDOT vacuum bag loses its sealing. Explore our test videos: TEST #1 and TEST#2.

 

 

3. A BETTER VACUUM STORAGE BAG FOR CLOTHING

 

AIRDOT’s special embossed surface allows clothing to be compressed 4 to 5 times more than traditional vacuum bags will let you. The embossed surface creates air channels that pull air out of the bag more efficiently when using the AIRDOT vacuum, a household vacuum, or hand rolling.

AIRDOT storage bags are equipped with sealing channels that have double mating pairs. These sealing channels are arranged in a unique configuration that creates an airtight seal during compression and reduces leakage over time allowing you to save space for longer periods of time.

On the bottom of every AIRDOT vacuum storage bag is a patented adhesive film that helps the bag maintain its vacuum seal for longer without compromising the storage capacity of the bag.

 

 

 

3-WAYS TO USE THE AIRDOT

AIRDOT vacuum storage bags can be sealed using the AIRDOT vacuum pump, a standard vacuum cleaner, or by hand.

 

Connect the AIRDOT vacuum pump to the AIRDOT vacuum storage bag by inserting the AIRDOT vacuum pump into the valve on the bag. Tilt slightly to get a firm connection, and then press the button on top of the AIRDOT vacuum pump. 

 

 

 

The blue LED light of the AIRDOT vacuum pump indicates the operating status.

 

 

The AIRDOT vacuum pump is a smart device and can automatically turn itself off when the vacuum process is completed. Also, the AIRDOT vacuum storage bags are smart, and can automatically lock the valve after the AIRDOT vacuum pump is removed.

 

 

Check out the demonstration video below.

 

AIRDOT vacuum storage bags are compatible with most household vacuum cleaners that have a circular entrance that’s 27mm / 1.06in diameter or greater. For reference, the most common size of a household vacuum cleaner hose is 32mm / 1.26in.

 

 

If you don’t have a household vacuum cleaner handy, or a power source for the AIRDOT vacuum pump, you can remove the air out of the AIRDOT vacuum storage bags by rolling them up with your hands.

Seal the bag first, place the bag on a hard surface, and begin rolling the bag starting at the end you just sealed.

 

 

 

 

:: THE AIRDOT CLIP

Makes it easy to fully close the AIRDOT vacuum storage bags with a single slide. And you can also use it with other vacuum bags!

 

 

:: AIRDOT IS DESIGNED FOR VACATIONS, INTERNATIONAL TRAVEL, AND EVERYDAY USE

 

:: NON-ROLLING DESIGN WITH EASY TO GRIP CIRCULAR-SHAPE MAIN BODY

 

:: CAP AND O-RING ON THE AIR INTAKE

On the bottom of the AIRDOT vacuum pump are a cap and o-ring. The cap prevents dust from entering the air intake and damaging the motor. The o-ring prevents air leakage during compression and makes it easier to connect the AIRDOT vacuum pump to the AIRDOT vacuum storage bags.

 

:: AIRDOT HAS DESIGN FOR HUMAN FACTORS

 

:: AIRDOT IS BUILT TO LAST

 

 

 

:: AIRDOT IS ECO-FRIENDLY

The AIRDOT was designed to be bought once and used 1000 times. 

We wanted to create a device that was eco-friendly. And required customers to reuse it again and again instead of buying new items and generating more waste.

 

When you receive your AIRDOT, it’ll be packaged in recyclable materials that are eco-friendly. AIRDOT vacuum storage bags are also recyclable as well.

 

 

 

AIRDOT Vacuum Pump

 

AIRDOT Vacuum Storage Bags

 

 

 

All pledges placed in Indiegogo Project will start shipping in September 2020.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We started AIRDOT with one simple motto: “If you do your best, step-by-step, even with the small stuff, you can change everything”.

We’re trying to show that two individuals can change the small things with a little bit of engineering know-how to create products that have tremendous value.

Thank you for joining us on our journey in creating our first product the AIRDOT.

 

 

 

 

 

AIRDOT MAKING FILM #1

The production of AIRDOT is largely composed of compressors and compression bags. We use injection molding to make compressor parts and valve parts of the compression bags. The mold-making and injection molding tests have been completed. Also, a production line for the compression bags has been secured. Watch the AIRDOT making film #1 with the heart beating sound.

 

AIRDOT MAKING FILM #2

Since 2018, we meticulously improved AIRDOT in every aspect-  durability, usability, and finishings. Now in mid-2020, we can confidently say that we are ready for mass production. Just a step away from the final review and modification of the molds and injection molding. Check out our dev story here:

 

AIRDOT MAKING FILM #3

The AIRDOT vacuum pump has special functions: AUTO-STOP & LED lights to indicate the status. The AIRDOT vacuum pump can automatically turn itself off when the vacuuming is completed for your ease of use, or when it is operated without any load for 10 minutes. This prevents the overheating of the motor. The LED indicator light blinks fast during operation and blinks slowly during stand-by. These special functions are controlled by software on the PCB. We have completed the development of optimal PCB and software. Watch the AIRDOT making film #3.

 

AIRDOT MAKING FILM #4

This is a special video clip of AIRDOT at the landmarks of Seoul- its birthplace! We traveled all over Seoul with the AIRDOT vacuum pump and bag. Our destination was Namsan Seoul Tower and Jjimjilbang, a Korean sauna. We just wanted to try AIRDOT at Namsan Seoul Tower Observatory, one of the highest in Seoul. Also, in the hot room above 58℃ (136℉) and the cold room below 0℃ (32℉). Bammmmm the real-world test rocks.

 

AIRDOT was developed using experimentation, prototyping, and computational analysis. Through this process, we were able to develop vacuum seal bags for clothing that are easier to seal, hold their seal longer than leading brands, and a vacuum pump that’s more efficient and quieter.

 

We now have a fully developed and working prototype that’s ready for manufacturing. We’ve also begun the injection molding process to help speed up the delivery of the AIRDOT after the campaign has ended.

 

Many projects fail to meet their delivery deadlines because of failures during the injection molding process. To reduce our risk of failure, we’re currently working with an experienced injection molding company with all the necessary equipment to bring the AIRDOT to life.
story_txt:
AIRDOT is the smart solution that you now have available to make better use of space, allowing you to save up to 70% more space available through an easy-to-use vacuum pump and storage bags that safely seals your store clothes and keeps them compressed, fresh and odorless for your entire trip or in your home.  1. Make up to 70% more space 
Provides powerful compression while weighing only 172g (6oz) and making less noise
Eliminates bad odor and bacteria in the luggage or in the closet
Packs away old clothing, duvets, seasonal items and more
   2. Store clothes for longerAIRDOT vacuum storage bags are thinner and stronger than the competition by AIRDOT’s special technologies. Pack once and keep the space you need for your entire trip. Also, compress and store blankets, winter clothes, or thicker items to save space in your closet. We designed the AIRDOT Vacuum Storage Bag to keep sealing for more than 6 months with its embossed surface and superior material with excellent tensile and puncture resistance. We are continuing to measure how long the AIRDOT bag can hold the seal. See more details below in the section [AIRDOT Vacuum Storage Bags].   3. 3-ways to use the AIRDOT vacuum bagsYou can use the AIRDOT in any situation!AIRDOT vacuum bags are versatile and can be sealed using three methods:
AIRDOT vacuum pump
Vacuum cleaner
By hand
   ※ Better Quality Assurance for all.We promise to keep you informed during all stages of this campaign so you can know exactly what's happening in our production process. See more details below in the section [AIRDOT Development].  ​We will provide the AIRDOT connector for free to all backers.As feedback from many backers, we decided to make the AIRDOT connector. We are doing our best to make the AIRDOT connector to be compatible with other vacuum bags in the market and we are considering many options and possibilities about the design, materials, molds, etc. with the production factory in detail. Please enjoy the hints of the AIRDOT connector in the AIRDOT Making Film #4 of the section [AIRDOT Development].   ▶ PROBLEM: Packing and organizing clothes are tough We're travelers just like you. And we hate fighting with our luggage and trying to get everything to fit into one bag.Also, we need to organize everything in our closet just like you. And in the warm spring, we are especially concerned about how to organize our winter clothing in a wardrobe. ▶ SOLUTION: Airdot Vacuum Pump & Storage BagWith AIRDOT you can pack your bags faster, save space, have more room to bring home souvenirs, and travel stress-free. And you can organize your wardrobe's clothing.AIRDOT is a vacuum system that combines the AIRDOT vacuum pump with AIRDOT vacuum storage bags.This system can be used before your trip, during your trip, at home, or anywhere you need to create more storage space.    1. AIRDOT IS LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACTThe AIRDOT vacuum pump weighs less than a smartphone and can fit inside tote bags, purses, and other carry-on bags. 2. AIRDOT HAS MULTIPLE POWER OPTIONSThe AIRDOT vacuum pump works with any power source and can be powered by Portable Battery, Wall Charger, USB port. 3. AIRDOT IS TRAVEL READYThe AIRDOT vacuum pump and storage bags can be taken on the plane in your carry-on bag or placed in your checked luggage.  4. AIRDOT IS QUIETAt just 50dB, the AIRDOT vacuum pump is up to 20% quieter than other portable vacuum pumps and the person sitting next to you on the plane who won’t stop talking. 5. AIRDOT HAS MOTOR COOLING SYSTEMThe AIRDOT vacuum pump uses incoming air to cool the motor. This protects the motor from overload and extends its life.   1. A BETTER VALVE FOR A BETTER VACUUM BAGThe valve on AIRDOT storage bags doesn’t have a cover, and they are thinner than any other vacuum storage bag.A “no-cover” design means that you’ll have one less thing to worry about when you’re traveling because there’s nothing to lose when you’re using the storage bags. Thinner valves also make it easier to pack extra vacuum storage bags in your suitcase.  2. AIRDOT STORES CLOTHES FOR LONGERWith its embossed surface and superior material with excellent tensile and puncture resistance, AIRDOT vacuum storage bags can hold their seal for up to 6 months! Pack once, and keep the space you need for your entire trip. AIRDOT vacuum storage bags can also be used to save space in your closet. Compress and store blankets, towels, or other items.  In our advertisement, we described the duration of the sealing of the AIRDOT Compression bag as 30 days, the minimum period. However, we designed the AIRDOT compression bag to keep sealing for more than 6 months. We are currently testing beyond 105 days until the AIRDOT vacuum bag loses its sealing. Explore our test videos: TEST #1 and TEST#2.  3. A BETTER VACUUM STORAGE BAG FOR CLOTHING AIRDOT’s special embossed surface allows clothing to be compressed 4 to 5 times more than traditional vacuum bags will let you. The embossed surface creates air channels that pull air out of the bag more efficiently when using the AIRDOT vacuum, a household vacuum, or hand rolling.AIRDOT storage bags are equipped with sealing channels that have double mating pairs. These sealing channels are arranged in a unique configuration that creates an airtight seal during compression and reduces leakage over time allowing you to save space for longer periods of time.On the bottom of every AIRDOT vacuum storage bag is a patented adhesive film that helps the bag maintain its vacuum seal for longer without compromising the storage capacity of the bag.   3-WAYS TO USE THE AIRDOTAIRDOT vacuum storage bags can be sealed using the AIRDOT vacuum pump, a standard vacuum cleaner, or by hand. Connect the AIRDOT vacuum pump to the AIRDOT vacuum storage bag by inserting the AIRDOT vacuum pump into the valve on the bag. Tilt slightly to get a firm connection, and then press the button on top of the AIRDOT vacuum pump.    The blue LED light of the AIRDOT vacuum pump indicates the operating status.  The AIRDOT vacuum pump is a smart device and can automatically turn itself off when the vacuum process is completed. Also, the AIRDOT vacuum storage bags are smart, and can automatically lock the valve after the AIRDOT vacuum pump is removed.  Check out the demonstration video below.  AIRDOT vacuum storage bags are compatible with most household vacuum cleaners that have a circular entrance that’s 27mm / 1.06in diameter or greater. For reference, the most common size of a household vacuum cleaner hose is 32mm / 1.26in.  If you don’t have a household vacuum cleaner handy, or a power source for the AIRDOT vacuum pump, you can remove the air out of the AIRDOT vacuum storage bags by rolling them up with your hands.Seal the bag first, place the bag on a hard surface, and begin rolling the bag starting at the end you just sealed.     :: THE AIRDOT CLIPMakes it easy to fully close the AIRDOT vacuum storage bags with a single slide. And you can also use it with other vacuum bags!  :: AIRDOT IS DESIGNED FOR VACATIONS, INTERNATIONAL TRAVEL, AND EVERYDAY USE :: NON-ROLLING DESIGN WITH EASY TO GRIP CIRCULAR-SHAPE MAIN BODY :: CAP AND O-RING ON THE AIR INTAKEOn the bottom of the AIRDOT vacuum pump are a cap and o-ring. The cap prevents dust from entering the air intake and damaging the motor. The o-ring prevents air leakage during compression and makes it easier to connect the AIRDOT vacuum pump to the AIRDOT vacuum storage bags. :: AIRDOT HAS DESIGN FOR HUMAN FACTORS :: AIRDOT IS BUILT TO LAST   :: AIRDOT IS ECO-FRIENDLYThe AIRDOT was designed to be bought once and used 1000 times. We wanted to create a device that was eco-friendly. And required customers to reuse it again and again instead of buying new items and generating more waste. When you receive your AIRDOT, it’ll be packaged in recyclable materials that are eco-friendly. AIRDOT vacuum storage bags are also recyclable as well.   AIRDOT Vacuum Pump AIRDOT Vacuum Storage Bags   All pledges placed in Indiegogo Project will start shipping in September 2020.       We started AIRDOT with one simple motto: “If you do your best, step-by-step, even with the small stuff, you can change everything”.We’re trying to show that two individuals can change the small things with a little bit of engineering know-how to create products that have tremendous value.Thank you for joining us on our journey in creating our first product the AIRDOT.     AIRDOT MAKING FILM #1The production of AIRDOT is largely composed of compressors and compression bags. Also, a production line for the compression bags has been secured. Watch the AIRDOT making film #1 with the heart beating sound.  AIRDOT MAKING FILM #2Since 2018, we meticulously improved AIRDOT in every aspect-  durability, usability, and finishings. Now in mid-2020, we can confidently say that we are ready for mass production. Just a step away from the final review and modification of the molds and injection molding. Check out our dev story here: AIRDOT MAKING FILM #3The AIRDOT vacuum pump has special functions: AUTO-STOP & LED lights to indicate the status. The AIRDOT vacuum pump can automatically turn itself off when the vacuuming is completed for your ease of use, or when it is operated without any load for 10 minutes. This prevents the overheating of the motor. The LED indicator light blinks fast during operation and blinks slowly during stand-by. These special functions are controlled by software on the PCB. We have completed the development of optimal PCB and software. Watch the AIRDOT making film #3.  AIRDOT MAKING FILM #4This is a special video clip of AIRDOT at the landmarks of Seoul- its birthplace! We traveled all over Seoul with the AIRDOT vacuum pump and bag. Our destination was Namsan Seoul Tower and Jjimjilbang, a Korean sauna. We just wanted to try AIRDOT at Namsan Seoul Tower Observatory, one of the highest in Seoul. Also, in the hot room above 58℃ (136℉) and the cold room below 0℃ (32℉). Bammmmm the real-world test rocks.  AIRDOT was developed using experimentation, prototyping, and computational analysis. Through this process, we were able to develop vacuum seal bags for clothing that are easier to seal, hold their seal longer than leading brands, and a vacuum pump that’s more efficient and quieter. We now have a fully developed and working prototype that’s ready for manufacturing. We’ve also begun the injection molding process to help speed up the delivery of the AIRDOT after the campaign has ended. Many projects fail to meet their delivery deadlines because of failures during the injection molding process. To reduce our risk of failure, we’re currently working with an experienced injection molding company with all the necessary equipment to bring the AIRDOT to life.

story:
Thank you to all of our supporters! 

Most duffle bags lack organization and access - we solved this by creating a build in 15" Laptop Sleeve and a full sided utility area with tons of pockets. There is a shoe pocket and a luggage strap. See the whole story in the video above! 

 

A perfect weekender, Carry-On luggage and Gym bag. All in one. 

 

We stand behind our products. If you are not 100% satisfied simply send it back and we will refund you, no questions asked. 

 

Do you also bring you laptop or iPad on trips or travels? Or do you sometimes go to the gym directly after work? Most times you need to either bring two bags or throw your laptop into your duffel and hope that it is protected. With the Harrison Duffel you can know that your laptop is protected.

Do you also bring your laptop or iPad on trips or travels? Or do you sometimes go to the gym directly after work? Most times you need to either bring two bags or throw your laptop into your duffel and hope that it is protected. With the Harrison Duffel you can know that your laptop is protected.

You can easily reach your laptop from the side compartment - which is extra padded for the safety of the laptop. You can almost drop your bag - nothing will happen to the laptop. 

When you bring your charger, passport, EarPods, lipgloss, a pen, a pencil, lip balm, a cord, cash, sunglasses or other things.. You dont have anywhere to put them in traditional duffels. UNTIL NOW.. We created a utility area in one side, with many pockets and compartments. 

 With the utility area, you can now organize everything:

You dont always have to carry, with the luggage strap you can put it securely on your suitcase and roll along.

The pocket on the outside, is great for storing your phone or keys. It has a waterproof zipper and the same soft inner lining to protect your valuables.

Soft inner lining to protect your stuff..

 

Separate your shoes from your clothes with the shoe pocket.

 

On the inside of the bag, there are lots of space for your clothes and 6 mesh pockets in different sizes. This is a great way to organize your socks, underwear, toiletries, ties and more. 

We only use materials that will last forever! 

 

Prototypes

We worked for a long time to make this, our first bag and we are so proud of our accomplishment. Over a year of work and many samples and designs, has brought us to this point and we are ready to put the Duffel into production. 

These drawings are not from the final prototype - they are early drawings of how we imagined the bag to be. 

How we decided on our manufacturer: 

The Harrison duffel are being made in Guanzhou, China. The reason why we wanted to produce the bags in China is because of the partners we met. They made us some prototypes of our initial designs. They were very flexible in our choice of materials, reliable and quality focused.

The factory has 25 years of experience in producing bags and they are working with big global brands selling quality gear.

 

The production and fulfillment plan:

Production will take 40-50 days. 

When the production is finished, the manufacturer have a quality control program where they look at every single bag to make sure that there are no rotten apples. 

After this, the bags will be shipped to each warehouse. 

 

We are choosing to use warehouses placed so that it will be optimized for customs. China and USA have great postal and courier deals with the rest of the world. 

This is why we are going to use a warehouse in Guangzhou and in Los Angeles. We are planning to ship some EU bags from Denmark as well.

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have been working on the Harrison Duffel design for the past year because we want every person who gets this bag to love it. The ethos of our team is to not just make another product filled with useless features, but actually think about how this design can bring value. 
We trust the production quality of our manufacturer and that they will finish the products on time. We are confident that we will be able to deliver the products on time. 
There will be challenges with delivery because of the worldwide shipping, but we have partnered with a fulfillment partner that is experienced in shipping for crowdfunding campaigns. 
Unexpected delays can happen, but we are fully committed to ensure that all our backers will get the best product and that we will solve every issue that might happen.

story:
The translation software is free and it comes part of the purchase of the Fito earphone. It is free only for our Indiegogo backers during this limited campaign time.

 

Fito Tap Pro is a portable, instant voice translation earphone for travelers, students, business professionals, employers and medical staff to read, write and speak in different languages, anywhere in the world. 

 

 

 

 

More than 30+ languages can be automatically detected and translated through an app.

 

 

Translator supports the following languages: 

Egyptian Arabic • Saudi Arabian Arabic • Catalan • Croatian • Czech Tranditional Chinese • Mandarin Chinese • Simplified Cantonese • Danish Dutch American English • Austrailian English • British English • Indian English • Finnish French • Canadian French • German • Greek • Hebrew • Hindi • Hungarian • Italian Japanese • Korean • Malay • Norwegian • Polish • Portuguese • Romanian • Russian Brazilian Portuguese • Slovak • Spain Spanish • Latin American Spanish • Swedish Thai • Turkish • Vietnamese

 

 


Fito Tap Pro earphones come with a smartphone app. We use Microsoft Translator API to handle translation between two different languages in a real-time. The software lets you select a “Home Language” and a “Foreign Language” before begin a conversation. 

There are 3 ways to use the translation app:

Option 1 - Converse Mode: Press the “Power Button” (O) on the charging case (for 3 seconds) and start speaking. Make sure your earpieces are placed inside the case to activate. Press the right triangle arrow (▷) to  translate your own language to a different language and press the left triangle arrow (◃) to translate foreign language to your native language.

Option 2 - Private Mode: Put your earphones in your ear and start speaking. Tap on the “Language Button” on the bottom to translate into another language.

Option 3 - Learning Mode: You may type directly into the app.

 

 

*Microsoft Translator API is powered by cutting-edge technology used by Office, Bing, Skype, Internet Explorer as well as by partners such as Twitter, Yelp, eBay, WeChat and more.The app is available for both iOS and Android devices.

 

Microsoft translator is based on neural machine translation (NMT) system. NMT provided major advances in translation quality over the then industry-standard statistical machine translation (SMT) technology. Because NMT better captures the context of full sentences before translating them, it provides higher quality, more human-sounding and more fluent translations. Learn more.

 

 

 

The two microphones + cVc(clear Voice capture by Qualcomm) noise cancelling technology picks your voice accurately from a noisy background. It reduces ambient noise in your conversation and presents your clear voice to the person on the other end. 

Learn more about cVc noise cancelling technology

 

 

 

When used in unison with the translation service, the four microphones (from both earphones) in the charging case form a matrix to pick up sound with optimal accuracy and sensitivity to effectively improve the conversation smoothness. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Fito Tap Pro does way more than simply translate. Enjoy the world around you with Fito Tap Pro. 

 
 
 
 
Tap Pro is equipped with a Qualcomm QCC3026 chipset. As the most advanced Bluetooth chipset series in the industry, QCC chipsets are featured with Bluetooth 5.0 Low Energy, and advanced technology specifically designed for true-wireless.

Learn more about QCC3026 Chipset

 

 

Most Bluetooth 4.0 chipsets in the market have their power consumption at around or above 20mA (milliamp). Some Bluetooth 5.0 chipsets can control the power consumption at or slightly above 10mA. QCC series’ sub-6mA consumption is about half of the competitors and definitely unbeatable in today’s Bluetooth market. *A mA is a unit of measurement for an electric current flowing through an electrical conductor and a measure of the rate of flow of electrons.

 

 

 

FITO Tap Pro is equipped with the most advanced consumer level accelerometers. It offers its users an even better experience with an optimized shape of the earphone body. Simply double-tap on the earphone to play/pause music or answer/end phone calls.

 

 

 

The proximity sensor and optical sensors are combined to allow the earphone to detect if it is in or out of your ear accurately.

 

The dynamic driver in FITO Tap Pro is applied with a graphene coating, which ensures the precision of oscillation, thus enhances sound clarity over its frequency spectrum, especially for the mid and treble range. 

*The structure of graphene – a single layer of carbon atoms in a hexagonal lattice.

 

 

The charging case recharges your earphones in a fast and safe way. FITO Tap Pro extends its overall lifespan much longer than the 5+ hours of pure music playback. Compared to other Bluetooth 5.0 earphones with the same battery capacity, you’ll find yourself having to charge FITO Tap Pro less frequently.

  • A 10 minute charge can support the earphone to provide 1 hour of music playback
  • A full charge on both earphones with the case provides 24 hours of music playback

 

 

 

 

Fito Tap Pro is IP65 rated. It is water resistant and will not be damaged by sweat or rain. Water projected by a nozzle (6.3 mm) against the enclosure from any direction shall have no harmful effects. It is also dust tight, which means no dust gets inside the earphone to cause damage.

     

     

    An elegant design with a premium housing allowing for maximum portability and protection.

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     
     
     
     

     

     
     
     

     

     

     

    Compared to the available basic version (T1). Tap Pro is a big leap offering an upgrade on all basic core features and we need your support to accomplish this great improvement.

     

     
     
     

     

    As our product design and testing is close to the final stages and heading to preparation for mass production, we would like to invite you to participate in the last chapter of this adventure to enjoy the changes we brought to the consumer world with Tap Pro.

    We know the commitment we made to you to deliver the finished product on time is very important to this crowdfunding campaign. As much as we are confident in our supply chain management and production capability, there is always a possibility for some uncontrollable factors such as component delays or shortages. We will be sure to keep you well informed about the status of the project and do our best to solve any arising problems as quickly as possible. We are excited to bring Tap Pro to life with your support!

QCC series’ sub-6mA consumption is about half of the competitors and definitely unbeatable in today’s Bluetooth market. *A mA is a unit of measurement for an electric current flowing through an electrical conductor and a measure of the rate of flow of electrons.

 
 
 

FITO Tap Pro is equipped with the most advanced consumer level accelerometers. It offers its users an even better experience with an optimized shape of the earphone body. Simply double-tap on the earphone to play/pause music or answer/end phone calls.

 
 
 

The proximity sensor and optical sensors are combined to allow the earphone to detect if it is in or out of your ear accurately.

 

The dynamic driver in FITO Tap Pro is applied with a graphene coating, which ensures the precision of oscillation, thus enhances sound clarity over its frequency spectrum, especially for the mid and treble range. *The structure of graphene – a single layer of carbon atoms in a hexagonal lattice.  The charging case recharges your earphones in a fast and safe way. FITO Tap Pro extends its overall lifespan much longer than the 5+ hours of pure music playback. Compared to other Bluetooth 5.0 earphones with the same battery capacity, you’ll find yourself having to charge FITO Tap Pro less frequently.
A 10 minute charge can support the earphone to provide 1 hour of music playback
A full charge on both earphones with the case provides 24 hours of music playback
    Fito Tap Pro is IP65 rated. It is water resistant and will not be damaged by sweat or rain. Water projected by a nozzle (6.3 mm) against the enclosure from any direction shall have no harmful effects. It is also dust tight, which means no dust gets inside the earphone to cause damage.  An elegant design with a premium housing allowing for maximum portability and protection.      

 
 
 
 
 



 
 
 
 




 
 
 

Compared to the available basic version (T1). Tap Pro is a big leap offering an upgrade on all basic core features and we need your support to accomplish this great improvement.

 
 
 
 






 

As our product design and testing is close to the final stages and heading to preparation for mass production, we would like to invite you to participate in the last chapter of this adventure to enjoy the changes we brought to the consumer world with Tap Pro.
We know the commitment we made to you to deliver the finished product on time is very important to this crowdfunding campaign. As much as we are confident in our supply chain management and production capability, there is always a possibility for some uncontrollable factors such as component delays or shortages. We will be sure to keep you well informed about the status of the project and do our best to solve any arising problems as quickly as possible. We are excited to bring Tap Pro to life with your support!

story:
Bike Grip Board - Inventor: William Dandurand

We are raising funds for patent fees and general business overhead for the Bike Grip Board. A Bodyboard-Boogie Board for sports and recreational use in an aquatic medium. A buoyant body with handles-bike grips, anchored above the deck of the apparatus, for grasping by the user, allowing the less-than-expert and professional to obtain better control and maneuverability to enjoy body boarding, boogie boarding, wave riding, floating and surfing-type water sports.  Guide the Ride - Control Your Roll - Pictures, drawings, design details and notes Copyright © 2014 by William Dandurand: All Rights Reserved. Referenced Patent Number: US 5472362

http://garyrevel.com/bd

  • Invented by William Dandurand being marketed by Jongleur Marketing-A Gary Revel Company.
  • We are raising money to help pay for patenting and general business overhead for the Bike Grip Board. Our research has shown it to be a favorite of adults and children once they experience the added fun it brings to their water sports and recreation. You may give any amount. Just click on the 'Contribute Now' button and enter the amount you want to give.
  • We hope to see this Bike Grip Board on beaches and in lakes, rivers, pools and other aquatic areas all around the world.




We Need Money for Patent Attorney Fees, Patent Fees and Business Overhead.

Our plan is to patent the board so it can be licensed, manufactured and sold throughout the world:

  • We need $15,000.00 to cover the costs of patenting the board in the US, Europe and other countries.
  • With your help we can bring more fun to millions of adults and children who enjoy floating on the water in lakes, rivers, pools, etc. and riding the waves in the ocean and on beaches around the world!
  • The money will go to patent attorneys, patent offices and overhead to help bring this recreational/sports product to water sports and recreational users.

Worldwide Market

The Bike Grip Board will be found in aquatic areas around the world and bring great satisfaction to it's users:

  • More fun in the pool, river and other aquatic areas.
  • More control and maneuverability riding the waves at the beach.



IF YOU CAN'T HELP WITH MONEY

If you can't help with money now please share this opportunity with others, especially those who enjoy water sports, swimming and recreational use of Boogie Boards. You can use the share buttons to share it with your friends and those who you think would be interested.  If you contribute and claim the perk you may leave your shipping information so that we can send promotional perks your way should you qualify for them.




Worldwide Representation: Gary Revel at Jongleur Marketing

Legal Counsel: Alan E. Kennedy
10751 South Saginaw Street, Suite G
Grand Blanc, Michigan 48439
(810) 771-7771
aekennedylaw@yahoo.com

Visit the Bike Grip Board Web Site to learn more: http://garyrevel.com/bd

Representation in India: Sachin Naik
Partner in Waterclicks.
http://www.waterclicks.com/

Legal Representation in India:
Anand Mahurkar
Krishna and Saurastri Associates
Phone: 91.20.65004296
Cell: 91.9765 988 023

Referenced US Patent # 5472362
Pictures, drawings, design details and notes Copyright © 2014 by William Dandurand: All Rights Reserved

story:
[Final Update, 11/3/11] Many, many thanks to everyone for your generosity and for how quickly you spread this fund drive! You've taken a random tragic event and transformed it into an overwhelmingly positive experience, and we hope that at some point we can repay you in kind. All our best,


Dan & David


[Update, 9/3/11: Our campaign met its goal, and in a really small amount of time! Contributions are still welcome and everything over the goal is treated in the same way by indiegogo, so if you feel like making a pledge please go right ahead. We set a fairly low goal on purpose, Dan could still use any help offered. Many thanks to the friends and family whose generosity has made this go so smoothly, we're really fortunate to have such great people in our lives. Dan now has a new address, email either of us if you'd like it. Thanks so much. David & Dan]

On Saturday, August 27th, Dan Friesen's apartment building went up in smoke. Just able to escape, he lost all belongings. While this was a blessing with regard to most of his wardrobe, he did not have renter's insurance and now faces the cost of reorganizing his life. (Some photos and a story from the Chicago Tribune are here and here.)

Look around you, wherever you are reading this, and imagine each item destroyed and in need of replacement. Tables and lamps, shoes and beloved books, winter clothes and photographs, all gone. Because we can help out so easily, by just pitching in a little bit, I started this campaign for my brother. For the cost of a meal or a few albums on itunes from each of us, Dan will be able to procure the amenities that we are surrounded by and so often take for granted.  

Dan needs practical items (towels, clothes, kitchenware, a beard trimmer--emphasis on beard trimmer) and whatever furniture he can afford. We're exceedingly grateful for any contributions received; and, in an idea we stole from NPR, if you give more than $30 we will send you a tote bag handprinted with Dan's face and the Fire Relief logo. Who could ask for more? (Just to clarify: though it looks like it on the screen, $30 is not the minimum contribution, any amount is welcome.)

Many thanks for taking the time to read this, and to those who contribute know that even a little means a great deal to us,

David & Dan Friesen

story:
The Scrubba wash bag will be a must-have item for travelers and campers, enabling them to travel clean, free and light.  The Scrubba wash bag weighs around 180g (6 oz) and is pocket-sized.   

The campaign is over, where can I get one?

The Scrubba wash bag is now available at our global website (www.thescrubba.com) or Australian website (www.thescrubba.com.au).

 

 

Is it more than just a bag?

I have received a few comments that "surely any bag can be used to wash your clothes with a bit of swishing".  While this may be true (given enough time), all other bags lack the Scrubba wash bag's flexible washboard.  Washboards have been around since the 1800s, and they work. What's more, they speed up how quickly and effectively you can wash your clothes.  As shown from the following link, you really only need rub an item of clothes across a traditional washboard 4-8 times (http://www.pioneerliving.net/washboard.htm).  This is the same with the Scrubba wash bag, 20-40 seconds rubbing is all it takes and, unlike a traditional washboard, you can easily slip it into your backpack.

 

Background and how to use the Scrubba wash bag

As an avid traveler, I spent a total of 8.5 months backpacking around the world with an early prototype of the Scrubba wash bag without spending a cent on laundry. Furthermore, as the Scrubba wash bag allowed me to do my laundry anywhere water was available, I was able to travel with only a few changes of clothing in a carry-on sized bag.  The Scrubba wash bag allowed me to travel clean, light and free.

The Scrubba wash bag results from the fusion of old and new technology, bringing the washboard into the 21st century.  Washboards have been around for centuries and they work!  However, washboards are cumbersome and still require a tub or large bucket to use effectively.  The Scrubba wash bag is the perfect solution for washing clothing while travelling or camping as the Scrubba wash bag includes a highly flexible washboard in a flexible waterproof housing.

To wash clothing, users simply need to:

  • add 2-4 litres of water, several items of clothing, a few drops of washing liquid (body wash or shampoo also works well);

  • seal the Scrubba wash bag;                                                       

  • expel air from the Scrubba wash bag through the valve;


   

 

  • place the Scrubba wash bag on a table or the floor;

 

  • rub the clothes against the flexible washboard from the outside of the Scrubba wash bag for 30 seconds to 3 minutes;


  

 

  • Empty the Scrubba wash bag

 

  • Rinse the clothing;

  • Hang the clothing to dry.

Your clothes can be cleaned in just a few minutes. 

 

 

Why you may want a Scrubba Wash Bag

 

As our slogan suggests: The Scrubba wash bag will allow you travel clean, light and free. 

CLEAN

  • As shown in the video, the Scrubba wash bag works quickly and effectively, meaning that not only do you smell and look clean, you have more time to spend enjoying your travels.

LIGHT 

 

  • The Scrubba wash bag will not be the straw that broke the camel's back.  It only weighs around 160g and because it provides you with the freedom to wash your clothes whenever you want, you simply don't need to carry as many clothes, allowing you travel lighter.

FREE 

 

 

  • With the Scrubba wash bag, you no longer need to pay for laundry.  In fact you no longer even need to find a laundry.  This can save you a lot of money, particularly if you are travelling through Europe where it not uncommon to pay €5-€10 (that is $6.50-$13) per load in a hostel.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread word about the Scrubba Wash Bag to friends and family who like to travel and visit and like our Facebook and Twitter pages by following the links below.

Other Information

Please note that Items are not shipped by registered post.  If you prefer to use registered post, please add $8 to the shipping cost.

Please also note that the gifts provided in return for your pledge are shipped from Australia.  The gifts shipped outside of Australia may be subject to import taxes, customs duties or other fees levied by the destination country (i.e. import fees). If import fees are payable, they are the responsibility of the gift receiver.  As import fees vary widely between countries, further information should be sought from the customs office in your resident country.

The Scrubba wash bag is an innovative product of Calibre8 Pty Ltd, produced under license.  Patent accepted in Australia and New Zealand.  Patent pending internationally.  The word Scrubba, the Scrubba logo, the slogan 'travel clean, light and free' and 'laundry is in the bag' are trade marks of Calibre8 Pty Ltd.

story:
Zeno Shirt is 100% made from natural, breathable cotton fibers. Thanks to exclusive Zeno technology, Zeno Shirt is Anti-Stain, Anti-Sweat, and Non-Iron. At the end of the day, you will feel as impeccable as you did in the morning.

 

In manufacturing this shirt, we use only the finest quality pure cotton, ensuring a premium product, exclusively made with the highest quality standards. Zeno shirt is the result of decades of experience in the textile industry and combines the traditional Italian design with the latest technology in textile research. A real revolution in the world of men’s fashion!

 

Taking care of your Zeno Shirt couldn’t be simpler. Just machine wash and dry (it dries super-fast -40% faster than a common cotton shirt). Since it is non-ironing, you are ready to wear your fresh-new Zeno Shirt.

 

Zeno Shirt is versatile and looks sharp, ideal for business attire or casual outfits. It is manufactured with pure cotton fabrics, fits perfectly, and is designed with extreme attention to details. Thanks to its natural stretch cotton fabric, the shirt is unbelievably comfortable and is ideal for a dynamic daily use.

 

Our investments in research and innovation are to ensure we are always the best, combining both technology and tradition. The Zeno Shirt: modern fabrics fused with Italian design, practical, elegant, unique and impeccable, practical, elegant, unique and impeccable.

 

We focused on the best threads and fabric selections. Twill is a soft fabric that features a distinctive diagonal weave design, perfect for a classic shirt like our White Twill shirt. Oxford fabric, thanks to its straight weave design, is ideal for casual shirts and is wonderful as you’ll find in our Sky Oxford and Striped Oxford shirts.

 

 

In the Press

Non-Iron and No-Stain technology make your Zeno Shirt as much a pleasure to own as it is to wear. Use a normal wash and brief drying cycle. Zeno Shirt does not require delicate care, hand-washing, dry-cleaning, or ironing. Zeno Shirt makes your life simpler and lets you look immaculate as you enjoy the free time previously spent on laundry.

 

 

Stop wasting your time and money washing or ironing. Enjoy your spare time with your family and your friends, without sacrificing the perfect look. Zeno Shirt is Earth-friendly. Washing and drying less reduces CO2 emissions and uses less water.

 

We sell directly to the consumer. No distributors, wholesalers, or retail stores. We’ve reduced the supply chain to offer you high quality, Italian design, and the best textile technology at an affordable price.

 

We focused on the best threads and fabric selections: Twill is a soft fabric that features a distinctive diagonal weave design, perfect for a classic shirt like our White Twill shirt. Oxford fabric, thanks to its straight weave design, is ideal for casual shirts and is wonderful as you’ll find in our Sky Oxford and Striped Oxford shirts.

 

2 Ply Premium Cotton: Zeno Shirt is crafted in a high premium two-ply cotton that provides a smoother touch and is 10 times more durable than normal cotton typically used in the industry.

 

 

 

 

 

REGULAR FIT

Classic and versatile, the Zeno Regular Fit Shirt projects dignity and refinement.

 

SLIM FIT

Modeled on your body, the elegant Zeno Slim Fit Shirt will always be comfortable.

 

How to back

 

 

About us

Our history began a long time ago. We have successfully operated in textile business for over 25 years, and still today we create every single shirt with the same love and care of the first one. The company was founded in the middle of the twentieth century in Rome, playing an important role in the history of the famous Italian tradition of high-quality clothing. Italy’s old tradition of world-class craftsmanship, rich culture and history of fashion are our daily inspiration for every new design project.

 

Risks & Challenges

Building on 25 years of experience in the textile and fashion industry, our launch of Zeno Shirt on Kickstarter is so we can present to the world this innovative product that breaks all the rules when it comes to shirts and fashion. We know our mission is challenging, and although we have carefully planned and prepared for launch, there inevitably may be some unexpected events ahead. We have anticipated potential risks and have developed contingency plans as well. 
Beginning with a solid business foundation and many years of industry experience, you can be confident in our ability to execute. In preparation for launching Zeno Shirt on Kickstarter, we have produced and tested dozens of samples. We have very close working relationships with the production lines in Turkey, and are continuously improving our processes and products. 
We have faith in the product we are introducing, confidence in our Kickstarter plan, and a history of reliable and on-time business operations. Our promise is to do what we have said and we will keep you informed on all progress and any unexpected events, both during the campaign and afterwards. 
Care instructions for Zeno Shirt: Most surface stains can be simply removed by gently cleaning with cold water on a damp cloth. If soil is rubbed into the fabric fibers, machine wash in cold water only. Following these instructions will provide long life of the exclusive Zeno treatment on your shirt.

In preparation for launching Zeno Shirt on Kickstarter, we have produced and tested dozens of samples. We have very close working relationships with the production lines in Turkey, and are continuously improving our processes and products. We have faith in the product we are introducing, confidence in our Kickstarter plan, and a history of reliable and on-time business operations. Our promise is to do what we have said and we will keep you informed on all progress and any unexpected events, both during the campaign and afterwards. Care instructions for Zeno Shirt: Most surface stains can be simply removed by gently cleaning with cold water on a damp cloth. If soil is rubbed into the fabric fibers, machine wash in cold water only. Following these instructions will provide long life of the exclusive Zeno treatment on your shirt.

story:
Sailing for a cause, sailing for passion, sailing for adventure.

Everyone yearns for an adventure, everyone.  Whether you are part of the adventure in person, in spirit or just watching said adventure from the safety of your home, you can find a reason to become interested.  I am one who craves to live the adventures first hand.  Not only that, but I want to share my experiences and my travels with the world whenever I can.  With that said, we cannot take the world and its people for granted.  Any chance I have to travel to remote areas of the globe, I try to interact with local communities and give back when I can.  Giving back or, "paying it forward," to the communities is, often times, more rewarding that the journey itself.  I expect this adventure to be rewarding in all aspects of life. 

Scott and I (Ryan Greenspan) are a professional paintball players who travel the globe competing in events and teaching training seminars.  We are also avid adventure seekers in our down time.  We recently took up sailing and we feel like we got the hang of it enough to take on a big trek.  We have explored several options in day trips and overnight trips around the San Diego area, but those haven't really kept our attention.  We want something bigger and better, something that will really test our savvy. 

We hatched the idea of sailing down to Los Cabos, Mexico with the original intent of sailing home right afterwards.  Then I decided that topping the trip off with more of a random act of kindness would be the ultimate end to an amazing journey.   I remembered hearing about the damage the hurricane caused to the tourism in Cabo, but the news never spoke much about the affect on local communities, especially the fishing communities.  Once we started hatching our great adventure, I did some research and thought it would be a great rewarding idea if we found somewhere to donate the boat when we got to Cabo.   After we discussed some options, and reached out to a few friends and charitable organizations in the area, we found a perfect match with the organization, Gente Joven por un Cambio(Young People for a Change)  who will meet us down in Mexico and guide us to the Fandango's new owners.  We know this is an endeavor we could do, but help would be needed!  This is where YOU come in!  Support from our friends, our family, our fans as well as our sponsors can make this adventure turn into a cause for good!

We are looking to raise funds in order to pay for necessary upgrades to the boat as well as supplies for the journey.  The boat, although fun, is not open ocean ready at the moment.  New lines, anchors and sail stitching are much needed. In addition, we have no working power system hooked up nor do we have navigational or radio equipment.  All of these items are imperative to a safe journey...  When we hit our goal we will implement new perks and goals in a way that we can help to give back more and more to the community.

Like I mentioned earlier, sharing the adventure is almost as exciting as living it. Not everyone can take a week off in an attempt to navigate the deserted Baja coast, so we plan to document and share every part of our journey with you.  We have the help of a videographer who is just as crazy as we are and jumped right on the opportunity to get on board.  I have documented several of my past trips around the world and this one is set to be the most difficult and challenging of them all!  With a myriad of unforeseeable variables to face and the experience of a lifetime we cannot wait to share this story with you and do something amazing for a local community!

Things we NEED!!! 

As described briefly, the boat is old and not in the greatest shape to make a voyage of this magnitude.  Safety is a concern and we want to make sure, for everyone's sake, that we make it down there as alive as possible.  For all of this to happen, here are some of the things that we need to make this trip successful:

  • The money we raise will go to the following equipment: GPS, Solar power system, power converter, repairing all electrical, boat lighting (nav lights), Depth finder, transducer, emergency VHF radios, anchors with proper chain and rhode, Marine batteries (4+), professional rigger inspection, sail repairs, new lines, Dinghy, food, water, cooking stove, gas, visas and other import and fishing permits, auto pilot (maybe), first aid kit, wind vane, emergency alert system, nav charts, insurance, camera equipment, ... The list will change slightly as we tighten things down and get our budgets sorted.
  • If we do not meet our goal, all of the money is returned right back to you!!

What can you do to help!?

We have put together some perks for you to help us attain our goals!  Here are a couple of our favorites!
UNRELEASED Planet Eclipse STARS and STRIPES LV 1.1!!  only one available!!

$1650 includes shipping anywhere in the world, Dynasty Signatures on the gun case, Signed Dynasty poster, spare parts, tool kit and *the ability to play beyond your capabilities*!!!  
*(results may vary)
CREW Dry Fit shirt!! 


For $60 you can become a member of the Crew in spirit!

Personalized Thank you via Twitter would look something like this for $20


 

Tentative Itinerary: 

JUNE 9-18/19 780 Nautical Miles Approx 7 days sailing 24hrs/day @4.5nph
JUNE 8: pack boat check all supplies
JUNE 9: 2am depart to Ensenada 70 NM (15.5 hours)
JUNE 10 Overnight in Ensenada to register boat with port authority and purchase visas and anything else we may have forgotten to pack.
JUNE 11: Depart Ensenada and last real civilization to Bahia Tortuga 290 NM (64.5 hours)
JUNE 13/14 Arrive Bahia Tortuga overnight (surf Isla Natividad/scorpion Bay)
JUNE 15/16: Depart to Bahia Santa maria 240 NM (53.5 hours)
JUNE 17/18 Arrive Bahia SM either overnight or continue to Cabo 180 NM. (40 hours)
JUNE 18/19 Arrive Los cabos and meet with project mexico and our new boat owners! Small fiesta to celebrate our conquest of the high seas!!

Risks

The biggest risk, which may be in the back of everyone's minds would be simple; are these guys going to make it!? I assure you that, in the interest of self preservation we will do our best.  The risks of open ocean sailing are many, but we will take every precaution necessary in order to make sure that the Fandango and her crew arrive safely to port.  Our goal is safety, fun and giving back!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can help us by getting the word out! PLEASE Share this page with your friends, family, or colleagues who you think would be interested.

Special Thanks to the Sponsors who have Jumped on Board!

story:
Quiver X is the Ultimate 3-in-1 Everyday Carry. Designed for the daily commuter, active gym-goer and frequent traveller in mind, its intuitive organization keeps your gym shoes, laptop and essentials just a zip away.

Featured In

Quiver X enables you to move seamlessly from place to place, from indoor to out, from work to play in just one pack. Carrying just a single bag for your life's activities has been our promise since our first Kickstarter campaign. We are committed to meeting that every single time. Always have, always will.

Packed with interior and exterior organisational pockets, dedicated compartments for both a laptop and tablet, plus a quick access card slot pocket with RFID protection, Quiver X is constructed to meet your everyday adventures.

 

Hear what others have to say: 

Whether you’re pitching in the field or the boardroom, we've got your back. Leave your dirty kicks in the large compartment and pull your laptop from the all-new laptop compartment, padded for extra protection.

Traveling is now an everyday affair. But with great traveling comes the need for great security. In New York City alone, the NYPD reported 3000 pickpocket incidents a month,with most cases going unreported. Each day, more than 400,000 pick pocketing incidentshappen around the world. 

The problem with existing anti-theft bags...

Imagine having to dial the same 3 digit code every time you open your bag for your laptop. And then again for your charging cables. And then again for your notebook if you forget it.

1. Time-wasting
2. Inaccessible to essentials
3. Frustrating for everyday usage

    In fact, as high as 50% of users reported not even using the locking functions of their bags for everyday usage. At BOW, we wanted to solve that. After thousands of emails, brainstorming and a whole lot of designing, we're proud to introduce Quiver X’s Auto-lock zip mechanism. 

    Want to lock your bags and secure your valuables? Just touch the zips together (yes, it's that magical!) 

     Want to unlock it? Just pull it to the side and voila.
     

    Quiver X VS Other Anti-theft Bags
     

    Suitable for travellers and daily commuters alike, the privacy pouch acts like a safe for your most valuable items ( passport, money, wedding ring…) against pickpockets and other potential threats.


    Showering after a hard run or a night in the office? Quiver X’s 180 shower compartment comes with dedicated pockets for your toiletries and clothes. Hook Quiver X on the shower door and grab what you need at a glance.



    Navigate your phone anytime, anywhere. Integrating a waterproof touch-sensitive fabric, Quiver X enables you to navigate your phone through the pocket – in the shower, or when your hands are grimy from the rock wall.

    With an enhanced lightweight material for the G hook, you can now switch between different styles effortlessly. No more switching bags when you travel or hop on your bike—one bag is all you need.


    Now, with an added luggage flap on days of long travels.

    Detachable Sternum straps are also included to ensure a more secure fit when you’re on the move.

     

    Infused with a DWR coating, Quiver X nylon fabric shields your valuables come rain or shine.


    At the end of a hot, sweaty summer, your pack does not smell like a bed of roses. Shoulder straps and back panels usually soak up as much of your sweat as possible. Before you know it, the bacteria outbreak from your carry releases a foul-smelling odor. 

    Washing your bag can severely harm the bag’s shape and material, and even mess up the zipper on the exterior.

    Through months of collaborating with a renowned Swiss company, we managed to come up with our own smell-proof technology. This antibacterial agent prevents any bacteria from latching on to Quiver X. 

    Now, your carry remains fresh smelling for your next meeting even after a heavy workout.

Autolock Zip Mechanism
 Want to unlock it? Just pull it to the side and voila.

Suitable for travellers and daily commuters alike, the privacy pouch acts like a safe for your most valuable items ( passport, money, wedding ring…) against pickpockets and other potential threats.

Touch-Sensitive Pouch
With an enhanced lightweight material for the G hook, you can now switch between different styles effortlessly. No more switching bags when you travel or hop on your bike—one bag is all you need.

Now, with an added luggage flap on days of long travels.
Slot easily into any luggage handle
Detachable Sternum straps are also included to ensure a more secure fit when you’re on the move.
 
Removable chest strap
Infused with a DWR coating, Quiver X nylon fabric shields your valuables come rain or shine.


At the end of a hot, sweaty summer, your pack does not smell like a bed of roses. Shoulder straps and back panels usually soak up as much of your sweat as possible. Before you know it, the bacteria outbreak from your carry releases a foul-smelling odor. 
Washing your bag can severely harm the bag’s shape and material, and even mess up the zipper on the exterior.

Through months of collaborating with a renowned Swiss company, we managed to come up with our own smell-proof technology. This antibacterial agent prevents any bacteria from latching on to Quiver X. 
Now, your carry remains fresh smelling for your next meeting even after a heavy workout.

story:
Wireless, We Mean It.

The headphone storage box can not only protects the headphones but also charges the headphones. At the same time, the charging case supports wireless charging. This is a product that truly uses wireless charge technology for both the case and the earbuds. Of course, don't worry if you don't have a wireless charger. The charging case can also be charged via the regular USB cable.

Never Run Out Of Juice

Fast charging, longtime play. How can a headset have no power in a fast-paced life? The 3000mAh charging case can charge the headphones 3 times. The fully-powered headset can support continuous use for 2.5 hours, and it only takes 1 hour to fully charge.

Born For Premium Sound Quality

Many wireless headsets only care about the wireless technology of the product and have not invested a lot of research and development in the sound quality. Although consumers feel the convenience of wireless technology, they have lost good sound quality.

These wireless earbuds use the new Bluetooth 5.0 module, high-definition and sensitive decoding technology, 6mm metal cavity full-frequency moving ring speaker unit. Throw away the cable, enjoy the wireless shocking stereo effect. You deserve the good sound quality, even it's a wireless one.

Noise Is The Worst

Advanced noise reduction technology helps you eliminate outside noise. Leave yourself a quiet world wherever you are. The headset uses a closed sound chamber with a high-definition microphone which gives you crystal clear vocals. Whether listening to songs or talking, it will bring you high-definition sound quality.

Smart Touch Technology

We are committed to providing a simple and efficient experience. The headset uses the latest smart touch technology, and all operations can be done with a simple touch. Control the sound as you like.

Can You Feel It?

The headset uses lightweight components. A single earphone weighs only 5g and the mini is hidden in the ear. You don't feel tired even if you wear it for a long time. Also, with our ergonomical design, it will fit all shape of ears.

Just Go Sweat

The headset is designed with a multi-step seal to achieve IPX4 waterproof grade. Supports outdoor activities in rainy days, and can effectively prevent rain from seeping in.

Never Let You Down

With the rapid development of wireless technology, more and more wireless devices appear in people's lives. Wireless headphones make us no longer troubled by the wire, whether it is for daily use or sports use.

Our goal is to deliver a reliable and high quality true wireless experience at an affordable price. We continue to improve our technology and we finally produced a wireless headset that combines multiple advantages. We are glad to let more people enjoy the convenient life brought by wireless technology.

Why Choose Us

The reason for the excellence is the perfection of the details. Both the outer casing and the earphones have been optimized for countless details. We have analyzed the shortcomings of the headphones from the standpoint of the user. All this is just to make you feel satisfied and comfortable.

Still hesitating? OSReviews will give you a full review!

 

This Package Includes

Risks and Challenges

We can guarantee that first shipment will go out no later than July 2019 if we successfully get funded. We are committed to meet your expectations without any possible delay in production or delivery. We rate the risk of unexpected delay as being very low.
