story_txt:
"A Telepresence Robot with a Gripping Arm? ORIGIBOT Is a Dream Come True""We may not have robots roaming the streets quite yet, but if the Origibot has anything to do with it, that will soon become a reality""the Origibot, a telepresence device that is not only functional, it’s affordable too."What is ORIGIBOT?ORIGIBOT is a fully robotic platform that pairs with your Android 
phone or tablet (running our free App) to become a complete telepresence
 solution.  You connect remotely to ORIGIBOT from anywhere in the world 
on most any device with an Internet connection (Android, iOS, Windows, 
Mac).  Since it uses WebRTC technology, the
 web interface is simple and light (doesn't require any additional 
plugins or java applets).  It's also fast and responsive with minimal 
lag over broadband connections.Not only do you have two-way audio and video, but also full control of 
the robotic platform, arm, and gripper.  How awesome is that?  A full 5 
degrees of freedom (including the robot base) to interact with the 
remote environment!By leveraging your existing device as its communications hub, display, 
and camera, we were able to create something awesome at a great price.  
Also, because its Android, this opens the door to unlimited applications
 and future enhancements from users and the community.Here are just some things ORIGIBOT can do:








Featured in:DESIGN:ORIGIBOT is made mostly of sleek aluminum extrusions.  Its minimalist design is all about functionality and strength.  The body and arms are just the right length to be unobtrusive while navigating, yet can reach from a few inches off the ground to just above most counters, door knobs, and refrigerator water dispensers.ORIGIBOT will ship with an updated tablet mount that will accommodate ANY android phone or tablet with up to a 10" display.  (Our prototype is carrying a 7" Samsung galaxy tab 3 )



ABS plastic parts were carefully designed for 3D Printing, easy updates, and modifications.  All design files will be made available to contributors.ORIGIBOT's gripper opens to 7.8 cm with a recess to accommodate cans, bottles, and cups.

Motorized wheels are mounted at the optimum location to provide great stability even when carrying payloads.



Standard T-Slot extrusions provide incredible strength and easy customization.
Control:Simple controls via our secure app make controlling ORIGIBOT child's play.  Simply login from any device running Firefox or Chrome browser (supporting WebRTC) and access your ORIGIBOT.  The intuitive joystick control makes maneuvering ORIGIBOT as easy as playing an arcade game: control the base 
forward, backward, turn left, turn right, and stop.  Sliders control 
movements for the Neck, Arm, Wrist and Gripper.  Tilt the neck forward 
and backward to get a better view of the environment.  Lift the arm up 
and down, then turn the wrist to get just the right position.  Open and 
close the gripper to grasp or release.Fully hackable...
ORIGIBOT was built from the ground up using off-the-shelf components including standard and high-torque hobby servos, standard T-Slot aluminum framing, and an Arduino for control.  All custom components are 3D Printed and .stl files will be available for download so you can modify and print replacements yourself.  Its Arduino sketch will also be available so you can add custom commands and tweak parameters yourself.  The ORIGIBOT forum will become a community where fellow enthusiasts can share and collaborate on ideas and enhancements.


What can ORIGIBOT do?(What can I do with ORIGIBOT)?

Unlock a deadbolt                              Open a door
Get water from the fridge                Fill your pet's bowl
Bring Grandma her meds                    Water your plantsRetrieve the remotePatrol your home/officeJoin in on events while awayTurn on/off lights and appliances???


*Please note that this is an experimental robot and cannot be relied upon to 
provide care to any people or pets!What the ORIGIBOT can do is only limited by your imagination (and its hardware of course). Power/Battery:Included NiMh batteries provide about 8 hours of standby time with moderate use.  The included charger will safely recharge the batteries in under 4 hours.  Batteries do not suffer from "memory" and will recharge over 1000 cycles.Development/Prototyping...
 We went through countless iterations of robots - constantly tweaking the 
proportions to maximize stability, range of motion, and ease of maneuverability.  Our final design 
stands just under 1m (38") H with a base of just 32cm W x 35.5cm L (12.5" x 14").  This allows it to 
easily traverse even the most confined
of spaces with the perfect reach just just over standard kitchen counters and door knobs/dead 
bolts.  Although it looks top heavy, you can see in the video that it is extremely stable even at 
full extension and payload.  This is due to a very low center of gravity and hefty mass of 3.35kg (7.4lbs) centered near the rear of the robot.



(Special thanks to Makeblock.cc for their awesome robot construction kit!)We custom designed our own gripper with 
just the right balance of cost/size/function.  Our gripper opens wide enough to grab a cup or can of soda and has a unique 
curved shape to get a good grip on whatever you're carrying.
While we made sure to source only standard components 
wherever possible, custom parts were designed for 3D printing.  We printed hundreds of parts while constantly testing & tweaking until we got it 
right.Thanks heavens for RepRap (and Printrbot)!
We ended up with a robust robotic platform made entirely of strong aluminum framing and 3D printed ABS parts.

Our Arduino firmware will be available for download so you can modify it as you 
wish.

Why Indiegogo?
Over the past year, we have made many prototypes and much progress... Now we have a working design that has been tweaked and tested.  We need your help to bring ORIGIBOT to market by bringing manufacturing costs down.  Larger quantity buys and streamlined assembly processes are only possible at the larger volumes made possible by your support!
Can't/don't want to contribute but still think the ORIGIBOT is awesome?  Please help us by spreading the word to all your friends and family!Who are you people anyway?We are makers and doers... We are Engineers and Scientists who love technology, but not just for technology sake.  With backgrounds in Electrical and Computer Engineering, Software Development, and Product Design and Manufacturing, we are well positioned to make this project a success!
 What We Need & What You GetOur campaign goal is just high enough to unlock volume savings with quantities just large enough to make mass assembly feasible.  Every contribution counts and we appreciate every one!  We are offering some great perks for robot enthusiasts at EVERY level:











Production Plan



Risks & Challenges
We have minimized risk by sourcing ONLY standard and 3D Printable parts. Further, we have developed several prototypes and have a fully functional, tested version as you see in the video.  We also have working software and apps.  All we need is to ramp up our order quantities and tweak and refine our UI.

story:
"Are you serious? Why would you need a carabiner this big?" David M.

"I don't think anything about this is reasonable" John D.

Hi, we're Polar Metals. We raised $8,000 with our original 1-piece carabiner. Now we're back with one that's 10x bigger. 

If you're ready for the most ridiculously large piece of titanium ever designed for personal use, keep reading. 

Yeah, it's as big as your hand. No springs or levers to break, lose or wear out.

Why do I need a Bad Ass carabiner? 

Because you are badass. If you love the plastic or aluminum stuff everybody else does, this is not for you. If you want to completely change the game and go big with 64 grams of Aircraft-grade Titanium, keep reading.

This cheap aluminum carabiner broke out of fear. The Bad Ass is that intimidating

 A Single Piece Design

EDM construction from a single piece of Titanium without any complicated parts. It's literally a single piece of Grade 5 Titanium.

No springs or levers, it's open or closed with its own metallic tension.

Solid 6AL4V grade 5 aircraft titanium.

It's cut with a thin, electrically charged wire.

You can grip this monster with your whole hand.

Why is Titanium?

  • The highest strength-to-density ratio of any element
  • Widely used in the aerospace industry
  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body 
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength 
  • Resistance to corrosion: nearly equivalent to platinum 

Simple. Strong. Impressive.

If you have bunch of kettle bells laying around you want to snap together, the Bad Ass is perfect.

Yes, try this if you can stand the bad-assery.

Carrying 20lbs of tools on your hip? Look Bad Ass doing it.

If you need to clip a giant dog in place, try the Bad Ass!

Hold up a punching bag? Sure, why not?

Want to live in a tree pod? Bad Ass to the rescue!

How is it made?

We Mocked up a reasonably-sized carabiner, then 10x'd the size.

Specifications

Holy Crap! (120*60.5*6mm). 64 grams of solid aerospace grade Titanium!

Pledge today to help us make the Polar Bad Ass Carabiner a reality!

story:
The Power of One was created to solve a simple human need: somewhere to sit. While creating our water resistant, dynamic pack we came across another issue facing the 21st Century Outdoor Enthusiast: the reliance on our electronic gear to do everything from take a photo to finding directions to starting a fire. That’s why we created an interchangeable, solar and handy set that is built for adventures big and small- simply keep the entire set together for an impromptu day trip or mix and match for the day at hand. 

 

 

 

 

 

As a business, we are devoted to two things: redefining the outdoor industry with efficient, interchangeable sets of gear and conserving the wildlife that inspires adventure. Our one-for-one business model dedicates one square foot of wilderness land for every dollar spent on our gear. You Spend one, we Gaard One!

As a company, Gaard One is dedicated to making an impact on the wilderness land that inspires our adventures. As a company, we have established a Land Conservation Advisory Board made up of some of Minnesota’s premier game-changers in conservation. 

At the culmination of our campaign the amount of funds raised through Gaard One will be taken by The Gaardians and matched to the most relevant, current projects in need and the organizations that are working to protect that land.  

 

Water repellant pack with lightweight aluminum base frame & fold out stool  

  • 35L, 7.2lbs 
  • 8 Exterior pouches and pockets with water resistant zippers 
  • 5 Interior pockets 
  • 1 Insulated side pocket

Dimensions with the stool collapsed (when wearing):

  • Height: 20"
  • Width: 17"
  • Depth: 14"

Dimensions with tool folded out:

  • Height: 19"
  • Width: 10"
  • Depth: 12"

11-watt detachable solar panel with USB port  

  • Length: 22" 
  • Width: 7.5"

2 Clip-on LED lights 

  • USB charged 
  • Interchangeable with any 1" inch strap 

16,800 mAH Power Bank 

  • Dimensions/weight 
  • 4 USB ports 
  • 12-volt vehicle jumpstarter 
  • Compass 
  • SOS flashing/warning lights  
  • Electronic lighter 
  • Safety belt knife 
  • Emergency escape tool  
  • Universal charger adaptor set 

Certificate of conservation efforts 

  • YOU helped conserve land for generations to come

 

Check out all the packs already in production! 

 

 

You already explored this far, why stop now?! While you might not be able to support us with a pledge, you can always help us spread the word on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and anywhere else you can think of!  

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make our mission to protect land come to life!

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We created this campaign to launch our brand and establish the Gaard One tribe by getting you an entire modular, handy set of gear for a killer price. The good news? Our packs and multi-tools are already in production- that means we have gone through the prototype stage, troubleshooting and modifications for V1! However, to get you the pièce de résistance- our interchangeable LED, USB charged light clips, we will need to purchase a mold (no more 3D Printing!) and get it to our tried and trusted manufacturer. Who woulda thought the tiniest add on would be the biggest investment?! To be real, we already made it through the riskiest part pre-launch, so now we just need YOU.

What is the volume of the backpack?

The full backpack measures in at 35 Liters.

How heavy is the backpack?

The backpack and solar panel weigh 7.2lbs.

What is the weight capacity of the stool?

Our stool holds more than 350lbs without issue.

Is the backpack waterproof?

While our zippers are waterproof, the overall pack is water resistant.

Is the backpack comfortable?

The backpack is fitted with a sternum strap for comfort and stability, and includes a padded/adjustable strap system & hip belt designed to ease your load.

Is the solar panel detachable?

Not only is the solar panel detachable, but it clips to the backpack in two separate ways so you can use it while it’s on your back or hang it over the stool when it’s not.

When will I get my gear?

We will be shipping full sets of gear in October 2018!

How is each dollar conserving one square foot of land?

Check out our impact page at www.gaardone.com/impact to learn more about our mission to conserve land with each dollar spent on our gear.

What are the dimensions of the pack?

Stool folded in: H20inxW14inxD17in

Stool folded out: H19inxW10inxD12in

What are the dimensions of the solar panel?

Unfolded: H22inxW7.5in

Folded: H7.5inxW7.5in

story:
6 wonderful people, 6 different positions, 6 amazing talents is what creates the RankStar team. None of us working, 6 of us doing, developing, creating and using years of experience to give you an app that will REDEFINE AN ENTIRE MARKET! 

Recommendation was, is and forever will be the best advertisement ever and your contribution will help make RankStar community the largest recommendation community in the world! Period! 

What We Need & What You Get

80% of the contributions will go into development and the rest will go into marketing so that we can make RankStar even cooler and more useful than it is now. We will bring stuff like 10 second video recommendation with filters, we will enable for you to filter what only women or only men recommend. You will be able to see what is most recommended by locals and what is most recommended by tourists. You will also be able to see what people of certain age recommend and you will be able to let your friends know that you don't recommend a certain place.   

What you get?

With contribution you will achieve higher status (Ranker, CoolKid, RankSetter or Muse) which will make you a more influential "recommender" and you will always be able to say that you saw potential in this before the rest of the world did!

If we don't reach our goal we will still use the funds we get to develop, design, market and grow. 

 

The Impact

 

  • This app will change the way people think when it comes to looking for good businesses!
  • Over 5000 users in few months with our current version
  • More than 60.000 given recommendations to businesses worldwide!

Risks & Challenges

We are entering into an existing market with some badass players so our job is to redefine this market and make people see that RankStar is faster, simpler and more fun and it's users and contributors are more trustworthy.  

But we will strive to make RankStar the "sexiest" app in this field and with that we will make it for users to feel good when they recommend and share those recommendations with their friends and family.

Step by step, user by user, share by share, recommendation by recommendation, city by city. Hard work, devotion, creativity and persistence with a dash of "don't stop".

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Simply download our app, use it, invite your friends, recommend & share and let us know how we can make it even better for you.

story:
Dave Thomas and Bill Davis have untaken the task of recreating the City of Burbank Streamliner lost in a crash in 1955. The City of Burbank Streamliner was one of the first "home built" land speed cars to set national and international speed records in the 1950s 

We are looking for $5000.00 in this campaign to help us build the unique fiberglass body for the streamliner. Participants will recieve various perks comenserate with their contribution.

This racing car represents a significant part of U.S. land speed racing history as well as the early days of hot rodding in America. We are hoping to celebrate the 60 year anniversary of the City of Burbank Streamliner by returning and running again at the Bonneville Salt Flats this August.

Sperad the word to your friends, that's how this works/ No contribution is too small and every contribution will be acknowledged. Help us get this project done.

See more about the project at www.bonneville2012.com 

Ffollow us on Facebook at Hill Davis

story:
Being in a hammock is awesome and setting up the perfect group hang just got a whole lot easier. 

Introducing the Tree-O Hammock Frame:

  • Hang together… every time… 

  • In places you couldn’t hang before

  • With a consistency you couldn’t count on before.

Hammocking as a group has always been an exciting idea and sounds like the perfect activity.

But it’s not always easy to find a group of trees with 15 foot spreads in the prime location we want.

Until now group hammocking would often mean being spread out and separated, or being stacked on top of each other. 

We can’t control where the trees grow but, we can adapt and better our chances at consistently setting up the perfect hang.  Having this versatility just takes the right equipment.

The Tree-O Hammock Frame is the answer. 

It can be set up between trees that are up to 30 feet apart and in any configuration. 

Just wrap the tree straps around the trees at about 6 feet high and then connect to the Drings on the frame, pull it tight, and tie it off so it doesn’t slip.

Once you have it set up all you have to do is click your hammocks on and you’re done. 

Just choose the loops that will give you the perfect amount of sag

No need for individual tree straps. 

You can hang side by side or in a triangle.

You can attach gear to the frame like a pack or a lantern.

If you want to tarp it you can tarp it with one tarp to cover everybody. 

If you’re headed out for a solo hang you can detach one of the frame straps and take the Tree-O versatility with you and hang where no one has hung before.

The Tree-O hammock frame makes the impossible hang possible. Never again will you have to walk out the door worrying that you might not find a place to hammock together. 


Patent Pending




The Tree-O takes hammock stacking to a whole nother level! This is what we call a Tree-O double stack with a Treble Hammock at the base.




Treble Hammock

First ever hammock including patented ergonomic support and

design. The Treble Hammock is more comfortable, more durable, and far

more versatile than any other hammock ever created. Multiple easy to do

configurations to suit your desired seated, reclined, or sleeping position for one or

two persons.

story:
1.Meet ET Mini

ET Mini is the world's first all-in-one, portable wireless entertainment system, featuring DLP  projection technology, wireless operation, and crystal-clear 360° audio sound. Enjoy a 120 inch big screen everywhere with the world's smallest body.

 

ET Mini was named "2017 Amazing technology" by THE HUFFINGTON POST

ET Mini was named "5 Portable Technology Solutions That Will Rock 2017!" By THE NEXT WEB

ET Mini has named "staff favorites products of 2017 among tens of thousands of projects" by BACKERKIT

ET Mini went viral:

 

30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the ET Mini community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who love movie and music! If you done the sharing, we will send you the free car charger. Click here to send us your shared link to redeem a free car charger no matter you are backer or not! IT IS FREE! HELPING ET MINI, TELL THE WORLD!

 

 

 

2.What Can I Do with ET Mini

The Unlimited Experience:

With its unique design, its projection angle can be adjusted from 0° to 90° to provide any viewing angle you like. 

1.Stream content/screen from your network drive,your smartphone,your tablet, your PC and more, build a big screen everywhere .

2.Bring more fun when you are traveling with your family!

World's Lightest entertainment system 

Extremely lightweight:With its compact design and high-capacity rechargeable battery, it can be easily fit into your backpack or handbag so you can take it with you wherever you go.

Small body but big power

3.Build a Home theater in your backyard! Enjoy 120 inch big screen!

 This is what it looks like as a 120 Inch big screen project from ET Mini, build a IMAX Cinema anywhere with ET Mini:

Check out the 120 inch big screen demo video here

Unlimited Power

The first device support powerbank, charging while running 

4.Project videos from your device when cooking in the kitchen.

5.Watch TV on your bedroom ceiling.

6.Mirror your devices for stunning presentations.

7.Project games from your phone , iPad or computer, enjoy 120 inch big screen game experience everywhere.

ET Mini is also a 2-channel Stereo Bluetooth water-proof speaker with crystal-clear 360° audio sound technology

8.Use it as a high performance speaker only, use it as a HD microphone (Stretch goal) only.

9.Live Streaming from your phone, your camera, your PC and put it into ET Mini 120 inch big screen everywhere.

These are just a few of the many possibilities for having fun with your ET Mini!

ET Mini Supports wireless screen mirroring for both IOS and Android. Displays up to 120 inches. It also supports Wi-Fi connectivity for online videos, games, etc.

Dual, built-in 4W speakers provide powerful, crystal-clear sound quality without the need for costly external speaker.

3.Why ET Mini is amazing!

  • DLP projection technology which has brighter projection than normal LCOS to provide higher resolution, sharper pictures and more vibrant color.
  • The energy-efficient battery lasts up to two and a half hours for video display on a single charge.
  •  ET Mini supports Airplay, Miracast and DLNA to wirelessly mirror your devices.
  •  Built-in Bluetooth speakers eliminate the need for external, hard-wired connections to provide crystal clear, 360° sound.

ET Mini’s all-in-one, user-friendly projection system and simple operating interface make for an excellent user experience. Signal transmission can be accomplishied in three different ways: wireless, HDMI and micro SD.

With its unique design, ET Mini can be folded up to fit into your backpack or handbag, plus the viewing angle can be adjusted from 0° to 90° to accommodate your favorite viewing position.

Super portable! Take it with you anytime and anywhere you like!

What is DLP?

 DLP Mico-projector technology provides brilliant, vibrant color and exceptional HD images.

 Check out some stunning footage of ET Mini, How great it is!

Exciting game experience

 

·Specification

4.How ET Mini changes their life?

AcTek ET Mini caused a sensation in the CES 2017 ,Las Vegas(The World's biggest tech show)

 (*Lifetime warranty is for indiegogo backer only,after campaign reverse back to limited time warranty, hurry up to pledge before campaign end)

Because of the sterile land, attitude and inconvenient transportation, economic development is very slow in some remote mountain areas in China's Yunnan Province. A lot of families have been on the dole for a long time. Children in these areas learn in the schools which are poorly-equipped, lack of study materials and funds, while children in big cities go to some progressive schools. This reality about these poor children aches us. We plan to do our part to give financial aid to them to finish school. And we sincerely hope that more and more people on Indiegogo will support our plan.​

 

Most children do not watch movie or video before, the special ET Mini will including some great movie, music,science documentary and multi-media course inside, as a souvenir of the campaign on Indiegogo ET Mini will help them, your love will change their life forever.

Join us now!

 

 

 

 ·Design and Development

In 2015, after an extensive review of available projector products, we decided to develop a new projector technology. We felt that all of the projectors on the market at the time were too bulky and most required a separate, external speaker to provide acceptable sound. At the time, we already had developed a superior wireless speaker product that our customers loved, so it just made sense to combine our speaker with a state-of-the-art micro projector system to create a high-performance, wireless, portable home theater system.

Can you imagine? The final face to ET Mini was came from Vader, the famous dark warrior.

·Timeline

Some Sample we created for ET Mini Review and CES 2017:

 

·Why we need you

The motivation of the AcTek team desires from our passion to bring our new ideas to our customers. If you like the ideas behind ET Mini, please support us on indiegogo. With your support, we can have the confidence and budget to bring it into mass production. We welcome any suggestions or new product ideas from you. Please contact us at any time. In the future, there may be a product named by you!

·Team 

 Don't forget your free reward!

30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the ET Mini community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who love movie and music! If you done the sharing, we will send you the free car charger. Click here to send us your shared link to redeem a free car charger no matter you are backer or not! IT IS FREE! HELPING ET MINI, TELL THE WORLD!

story:
WHY WE START THIS PROJECT

People love outdoor barbecuing. It is fun and enjoyable for everyone, but the storage, transportation, and cleanup process with normal equipment is dreadful. Campers, for example, require people to store and transport heavy equipment. BISON, in its compact and highly transportable structure allows you to bring an essential cooking platform to enhance your overall outdoor experience. With BISON’s proprietary BBQ grill design that is easy to clean and allows for simple yet flavorful cooking, you are able to cook high quality food for everyone.

 ABOUT PRODUCT

The BISON Rolling Grill is made for backpacking campers and outdoor enthusiasts. This unique design allows you to roll up the grill into a compact size (from 250 mm 9.85 in x 300 mm 11.8 in to 50 mm 1.97 in x 300 mm 11.8 in). Set up is easy and intuitive; you can start barbecuing in less than a minute. The Rolling Grill Set also includes a size-adjustable stake stand for campfire setups that makes it easy to increase desired heat levels.

Fun and intuitive design for BBQing.

Set up on the ground or on public grills for cleaner grilling.​

You do not have to spend time and energy cleaning a dirty grill when you can easily place the BISON Rolling Grill on top of an existing grill structure.

Aluminum & Hard Anodizing

Durable yet light-weight aluminum construction and superior non-stick Teflon® coat provides long lasting performance for your outdoor grill experience.

The Whole package includes 1) a rolling grill 2) a grill guard 3) stake stand and 4) a sack. The package weighs less than 1.2 pounds / 0.55 kg. The Grill’s non-stick hard anodized coating offers hassle-free cleaning, and it is also dishwasher safe. The Rolling Grill will become one of your must-haves for any outdoor experience.

The air fusion-hollowed grill prevents burn marks that produce heterocyclic amines (HCAs) and polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) on your food, which improves the quality of your food and allows for healthy consumption.

  SPECIFICATION

Timeline

 Promotional gifts

Thank you for attention.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100015979363921

 www.bisongears.com

Risks and challenges

Engineering 
Hard anodizing provides excellent chemical resistance, low friction and excellent non-stick properties. We are contacting 3rd companies to increase its resistance and prevent abrasion. We are currently working with several coating companies and cooking ware manufacturing companies to increase its quality.

Mass Production 
Outdoor season is very close! We are working with local prototype makers and manufacture to meet the delivery date (25th of August). The first production goal is 2,000 pcs. Our 20+ years in design and manufacturing experience, will enable our head designer to oversee a successful production to meet our goal on time.

What’s Future

With your support on this project, we are planning to develop the future of the outdoor cooking experience. Your supports on this project lead us to our next phase of innovation. We would also love to hear your voice and include your ideas into future work. Please feel free to contact us with your opinions, concerns, and ideas! We look forward to hearing from you.

story:
Ciao! And welcome to my Indiegogo page! As many of you may know, I will be studying abroad in Italy with my University this Summer for 6 weeks! I am so excited, and feel incredibly honored to have been able to receive a few scholarships to help pay for this trip. With that being said, Europe can be expensive for the average college student, and so to help pay for some leftover expenses, I decided to create this funding page. By donating, you not only will help by contributing to this incredible experience I'm about to embark on, but you'll also receive something in return! 

For those of you who don't know, I am a Bachelor of Fine Arts in Photography Major at the University of North Florida. I'm originally from Miami, and love to travel and take photos along the way. I decided Photography was my one true passion, and wanted to be able to study it and better my photographical skills in a learning environment. 

The Perks

Every donor will receive a "perk" in return who purchases one, no matter how small the contribution! Look to the right of this page to purchase a perk. 

*Note* you can still donate to this cause without purchasing a perk, but receiving something in return is half the fun!

Itinerary 

The first two weeks of the trip will be spent traveling through Florence, Naples and Massa Marittima. The last four weeks will be spent in Rome and I will be staying at St. Johns University. 

This trip is my once in a life time opportunity to further my education in a new culture. I feel incredibly honored to have this opportunity, and to be doing and studying what I love. 

Thanks for reading! 

- Christina

The Perks


Every donor will receive a "perk" in return who purchases one, no matter how small the contribution! Look to the right of this page to purchase a perk. 
*Note* you can still donate to this cause without purchasing a perk, but receiving something in return is half the fun!
Itinerary 
The first two weeks of the trip will be spent traveling through Florence, Naples and Massa Marittima. The last four weeks will be spent in Rome and I will be staying at St. Johns University. 

This trip is my once in a life time opportunity to further my education in a new culture. I feel incredibly honored to have this opportunity, and to be doing and studying what I love. 
Thanks for reading! 
- Christina

story:
NOW SHIPPING!

Rain is the number one reason why peoples' commute is often a problem. We thought we had to do something!

No one should have to avoid going out because of something as minor as a little bit of rain, and we are set on reducing the number of people who do so.

To take on the challenge, we have designed VEAR, a sleek and stylish, eco-friendly pair of rain pants that zip up on your body just like a jacket does.

VEAR Legs Jacket is loaded with features that will keep you comfortable, dry, and safe on your outdoor trips, so you can arrive at your destination in style!

This is not a computer-generated image. It is a real shot of the product in a professional studio

Golf, mountain biking, hiking, motorcycling or pretty much any rainy outdoors activity.

VEAR Legs Jacket was inspired by the Scandinavian weather. This outdoor product is made to last and withstand harsh weather conditions. With VEAR, rain will never stop you from going out again!

VEAR Legs Jacket is packed with different features that will keep you dry and comfortable, and also add durability, so it stays in perfect condition for a long time.

 

 

WATERPROOF, WINDPROOF & BREATHABLE

Waterproof and windproof, yet still breathable rain pants, giving you that level of comfort you’re looking for. 

The pants come in two versions - made with a standard type of fabric -good for everyday use in light rain showers, and a high-performance fabric from Sympatex - more durable and best for activities in heavy rains and that require more physical effort; and it also comes with waterproof side zippers.

Both fabrics are waterproof, windproof, and breathable but the fabrics' specifications differ from one another.

EASY TO PUT ON & TAKE OFF

​

Easy on, easy off: forget stretching and removing shoes. This unique design allows you to transition from road to office in seconds!

 Cool, right?!

Below we made a table to show you how much more efficient you are by using our pants. The "normal pants" times were measured including the time it takes to put on and remove the shoes.

LIGHTWEIGHT & EASY TO STORE AND CARRY

The back pocket is magic! It doubles as a sack, with a double sided zipper so you can pack the pants inside (in less than 30 seconds). Use the carabiner hook to attach it to your bike or simply put it in your backpack.

DURABLE 

Made to last you a lifetime - VEAR Legs Jacket is manufactured only with premium materials such as YKK zippers - known to be among the best in the world.

The pants are seam taped so the water doesn't penetrate the seams. They are also reinforced at the knee level, where you need it most. Crafted for strength and made to last.

WATERPROOF FRONT POCKETS

REFLECTIVE FEATURES

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The special black reflective patterns allow you to look cool during the day and stay safe at night! They are made with tiny glass beads that reflect light back to its source.

SHOE PROTECTOR

ADJUSTABLE WAIST STRAPS

VEAR Legs Jacket gives your waistline a little bit of leeway during the holiday season. So, go ahead, have that extra piece of Aunt Betty’s pumpkin pie!

SLIM DESIGN

Not only is the tapered-leg sleek and stylish, it is essential to help keep your feet and socks dry and also prevent your pants from getting stuck in the bicycle chain.

ECO-FRIENDLY

At VEAR we believe in sustainable production. This translates to our rain products as well, and you’ll find that the label in every pair proves it.

VEAR Legs Jackets are manufactured with sustainability in mind. We will try to minimize the impact on the environment in the process.

“Today's linear ‘take, make, dispose’ economic model relies on large quantities of cheap, easily accessible materials and energy, and is a model that is reaching its physical limits. A circular economy is an attractive and viable alternative that businesses have already started exploring today” – Ellen MacArtur Foundation

This is what VEAR stands for! We want to close the loop and be pioneers in the transition towards a circular economy.

If you don’t need your product anymore, send it back to us with the sustainability label in place, and we’ll refurbish it or transform it into something else, protecting the environment further. We’ll also give you a 10% discount on your next purchase if you do. Fair enough?!

Although we do not have a direct competitor that would encompass all the features our product has, from a technical point of view our product is comparable to high-end brands.

   

 We'd appreciate a lot if you'd share this with your friends! Don't let them miss this one!

EXCHANGE POLICY: If you follow the sizing chart carefully, the rain pants should suit you well. Still, if you wish to exchange your product for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you’ll have to pay for the shipping both ways. Due to the fact that we are offering the products at highly discounted prices on Kickstarter, we will not be able to accept returns.

After successfully ending the Kickstarter funding period, we will take our final version of the product and start production.

Most of the money we are asking for will go for serial production; additionally, some of the proceeds will go towards shipping, packaging, taxes etc.

We are working with experienced manufacturers and this is the timeline they informed us about: 400 to 1000 items can be manufactured in 15 to 20 working days, but the custom YKK zippers require an additional 10 days to a total of 38 days. 

It usually takes two weeks for Kickstarter to release the funds after the campaign ends, therefore we will be able to place the order at the beginning of January 2017 and we already discussed with our manufacturer to reserve the time for us, so they can start production right away. 

One thing we must also consider is the fact that from Jan. 26th to Feb. 5th is Chinese New Year and factories will not work in that period, therefore another 12 days will add to that 38. We concluded that by 20th of February 2017 the factory will deliver the items and we can start shipping.

Any problems shall arise, we also have backup manufacturers and they can deliver by the end of March.

We are passionate about cycling, a healthy and sustainable method of transportation. Our goal is to get more people to cycle more often, regardless of the climate. To do so, we want to make cycling easy, safe and more enjoyable by tackling the consumer problems related to cycling.

How was this product born?

“I moved to Denmark where I encountered terrible weather (a lot of wind and rain), so I had to buy a pair of rain pants. I found the one I bought very hard to use: difficult to put on, difficult to take off. If your shoes are dirty then you have to take your shoes off before taking off your pants. It is very annoying and can be a real hassle!I searched endlessly for a product that would solve this problem but couldn’t find anything so I made my own – now I wear them every time it rains! People saw mine and asked me where they could get a pair of their own, so now we’re on Kickstarter…“ – Valentin

Follow us and get in touch! Also, don't forget to share!

Feel free to add any questions you may have, we are happy to help!

 

SHIPPING, CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION

We have backers from all over the world and in order to avoid logistic problems, we will ship all orders from our manufacturing location in China.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other taxes but the package will be marked as gift. In most countries, you will not need to pay any taxes when marked as gift, but we advise you to check with your local authorities. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address, moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to China, you will have to pay for shipping both ways if you want us to re-send your product.

When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package.

story:
Der Kaisermarsch - zu Fuß durch Deutschland und zu Gast bei dir!

Ich möchte Deutschland besuchen. Im August wandere ich von der Ostsee bis in den Breisgau und lerne dabei Landschaften und Städte kennen, plaudere mit den Menschen über das Land, die Leute, die Literatur, und dabei filme, fotografiere und notiere ich meine Erlebnisse. Ich übernachte bei jedem, der mich aufnimmt, und wandere mit jedem, der mich begleiten will.

Ich reise preiswert und leicht. Zu Fuß, bisweilen per Anhalter, vielleicht mit Fernbus und Regionalbahn. Doch wer spenden oder Werbung schalten will, kann das gerne hier tun. Das gesammelte Geld geht vollständig an die Valerian Arsène Verny Literaturstiftung in Berlin.

 

Was du bekommst

Als Unterstützer bist du live bei jeder Station dabei und kannst das Abenteuer hautnah miterleben.  Auf Facebook, auf meinem Youtube-Kanal KaiserTV, auf Instagram und auf meinem Blog.

Im Anschluss an die Wanderung entsteht eine Dokumentation, die die schönsten und spannendsten Momente noch einmal zusammenfasst - als Unterstützer wirst du im Abspann namentlich genannt!

Zudem möchte ich ein Buch über meine Erlebnisse auf der Reise schreiben. Unterstützer bekommen ein Freiexemplar mit persönlicher Widmung und werden in der Danksagung als diejenigen, die alles möglich gemacht haben, erwähnt!

(Natürlich nur, wenn es dir recht ist.)

 

Bestandteile der Reise

  • ich gehe von Schleswig bis Freiburg im Breisgau - die jeweilige Standorte werden auf facebook und auf kaisermarsch.wordpress.com regelmäßig mit Fotos, Videos und Texten aktualisiert.
  • ich spreche mit den Menschen, die ich unterwegs treffe: Wer sind sie, was bewegt sie, wie geht es ihnen persönlich. Wie sehen sie Deutschland zurzeit, was ärgert sie, was wünschen sie sich für die Zukunft.
  • an jeder Etappe möchte ich einen Buchladen besuchen und mit den Inhabern sprechen. Als Gastgeschenk möchte ich jedem gerne ein Buch bringen, daher frage ich die Buchhändler/innen nach ihrer ganz persönlichen Empfehlung. Alle Literaturtipps werden dann zusammengestellt und ergeben ein kleines Panorama des Buchlebens in diesem Sommer in Deutschland
  • ich filme alles und stelle täglich Videos auf Youtube, Facebook und Instagram
 

Dein Geld

Wie gesagt: Ich reise preiswert und leicht. Zu Fuß, bisweilen per Anhalter, vielleicht mit Fernbus und Regionalbahn. Doch wer spenden oder Werbung schalten will, kann das gerne hier tun. Das gesammelte Geld geht vollständig an die Valerian Arsène Verny Literaturstiftung in Berlin.

"Die Stifter der international arbeitenden Stiftung sind der festen Überzeugung, dass durch literarische Bildung fremde Welten verstanden und damit Vorurteile abgebaut werden, denn Sätze können ein Leben verändern. Ziel der Stiftung ist es, durch die Förderung des sprachlichen Ausdrucksvermögens von Kindern und Jugendlichen zur Überbrückung und zum Verständnis unterschiedlicher Menschen, Kulturen und Religionen beizutragen."

 

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann 

Wenn du kein Geld spenden kannst, bist du natürlich auch so jederzeit willkommen, an der Reise teilzuhaben - ob virtuell über Facebook, Youtube und Co., oder live und in Farbe! Du kannst mich gerne ein Stück begleiten, eine Strecke mitwandern oder einfach nur vom Straßenrand aus zuwinken. Gerne gehe ich auch mit dir einen Kaffee trinken, wenn ich in deiner Stadt bin. Ich freue mich auf dich!

Auch Zuspruch, Kommentare, Mails, Likes und alles andere kostenlose freut und unterstützt mich!

story:
Who are we?

Spotted by Locals (since 2008) publishes online city guides and 100% offline apps with tips by locals in 71 cities in Europe & North America.

We are the only city guide publisher with local writers who live in the city they write about, speak the local language, write only about their local spots they care about and keep their articles up to date.

Spotted by Locals is an independent publishing company, owned and managed by founders (and married couple) Sanne & Bart.

So what’s our plan?

Starting in 2019 we will expand to 15 less-visited capitals in Eastern Europe, Central Asia and the Middle East. This will help move tourists (and their dollars) from popular tourist destinations to cities that can really use the positive economic impact of tourism.

We also believe it will spread more peace and intercultural understanding if more people travel to destinations like this.

Why support us?

As an independent digital travel guide publisher it’s increasingly difficult to compete with giant companies like Tripadvisor, Google and Lonely Planet. But we are determined to stay and offer an alternative non-commercial perspective of cities.

With your support, we can survive and even expand to 15 really interesting capitals in Eastern Europe, Central Asia and the Middle East that not enough people visit.

Are you a travel lover who supports independent publishing and a friendlier, more open world? Please support us! In return we can give you a really good deal: for EUR 50 you will get access to all our app city guides for life (worth EUR 325)!

Our vision

We strongly believe many of the world’s main problems arise because people from different cultures do not understand each other. 

We were on the right track to a more open world for a long time, but lately more and more nations (especially in “the West”) have started moving in the opposite direction again: more border control and limiting international cooperation on all levels.

We believe traveling and learning about other cultures from a local perspective makes people more tolerant. We want to help make change in the world, and this was one of the main reasons for launching Spotted by Locals in 2008.

Why do we care about overtourism?

Our locals in 70+ cities write about their personal favorite authentically local spots, which helps spread travelers to less touristy areas.

Still, overtourism to popular destinations is increasingly disrupting local cultures, and it's getting worse rapidly (read this excellent article by The Economist). We feel the urge to do even more to minimize the impact of overtourism, and we are in a position to do so (with your help!). 


Cruise ship in Venice 

Our amazing community

Every Spotter is handpicked by founders Sanne and Bart, who lead a nomadic life to meet each of the 440 city-loving locals (“Spotters”) at their favorite spots around the world. 

It’s a wonderful community of like-minded city lovers, who meet each other regularly. Every 2 years we organize a weekend for all our Spotters.


Spotters Weekend November 2018

Our blogs & apps

On our 71 city blogs, all tips are available for free. Our Android & iPhone apps work 100% offline and offer additional functionalities.  

In the media

We’ve been fortunate to get a lot of good press & love from users. Our Android & iPhone apps have an average rating of 4.5 stars.

You get what you pay for: […] the most well-rounded of the three I tried.”
The New York Times | Read article

“An incredible tool for those who’d like to explore a little beyond the main tourist spots.”
The Culture Trip | Read article

“The inside track from city loving locals”
BBC | See video

“…authentically local, on-the-ground advice…”
The Guardian | Read article

More in the media

Why support us after we have reached our goal?

  • You’re getting a really good deal: big discounts on our apps! See the perks :)
  • The more money we raise, the more new exciting city guides we can launch for little-known cities that would benefit financially from more tourists!
  • You will guarantee Spotted by Locals can survive as a small non-commercial independent publisher and compete with big corporations with millions or even billions of dollars.
  • You're helping to make the world a friendlier place!

Thank you for your support!

No money? You can still help!

No money to support our project, but enjoy using Spotted by Locals and like our mission and our existence as an indie alternative to Tripadvisor, Yelp, Foursquare and Google? Please share this link with friends and tell them why you think they should support us! Thank you so much!

Any questions or feedback?

We’d love to hear from you! Please get in touch with Spotted by Locals co-founder Bart via bart@spottedbylocals.com or Twitter (@bartvanpoll)

Please support us! In return we can give you a really good deal: for EUR 50 you will get access to all our app city guides for life (worth EUR 325)!Our visionWe strongly believe many of the world’s main problems arise because people from different cultures do not understand each other. We were on the right track to a more open world for a long time, but lately more and more nations (especially in “the West”) have started moving in the opposite direction again: more border control and limiting international cooperation on all levels.We believe traveling and learning about other cultures from a local perspective makes people more tolerant. We want to help make change in the world, and this was one of the main reasons for launching Spotted by Locals in 2008.Why do we care about overtourism?Our locals in 70+ cities write about their personal favorite authentically local spots, which helps spread travelers to less touristy areas.Still, overtourism to popular destinations is increasingly disrupting local cultures, and it's getting worse rapidly (read this excellent article by The Economist). We feel the urge to do even more to minimize the impact of overtourism, and we are in a position to do so (with your help!). Cruise ship in Venice Our amazing communityEvery Spotter is handpicked by founders Sanne and Bart, who lead a nomadic life to meet each of the 440 city-loving locals (“Spotters”) at their favorite spots around the world. It’s a wonderful community of like-minded city lovers, who meet each other regularly. Every 2 years we organize a weekend for all our Spotters.Spotters Weekend November 2018Our blogs & appsOn our 71 city blogs, all tips are available for free. Our Android & iPhone apps work 100% offline and offer additional functionalities.  In the mediaWe’ve been fortunate to get a lot of good press & love from users. Our Android & iPhone apps have an average rating of 4.5 stars.You get what you pay for: […] the most well-rounded of the three I tried.”The New York Times | Read article“An incredible tool for those who’d like to explore a little beyond the main tourist spots.”The Culture Trip | Read article“The inside track from city loving locals”BBC | See video“…authentically local, on-the-ground advice…”The Guardian | Read articleMore in the mediaWhy support us after we have reached our goal?
You’re getting a really good deal: big discounts on our apps! See the perks :)
The more money we raise, the more new exciting city guides we can launch for little-known cities that would benefit financially from more tourists!
You will guarantee Spotted by Locals can survive as a small non-commercial independent publisher and compete with big corporations with millions or even billions of dollars.
You're helping to make the world a friendlier place!
Thank you for your support!No money? You can still help!No money to support our project, but enjoy using Spotted by Locals and like our mission and our existence as an indie alternative to Tripadvisor, Yelp, Foursquare and Google? Please share this link with friends and tell them why you think they should support us! Thank you so much!Any questions or feedback?We’d love to hear from you! Please get in touch with Spotted by Locals co-founder Bart via bart@spottedbylocals.com or Twitter (@bartvanpoll)

story:
NOTICE: You will select your add-on via a survey that will be sent to you via email 2 weeks after you have made your pledge on Indiegogo.

 

NOMATIC was born and raised on Kickstarter.  In 2014 we launched the BASICS Wallet. Then in 2015 we launched the BASICS Notebook. Thanks to our incredible backers and supporters, over 100,000 people worldwide are now enjoying our products everyday. As our brand has evolved, we have changed our name from BASICS to NOMATIC. Today, with with the help of Indiegogo, we are excited to bring you our most epic product yet, The NOMATIC Travel Bag. 

 

The NOMATIC Travel bag was designed for a 3-7 day trip. By combining the best features from a backpack, duffel bag and general luggage, we have created the ultimate travel bag to help you spend less time fussing with your luggage and more time enjoying your journey. The NOMATIC Travel Bag has over 20 features that make it the most functional travel bag ever. On top of being packed with incredible functionality, the bag has a sleek minimalist design, is made of strong weather-proof materials and is built to last.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our Innovative strap system allows you to switch between backpack and duffel in seconds and have no dangling straps.

    

 

 

 

A laundry bag comes with each travel bag to complete the set. When closed, the laundry bag was designed to fit perfectly inside the door of the shoe compartment of your travel bag. When you arrive at your destination, the laundry bag expands and hangs on a door knob so you can easily toss dirty clothes in. When the trip is over and the laundry bag is full, it will fit back into your travel bag perfectly and keep your dirty clothes separate and organized.

 

 

 

 

The NOMATIC Travel Bag is equipped with an RFID safe pocket and a TSA approved lock. This “mini safe” keeps your scannable and valuable items safe during travel from pickpockets, room service, and other potential threats.

 

 

 

The padded and secure laptop pocket allows you to leave your backpack or laptop bag behind and travel like a pro with just one bag. The laptop pocket can hold a 15" laptop comfortably. Plus with the airport security friendly design, you won't have to take your laptop out of the pocket. Just open the bag and lay the main compartment door flat (as shown in the second image below) and you will be good to go.  

 

 Keep your tablet accessible and safe in this easy access padded pocket found on the inside of the main compartment door. The secure velcro flap was designed with a slot to allow you to charge your tablet on the go with a power bank while keeping it secure.

 

 

Located at the top of the bag is a water bottle pocket lined with a water proof material to allow you to stay hydrated on the road while keeping all of your belongings dry in case of a leak.

 

 

If you travel with a roller bag, The NOMATIC Travel Bag will be the perfect companion. We have designed a built in durable sleeve to fit over the handle of your roller bag.

 

 

The exterior of the NOMATIC Travel Bag is a durable 100% water-proof tarpaulin material. Tarpaulin is commonly used on rugged outdoor bags because of its ability to endure and stay strong in harsh conditions.

 

We have also integrated waterproof zippers into the exterior of the bag to keep your gear protected in the rain and snow.

 

This bag features a large opening into the main compartment which gives you easy access and visibility for packing.  The shoe, socks, and underwear compartments help you to stay organized. In addition, the strong tarpaulin material holds its shape to make packing easier.

 Put 1 or 2 pairs of shoes in the shoe compartment, and socks, underwear or a light jacket in the upper compartment, and still have plenty of room for everything else.

 

 

On the bottom of the bag we have included a shoe compartment where you can easily fit up to two pairs of shoes. (2 pairs of U.S. size 12 fit comfortably inside)

 

 

On the top of the bag is a similar compartment to the shoe compartment where you can keep socks, underwear, or even a light jacket for easy access when you get cold while traveling. These compartments were designed to help you organize your packing rather than just stuffing everything into one big pocket like most duffel bags.

 

 

 

 

 

Keep your phone, sunglasses, and other valuables protected in this soft fleece-lined pocket on the top side of the bag.

 

 

With this combination of mesh, fleece-lined, and zipper pockets, you can keep your cords, power banks, laptop chargers and any other odds and ends right where you need them.

 

 

The side pocket is sized to hold a BASICS Notebook or any other book of a similar size (roughly 5.5" x 8.75")

  

 

When the bag is worn in backpack mode, this pocket is easily accessible, making it the perfect place for frequently needed travel documents.  Also, because it is positioned with the zipper close to your back it makes it more difficult for pickpockets to access this zipper undetected.

 

 

Carrying your luggage can become painful and heavy, so we added a very comfortable handle to make your interactions with the bag as enjoyable as possible.

 

 

Last but not least we have added a sternum strap for added comfort and support.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Vacuum Bag

The NOMATIC Vacuum Bag is both water proof and air tight. This added feature will help you pack all you need in half the space, leaving more room for other travel essentials.

 

 

 

 

Toiletries Bag 

Made from the same Tarpaulin material as the Travel Bag, this toiletries bag will last forever and will keep liquid spill inside the toiletries bag and away from your clothes.

 

 

Waist Strap

To give you better support when carrying the bag, you can clip on these waist straps to distribute the weight more comfortably.  Also each strap has a pocket big enough to hold your passport for even more functionality.

 

Shirt Organizer

Using the plastic guide that comes with this accessory, you can fold your shirts to just the right size, then store them in the organizer to avoid wrinkles while traveling.

 

We are confident that we can deliver all NOMATIC Travel Set rewards by February 2017.

 

 

 

We love creating innovative products that help people simplify, organize and improve their lives. We are so grateful to all of our backers and supporters who helped us successfully launch the Basics Wallet and Basics Notebook on the Kickstarter Platform.  And now we are also grateful to those who are helping us bring the NOMATIC Travel Bag to life on the Indiegogo platform.  Thanks for all of your support!  If you have any feedback or questions please contact us through our website www.nomatic.com.

story:
Campaign Summary

USC Trojan fans!  Help us launch a brand new USC Trojans officially licensed collegiate product and give back to the Los Angeles community at the same time. 

My name is Josh Helland and I am the Founder of With a Purpose, a consumer goods company that creates licensed merchandise products that support local communities.  Our first product is a line of “1 for 1” collegiate branded blankets called “Blanket for a Blanket.”  For each one purchased, we donate a brand new blanket to local non-profits that support housing shelters, U.S. Veterans, and Disaster Relief. 

In 2013, we launched seven schools under the “Blanket for a Blanket” product line and had an overwhelming amount of support for these products and causes (for more info visit www.with-a-purpose.co).  To date we have been able to donate over 750 brand new blankets to over 20 non-profits with several thousand more donations on the way this winter. 

We are now looking to launch more schools that will help support more local communities.  That’s why we need your help!  By supporting this product line through the perks on the right, you will allow us to get this blanket line into production and also support local Los Angeles non-profits.  Win Win!

What We Need & What You Get

With your support of this campaign through the perks on the right, you will be the envy of all USC fans by being the first ones to strut your stuff on social media with your brand new USC Trojans Blanket for a Blanket and allow local Los Angeles non-profits to keep their clients warm this winter.  See the perks to the right to understand the different funding levels. 

Specifically the funding will be used for:

·  Overseas manufacturing of our new USC Trojans Blanket for a Blanket line and delivery to our Los Angeles based warehouse and fulfillment center

·  Shipping of each USC Trojans blanket to each supporter

·  Overseas manufacturing of our Donation Blankets and delivery to our Los Angeles based warehouse and fulfillment center

·  Bulk shipping of our Donation Blankets to our Los Angeles based Non-Profit partners

The Impact

To date we have donated over 750 brand new blankets to more than 20 non-profits in California, Kansas, Texas, Oklahoma, and Louisiana, with many more on the way this fall.

Providing clean and warm blankets is very important to our non-profit partners.  They constantly remind us of the positive impact these blankets have on the physical and mental being of their clients.

“The gift of a blanket represents much more than just warmth.  It’s a simple yet important belonging our clients will reach for, whether they’re cold, tired, or in need of comfort.”  Austin Street Center, Dallas, TX, December 2013

“As many as 1000 people come to the Society of St. Vincent de Paul’s downtown campus for a meal, a bed and other various services.  If we could get 10,000 blankets through the Blanket for a Blanket program, we could find a home for each blanket.  We can use every blanket we can get our hands on.”  Society of St. Vincent de Paul, Baton Rouge, LA, December 2013

“We are so grateful for the blankets from With a Purpose.  It is so cold outside and by distributing these blankets to people on the streets we are saving lives.” Alpha Project, San Diego, CA, February 2014

Targeted Los Angeles Non-Profit Partners:

·  US Veterans Initiative

·  PATH 

·  Imagine LA 

·  Downtown Women’s Center 

What better way to support your favorite university and impact your community!

Other Ways You Can Help

SHARE! SHARE! SHARE!  Please let your USC Trojan friends, family, and alumni know about this campaign.  The more eyeballs we get, the better chance we have of meeting our funding goal. 

Remember to use the IndieGoGo share tools. 

FIGHT ON!
