story:
Why choice our technology Pancake Mulit-Rotor BLDC?

Recently the technology people, efficiency, fast online shopping, look for more efficient and affordable goods, opened the online shopping giant logistics.

We also emphasize that our next generation of environmental protection will have good sons of the natural environment, rather than according to the burden of the earth, causing climate change, natural disasters.

As Amazon's CEO Jeff Bezos in the U.S. program "sixty minutes", the set can be announced within 30 minutes, the product will be shipped your door's unmanned helicopter (Drone) transport systems: Amazon Prime Air; this is future faster delivery trend coming in our life, so does Netflix’s Drone Delivery project too!!

        Most of professional development engineer are searching better and better long life stable motor, can be small, carry more heavy goods, save power consumption more…etc.

Therefore we are developing more high efficiency motor could be once again raise the level of technology, we are glad to issues special technology pancake mulit-rotor brushless motor, which is totally different than before you ever see.

What's special about the Alturn USA Pancake Mulit-Rotor BLDC?

1.the core technology --- electromagnetic array technology based segmentation of high power density and high efficiency permanent magnet motor or generator controller system composed . The system design utilizes materials science, computer-aided design science, cybernetics and electromagnetic measuring physics. 

2. the efficiency can reach 94 ~ 98% --- in patented technology - segmented electromagnetic coil array technology unique molding technology , reducing the stator copper loss . Abolition of the traditional motor core, it reduces lot of iron loss. And eliminating the magnetic pull of the stator, the rotor between the bearing load is reduced, thus reducing the consumption of electrical machinery ( especially for high-power motors)

 3. high power density can be achieved using a high energy product ---rare earth permanent magnetic material , as compared with conventional motors , since the design of the axial gap motor , the magnetic flux in the gap in the radial gas double gap conventional motor design, but also does not eliminate the use of silicon steel magnetic core saturation effect due to the cogging brings . Resulting in the same power level , the volume of the motor is smaller than an ordinary motor , light weight. 

4. the maximum torque multiplier can reach 10 times than traditional--- coreless stator design , eliminating the ferromagnetic saturation effect . Thus, the maximum torque curve of the motor in the operating range is linear. So the motor in the event of sudden large load , better able to cope effectively adapt to the harsh operating environment. 

5. running very smoothly ---no core , there is making full-seamless inherent traditional motor cogging , and the application of the motor controller controls EMF and current waveform matching technique , so when the motor is in operation from the fundamental on reaching the torque ripple silent except for the sound effects and bearing close to zero . 

6. The temperature is not high ---small size and light weight. Arguably harder than conventional motor temperature to ensure its targets. But because of the high efficiency of the motor , so the heat generated inside is comparatively small, and the application of advanced computer-aided design software to optimize heat dissipation through the motor and the internal geometry of the heat which can be issued when the motor high torque and high current, smoothly discharged to the outside of the motor. 

Main Pancake Brushless motor items feature & specification:

With Pancake BLDC, we have made 4 series different types so far. In the latest version, we make upgrade magnet material to N35EH NeFed level, also drills more holes on the middle of stator holder for save more weight to the complete motor mechanical.

 ABSM-42mm-KV 420  Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor

 ABSM-42mm-KV 650  Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor

ABSM-50mm-KV 360 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor

ABSM-50mm-KV 620 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor

ABSM-63mm-KV 360 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor

 ABSM-63mm-KV 620 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor

 ABSM-90mm-KV 165 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor

 Gimbal motor function:

AGBM-42mm-130T  Pancake Gimbal Brushless Motor
AGBM-50mm-150T  Pancake Gimbal Brushless Motor
AGBM-63mm-150T  Pancake Gimbal Brushless Motor

AGBM-90mm-80T       Pancake Gimbal Brushless Motor

Final One products we are developing hand gimbal kits which is gonna use Large Pancake Gimbal Powerful Over-Sized Brushless Motor set on the Pan axis / Till / Roll side motor, we are glading to open house share our developing gimbal kits for pledged backers and Indiegogo friends. in the photos we show up it our currectly mass production version with trandtional gimbal motor, but we are gonna upgrade to partent pancake gimbal motor version that we will modifyed some of parts diameter and CG (center of gravity),during the Indiegogo funding campaign, we are same time to create prototype for this hand gimbal kits parts tooling together, therefore we can get all CNC parts on time delivery on your hand without delay make your disappoint.


Product Description: 

Designed for professional aeral photography, with strong structure and light weight. Applied to multi-copters, easy to assembly through 4 dampers mount on any kind of multi-copters. Heavy duty 3-axis gimbal with exceptionally strong motors & frame that easily support Red Epic, 5D/60D/70D & D800 w/ larger lenses. 100% assembled. Adapted to DSLR cameras lighter than 3.5 kg. Under most circumstances, users can adjust G.C. to adapt to different cameras. 

Specification: 

100% assembled. Preset parameter is set. Under most circumstances, users can adjust G.C. to start. 7075 aluminum alloy and 3K carbon fiber processed, with strong structure and light weight. Used with AGBM-63mm-150T brushless motor and controller, adapted to DSLR cameras lighter than 2 kg. 8 points to adjust G.C. on damping mount, which is adapted to different cameras and lenses. Can be linked with external servo to adjust pitch and roll position. With built-in voltage adjuster and voltage display, user can monitor battery and voltage condition. Input voltage LiPo 3S~6S, compatible to most RC batteries. Enclosed with 4 dampers and mount. Preset parameter is based on Canon 6D/ 17-40mm. Please adjust by actual position. Hanging weight: DSLR camera lighter than 3.5 kg. Input voltage: 3S(11.1V)~6S(22.2V) External Dimensions : 295(W)x250(H)x310(D)mm Weight : around 1100g( without battery and camera)

Why we need to reach this goal?

The main reason is cost. After meeting with some suppliers, we calculated that we need to reach this minimum goal to be able to offer pancake motor at the best possible price. Although, we can make fewer machines at much higher prices, we really want to share the pancake motor with as many people as we can. So we believe that lowering the price will make the pancake motor more accessible to more people.

The other reason is that we want to refine some parts on the pancake motor and matching performance as best as possible, like making more compact electronics, adding some extra covering to some components for better protection and to just make some aspects look nicer. Some tooling and final testing costs can add up quickly, and although we have worked out most of the functionality of the pancake motor, we still wish to make it the best possible pancake brushless motor by getting higher quality components.

Rewards

As rewards, we will ship well-done pancake brushless to you for your own mulit-copter or any DIY hand motor or hand Gimbal set…etc application, More details are listed below:

What are the Funds for?

During our Indiegogo funding campaign, we'll be letting all Indiegogo backers know more about our high performance pancake brushless motor, launching a major marketing campaign, conducting surveys, updating FAQ's and keeping in contact with everyone. As soon as we got know it’s funded, we will be in contact with our approved supplier and get the ordering process started. We have already done multiple prototypes and many hours of loading motor life tested. We have fine-tuned the performance and the mechanical design in order to produce the most advanced and easy to use follow focus available.

Manufacturing Schedule:

The manufacturing of these systems and fulfillment of rewards will happen in four Stages: 

 Stage 1: Final Design Completion –We have done extensive testing of the current design and working prototypes that are representative of the finished products. We will be taking surveys, FAQ’s and other feedback from you, the backers, in order to complete the final design tweaks. We want to make sure we give you exactly what you want. 

Based on our level of funding we will go straight to production tooling and we will incorporate the changes encompassed in our achieved stretch goals.

Stage 2: Manufacturing –we will start create formal fine blanking & progressive die setand then tested using our stringent test program developed during the prototype stages. Hardware components will be CNC machined, die casted, polished and hard anodize finished.(Approximately 6 weeks for die cast tooling & all CNC manufacturing) 

Stage 3: Assembly –All manufactured components including magnetic impulse, drive motors, machined components, & die casted parts will be evaluated upon arrival. Once parts are approved we will commence assembly of the units. After assembly, all units will again go through our testing process to verify the electronics, wiring, magnet gauss units, and motor assemblies meet our test plan specifications.

Stage 4: Shipping and Delivery -As units are completed; they will be promptly packaged with all the included items. Once they are completed, we will ship orders with all included items for that specific reward. Orders will be shipped with Early Birds receiving first shipment, respectively. (Approximately 2 weeks depending on quantity of orders for delivery time oversea).

Final Thoughts

The Alturn Pancake MulitRotor BLDC is suitable for professionals application and enthusiasts alike. It also can be works with other models and other project you intend to do research, not just for quadcopter flying, also other model bike, Robotic hand, step 3D printer, micro CNC miller…etc application, And it can transform the way you think and products technology increase.

Communication

If you still have other questions, you can post a comment or send an email to us at: allenl@alturn-usa.com

We will reply all your questions & inquire as soon as possible.
story_txt:
Why choice our technology Pancake Mulit-Rotor BLDC?Recently the technology people, efficiency, fast online shopping, look for more efficient and affordable goods, opened the online shopping giant logistics.We also emphasize that our next generation of environmental protection will have good sons of the natural environment, rather than according to the burden of the earth, causing climate change, natural disasters.As Amazon's CEO Jeff Bezos in the U.S. program "sixty minutes", the set can be announced within 30 minutes, the product will be shipped your door's unmanned helicopter (Drone) transport systems: Amazon Prime Air; this is future faster delivery trend coming in our life, so does Netflix’s Drone Delivery project too!!        Most of professional development engineer are searching better and better long life stable motor, can be small, carry more heavy goods, save power consumption more…etc.Therefore we are developing more high efficiency motor could be once again raise the level of technology, we are glad to issues special technology pancake mulit-rotor brushless motor, which is totally different than before you ever see.What's special about the Alturn USA Pancake Mulit-Rotor BLDC?1.the core technology --- electromagnetic array technology based segmentation of high power density and high efficiency permanent magnet motor or generator controller system composed . The system design utilizes materials science, computer-aided design science, cybernetics and electromagnetic measuring physics. 2. the efficiency can reach 94 ~ 98% --- in patented technology - segmented electromagnetic coil array technology unique molding technology , reducing the stator copper loss . Abolition of the traditional motor core, it reduces lot of iron loss. And eliminating the magnetic pull of the stator, the rotor between the bearing load is reduced, thus reducing the consumption of electrical machinery ( especially for high-power motors) 3. high power density can be achieved using a high energy product ---rare earth permanent magnetic material , as compared with conventional motors , since the design of the axial gap motor , the magnetic flux in the gap in the radial gas double gap conventional motor design, but also does not eliminate the use of silicon steel magnetic core saturation effect due to the cogging brings . Resulting in the same power level , the volume of the motor is smaller than an ordinary motor , light weight. 4. the maximum torque multiplier can reach 10 times than traditional--- coreless stator design , eliminating the ferromagnetic saturation effect . Thus, the maximum torque curve of the motor in the operating range is linear. So the motor in the event of sudden large load , better able to cope effectively adapt to the harsh operating environment. 5. running very smoothly ---no core , there is making full-seamless inherent traditional motor cogging , and the application of the motor controller controls EMF and current waveform matching technique , so when the motor is in operation from the fundamental on reaching the torque ripple silent except for the sound effects and bearing close to zero . 6. The temperature is not high ---small size and light weight. Arguably harder than conventional motor temperature to ensure its targets. But because of the high efficiency of the motor , so the heat generated inside is comparatively small, and the application of advanced computer-aided design software to optimize heat dissipation through the motor and the internal geometry of the heat which can be issued when the motor high torque and high current, smoothly discharged to the outside of the motor. Main Pancake Brushless motor items feature & specification:With Pancake BLDC, we have made 4 series different types so far. In the latest version, we make upgrade magnet material to N35EH NeFed level, also drills more holes on the middle of stator holder for save more weight to the complete motor mechanical. ABSM-42mm-KV 420  Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor ABSM-42mm-KV 650  Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless MotorABSM-50mm-KV 360 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless MotorABSM-50mm-KV 620 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless MotorABSM-63mm-KV 360 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor ABSM-63mm-KV 620 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor ABSM-90mm-KV 165 Pancake Multi-Rotor Brushless Motor Gimbal motor function:AGBM-42mm-130T  Pancake Gimbal Brushless MotorAGBM-50mm-150T  Pancake Gimbal Brushless MotorAGBM-63mm-150T  Pancake Gimbal Brushless MotorAGBM-90mm-80T       Pancake Gimbal Brushless MotorFinal One products we are developing hand gimbal kits which is gonna use Large Pancake Gimbal Powerful Over-Sized Brushless Motor set on the Pan axis / Till / Roll side motor, we are glading to open house share our developing gimbal kits for pledged backers and Indiegogo friends. in the photos we show up it our currectly mass production version with trandtional gimbal motor, but we are gonna upgrade to partent pancake gimbal motor version that we will modifyed some of parts diameter and CG (center of gravity),during the Indiegogo funding campaign, we are same time to create prototype for this hand gimbal kits parts tooling together, therefore we can get all CNC parts on time delivery on your hand without delay make your disappoint.Product Description: Designed for professional aeral photography, with strong structure and light weight. Applied to multi-copters, easy to assembly through 4 dampers mount on any kind of multi-copters. Heavy duty 3-axis gimbal with exceptionally strong motors & frame that easily support Red Epic, 5D/60D/70D & D800 w/ larger lenses. 100% assembled. Adapted to DSLR cameras lighter than 3.5 kg. Under most circumstances, users can adjust G.C. to adapt to different cameras. Specification: 100% assembled. Preset parameter is set. Under most circumstances, users can adjust G.C. to start. 7075 aluminum alloy and 3K carbon fiber processed, with strong structure and light weight. Used with AGBM-63mm-150T brushless motor and controller, adapted to DSLR cameras lighter than 2 kg. 8 points to adjust G.C. on damping mount, which is adapted to different cameras and lenses. Can be linked with external servo to adjust pitch and roll position. With built-in voltage adjuster and voltage display, user can monitor battery and voltage condition. Input voltage LiPo 3S~6S, compatible to most RC batteries. Enclosed with 4 dampers and mount. Preset parameter is based on Canon 6D/ 17-40mm. Please adjust by actual position. Hanging weight: DSLR camera lighter than 3.5 kg. Input voltage: 3S(11.1V)~6S(22.2V) External Dimensions : 295(W)x250(H)x310(D)mm Weight : around 1100g( without battery and camera)Why we need to reach this goal?The main reason is cost. After meeting with some suppliers, we calculated that we need to reach this minimum goal to be able to offer pancake motor at the best possible price. Although, we can make fewer machines at much higher prices, we really want to share the pancake motor with as many people as we can. So we believe that lowering the price will make the pancake motor more accessible to more people.The other reason is that we want to refine some parts on the pancake motor and matching performance as best as possible, like making more compact electronics, adding some extra covering to some components for better protection and to just make some aspects look nicer. Some tooling and final testing costs can add up quickly, and although we have worked out most of the functionality of the pancake motor, we still wish to make it the best possible pancake brushless motor by getting higher quality components.RewardsAs rewards, we will ship well-done pancake brushless to you for your own mulit-copter or any DIY hand motor or hand Gimbal set…etc application, More details are listed below:What are the Funds for?During our Indiegogo funding campaign, we'll be letting all Indiegogo backers know more about our high performance pancake brushless motor, launching a major marketing campaign, conducting surveys, updating FAQ's and keeping in contact with everyone. As soon as we got know it’s funded, we will be in contact with our approved supplier and get the ordering process started. We have already done multiple prototypes and many hours of loading motor life tested. We have fine-tuned the performance and the mechanical design in order to produce the most advanced and easy to use follow focus available.
Manufacturing Schedule:
The manufacturing of these systems and fulfillment of rewards will happen in four Stages:  Stage 1: Final Design Completion –We have done extensive testing of the current design and working prototypes that are representative of the finished products. We will be taking surveys, FAQ’s and other feedback from you, the backers, in order to complete the final design tweaks. We want to make sure we give you exactly what you want. Based on our level of funding we will go straight to production tooling and we will incorporate the changes encompassed in our achieved stretch goals.Stage 2: Manufacturing –we will start create formal fine blanking & progressive die setand then tested using our stringent test program developed during the prototype stages. Hardware components will be CNC machined, die casted, polished and hard anodize finished.(Approximately 6 weeks for die cast tooling & all CNC manufacturing) Stage 3: Assembly –All manufactured components including magnetic impulse, drive motors, machined components, & die casted parts will be evaluated upon arrival. Once parts are approved we will commence assembly of the units. After assembly, all units will again go through our testing process to verify the electronics, wiring, magnet gauss units, and motor assemblies meet our test plan specifications.Stage 4: Shipping and Delivery -As units are completed; they will be promptly packaged with all the included items. Once they are completed, we will ship orders with all included items for that specific reward. Orders will be shipped with Early Birds receiving first shipment, respectively. (Approximately 2 weeks depending on quantity of orders for delivery time oversea).Final ThoughtsThe Alturn Pancake MulitRotor BLDC is suitable for professionals application and enthusiasts alike. It also can be works with other models and other project you intend to do research, not just for quadcopter flying, also other model bike, Robotic hand, step 3D printer, micro CNC miller…etc application, And it can transform the way you think and products technology increase.CommunicationIf you still have other questions, you can post a comment or send an email to us at: allenl@alturn-usa.comWe will reply all your questions & inquire as soon as possible.

story:
After graduating from The Art Institute last week, Lisa very easily convinced me to purchase plane tickets to go to with her to Iceland in late February. After finding a million tours and sights we want to see, we realized we have absolutely no idea how we are going to pay for anything. Unless they accept payment in the form of hugs in Iceland, we're going to have to hustle our butts off these next two months.

As I mentioned before, we set up a shop to sell some fun stuff on the side. Sadly, we only get a very small percentage of the items sold in the shop (https://society6.com/nomadicphotomakers) so this page is to hopefully collect more money while still offering some cool stuff in return.

If you know Lisa and I personally, you know there will be plenty of pretty pics coming your way. You are welcome (and encouraged) to pick a perk so you can have an awesome print or video sent to you~

Lastly, if you're still reading this, thank you.

If you donate or share this, thank you x a million.

story:
FEATURES

  • Tiny, but powerful patent pending design
  • Fits 12 types of blades
  • Right and left handed
  • Single handed opening and closing
  • Quick and easy blade replacement
  • Inexpensive off-the-shelf blades
  • Razor sharp
  • Hard lock closed and open
  • Streamlined shape to prevent catching on clothing
  • High carbon steel blades
  • Flight ready when blade is removed
  • Made in the U.S.A.

 The bulk of the cost of most modern pocket knives is in the blades. The Everyday Blade™ fits 12 different types of inexpensive replaceable blades found at most hardware stores and online. No more sharpening! These blades are some of the sharpest on the market.

Every aspect of how the Everyday Blade™ works, feels and looks has been scrutinized over nearly two years of development.  We put function over form and created a safe and useful tool first, and the aesthetics followed.

DIMENSIONS

 SPECIFICATIONS

  • Weight: 0.9oz (24 grams)
  • Length: 0.82in (20.8mm)
  • Width: 0.484in (12.3mm)
  • Height: 2.096in (53.2mm)
  • Blades: High Carbon Steel
  • Frame: Proprietary material (Stronger than aluminum, lighter than steel)
  • Lock mechanism: "Slide" lock, frame lock

 

Here at Korcraft, LLC we design and develop tools and outdoor gear that help make life easier.  Our small size has allowed us to spend nearly two years refining the Everyday Blade™.  Our founder, Shane Korthuis, has extensive experience designing and developing products ranging from medical equipment, consumer products, ATVs, production superbikes, and military equipment.

 

Share our story on social media, or with a friend, and we'll send you an extra blade set, with your perk, as a special THANK YOU! Just send us a message afterwards and you're all set.

Risks and Challenges

Our team has the collected experience designing, developing and producing thousands of production ready components. We've spent nearly two years creating over a hundred prototypes and testing our design. After funding, we're ready to go straight to tooling and ordering components. Every project has its own unique risks and challenges. If any unforeseen issues do arise, we will keep everyone well informed and tell you how we solved the problem.

DISCLAIMER
Every country and state has different knife laws regarding what you can carry and own. Check your local laws before ordering your Everyday Blade™. Korcraft, LLC is not responsible for any shipments held up at customs or returned.

These blades are some of the sharpest available and can begin to cut with almost no pressure applied to the blade. Always exercise caution and common sense when using your knife. Keep anything you do not wish to cut away from the blade.

The final form may vary slightly from pictures.

Always responsibly discard the blades.

story:
Becoming a Backer: Pre-order, Support & Participate

MOVA CYCLING JACKET 

The most funded cycling jacket in the history of crowdfunding is back. Thanks to the feedback, love and creativity of a caring family, THE MOVA presents you its new face and features. Like always, there will be more.

 

 

 

 

FIND YOUR SIZE

Charts refer to the measurements of our MOVA CYCLING JACKET when laid out on a flat surface.

MOVA CYCLING SWEATER

 

Your caring friend for everything: chilling, looking good and cycling. Combined with a jacket, the city is yours.

FIND YOUR SIZE

Charts refer to the measurements of our MOVA CYCLING SWEATER when laid out on a flat surface.

MOVA CYCLING JERSEY

 

 

FIND YOUR SIZE

Charts refer to the measurements of our MOVA CYCLING JERSEY when laid out on a flat surface.

MADE IN COLOMBIA 

How we manufacture matters. All the MOVA Cycling gear is designed and produced locally, here in Bogotá, Colombia. 95% of the materials comes from Colombia. It takes us a 10 minutes bike ride to reach the factory. This is also the root of our “Política Buena Papa” for Colombia and Latin America because we would like our high-quality products to be accessible to all the cycling family.

ARE THESE ONLY FOR CYCLING?

Let's be clear: we will NOT ask you to send us a picture of your bike! The MOVA Cycling gear is the perfect fit for every outdoor activity, and won’t let you down when you’re less outside and need more style.

The strength of our products comes from our love and experience with bicycles but the gear itself will help everyone everywhere. We already have skaters, hikers, sailors, climbers, and even business mens using them.

 

Become a backer and pledge for the reward you want. This is how you pre-order the products on Kickstarter. You will get your stuff before everybody else and to a special price. Looks like normal e-commerce, but it’s much more: the project will evolve and you will be involved.

Still confused? Check How Can I order a MOVA Cycling Jacket or other stuff? In the FAQs at the bottom of the page.

Conviértete en patrocinador y contribuye a cambio de la recompensa que quieras. Así es como pre-pides nuestros productos en Kickstarter. Tendrás nuestras nuevas prendas antes que todos los demás y a precio especial. Parece comercio en línea normal pero es mucho más que eso: El proyecto evoluciona a través del diseño participativo y tú estarás involucrado en ello.

You are our original investors. Thanks for all the love many of you have already been posting. We love you!

No tenemos inversionistas tradicionales. Creemos firmemente en el financiamiento participativo. Preferimos adaptarnos a las necesidades de nuestros patrocinadores más que a la lógica de los negocios. Entre más fondos recolectemos más de sus ideas vamos a implementar para mejorar nuestros productos, tal y como lo hicimos en nuestro primer Kickstarter.

Ustedes son nuestros inversionistas originales. Gracias infinitas por todo el amor y apoyo que nos han demostrado, publicado y enviado. Los queremos!

story:
Short Summary

Gabe, Fred, Raquel

Brittni, Brianna

We are undergraduate students from Azusa Pacific University and are all excited about watching God work this summer in Burkina Faso.  The five of us have been preparing for  five months to attend to the needs of the Burkinabe.  In Burkina Faso we will be living with a married missionary couple, Rotimi and Florence.  For six weeks from June 2 to July 12 we will aid them in any way necessary. We are expecting to work in several villages and help build homes and water pumps for clean water.  We will visit orphanages and spend time loving the parentless children of Burkina Faso. We are also preparing to work with the churches of Burkina and share the love of God through music and drama.  

What We Need & What You Get

Our team needs to raise $10,000 by May 22, 2013. The monetary aid that you provide will be used to pay for our arrival, residence and departure saefley from Burkina Faso.  It also goes to any projects that Rotimi and Florence are working on for the Burkinabe. Any and all money that is not used is saved for future mission trips to Burkina Faso.

 

The Impact

This trip is about all of us as much as it is about the Burkinabae. God has called us to move and to serve our sisters and brother when no one else will. This willingness and hunger we have to move under God's love is our message to the world. Though God is of infinite power and measure He moves through the faithfullness of His people; so where we go , you go with us. 

There is a song that says "you can never beat God's giving".  We believe that in return for your selfless giving you will be blessed in return. No good deed is missed by God and no good deed is is left unrewarded. Apart from tangible blessings we believe that the joy  of knowing you have sent your love and support to Burkina Faso through us, is more rewarding than any material gift.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not all who want to are able to give and we want to let anyone in this situation know that your prayers are invaluable.  Prayers for the Burkinabe and their country.  Prayers for Rotimi and Florence. As well as prayers for our team. Spreading the word and sharing our campaign would also be a great help. Thank-you.

story:
My eight year old niece reads out loud from her science book, "All living things grow and change." The book is absolutely correct. We all grow old and we are constantly changing:  mentally, physically and emotionally.  Ageing is a natural process and it is inevitable. A brief visit Matatirtha Old Age Home and the reality hits you hard in the stomach. We will all grow old one day and come to the end of our lifecycle becoming a child again, in need of constant care and support. Perhaps some people already have a grand plan for their old age, but elderly women at Matatirtha Old Age Home have very common stories regarding their stay at the home. They are without shelter, without guardians and require constant care, attention and support.

Established in 1997, Matatirtha Old Age Home currently takes care of 19 elderly women between the ages of 67-99. The Old Age Home not only provides food, shelter, and clothing to the residents, but also provide health services and religious and entertainment programs as well as make arrangements for the cremation of any of the residents upon their demise.

Therefore, I, Prakisha Pradhan, humbly request everyone to support my cause. Mahatma Gandhi once said, "The simplest acts of kindness are by far more powerful than a thousand heads bowing in prayer."

 

Sincerely, 

Prakisha Pradhan
Contact Number: 9849944106
Email: prakisha@gmail.com

Perhaps some people already have a grand plan for their old age, but elderly women at Matatirtha Old Age Home have very common stories regarding their stay at the home. They are without shelter, without guardians and require constant care, attention and support.
Established in 1997, Matatirtha Old Age Home currently takes care of 19 elderly women between the ages of 67-99. The Old Age Home not only provides food, shelter, and clothing to the residents, but also provide health services and religious and entertainment programs as well as make arrangements for the cremation of any of the residents upon their demise.
Therefore, I, Prakisha Pradhan, humbly request everyone to support my cause. Mahatma Gandhi once said, "The simplest acts of kindness are by far more powerful than a thousand heads bowing in prayer."
 
Sincerely, 
Prakisha PradhanContact Number: 9849944106Email: prakisha@gmail.com

story:
First Edition @ Lakes of Fire

Salut, 

We are Midnight Poutine! For those who never heard of us, we're a Burning Man food camp from that french speaking part of Canada called Quebec and since 2008, we've been driving 10 000 km to serve poutines to very hungry and eager burners at BRC.

But wait what's poutine?  It's a traditional Quebecois comfort food usually (but not always) eaten after a night of drinking. It’s made from french fries and cheese curds (what is called in Quebecois "cheese droppings " ). The whole thing covered with thick brown gravy from ancient family recipes.  Almost magic, no?

Last year, we were introduced to Firefly Arts Collective, the Boston Regional Burn. There, we've met people from Chicago that told us that Poutine must reach the LoF community. Here we are...

We need your contributions for :

  • Ingredients : This includes potatoes, gravy and precious cheese curds.

  • The other Ingredients : We are talking about oil  and propane to feed one of our trusty fryers, recently christened One of the Triplette.

  • Transport & Logistics : It takes a lot to set up a food camp, even if it's a light version, from Montreal to Michigan.

It costs about 500$ to serve about 200 poutines and this excludes our camp's expenses. Most of the financing is normally done by camp fees, but this time we'll be a really small delegation [4 people] to represent MP. So that means ALL the money you contribute goes toward running the poutine kitchen! The more money we get, the more poutines and surprises we have the pleasure to serve, it's that simple.

Please help us to feed you...

story:
What is Cosmic Eye?

Cosmic Eye was imagined by an amateur astronomer that was once clueless about the cosmos. The learning curve of astronomy is very high and discourages new entrants into the science. However, if one can begin to understand the basic concepts and fundamentals of the science the beauty and impressive vastness of the universe is revealed. To aid in this learning curve a better viewing experience through a telescope is what Cosmic Eye wishes to accomplish; to expose the true nature of what you see through a telescope.

Astronomy is a science that offers a unique perspective to even the most casual of astronomers. It provides those who understand the fundamentals a special connection with the universe we are all so lucky to perceive and only just beginning to understand.  

Cosmic Eye will utilize augmented reality display within the eyepiece of the telescope itself to overlay information and images that have been taken in different wave lengths of light to expose the true structure of the cosmos.

Different wave lengths of light can indicate different processes and events occurring throughout the cosmos. What can be seen through infrared light for example are regions of space that are active with star formation. Objects like nebula and galaxies can be seen with much better clarity and in more detail when looking at images taken with infrared filters and detectors. To illustrate this The Orion nebula is show below in a simulated view through Cosmic Eye:

 

The Orion Nebula in different wave lengths of light compared to a typical view through a telescope. Infrared and optical images: 2Mass, Mellinger, DSS2, and allWISE sky surveys.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Andromeda Galaxy seen in different wave lengths of light compared to a typical view through a telescope. Infrared and optical images: Mellinger, allWISE, AKARI/FIS, and DSS sky surveys.

What We Need from You

I am asking for $6,000 which will pay for:

- Preliminary software development & research

- Hardware development and construction

- Payment and delivery of rewards

What You Will Get

This campaign is funding a prototype. Because of this the final product is not offered, however, there is some cool space related perks and rewards for those who donate that includes:

  • An electronic EP inspired by space. 
  • An audio tour of the sky to aid stargazers.
  • 12 x 18 prints of some of E.L. Trouvelot's astronomical drawings (c. 1870)
  • Original Art Paintings of Space
  • And more!

Regardless if the campaign goal is met or not, the money raised will go towards prototype development. This is just one step of many and I hope we can foster enough interest to create a group of people whom would support further iterations of this product.

The Impact

The idea of this product arose from the various challenges I observed in learning astronomy myself and when trying to explain the basic concepts to others. Cosmic Eye is heavily dependent on the successful execution of the software -- making it easily usable, seamless, and informative. Software development is expensive and laborious especially when programming for augmented reality. It is for this reason that a majority of the money raised will go towards the development of the software. Your contribution will not only help increase the likelihood that this product is successful, but also aid in the depth and usability of the software.  

Your aid toward this project could help on two major frontiers. The expansion of the science of astronomy, as well as increasing the contextual understanding of the cosmos to many more people. Not just the simple things, but truly expanding peoples' knowledge and perception of the universe that exists around and within them.

We are made of stardust, to use the phrase coined by famous astronomer Carl Sagan, and we are only the universe trying to understand itself. It is with this understanding that can come many great things, not just in science, but in human affairs as well. The universe truly touches every one of us, and it is through this mentality that our species may be able to transcend to a higher form of thinking and therefore a higher form of decision making.  

Risks & Challenges

The risks that this project faces are very real. Although I am confident that this idea is very realistic given today's technological development, it is dependent on the proper formation of a team that values the vision and impact of the product as much as I do. This means that it may take some time before a true prototype is completed. 

I have been talking with numerous software developers in order to find the right fit as well as someone who has the qualifications to build on this idea. I have networked with Boston Augmented Reality groups and fostered relationships with members of the augmented reality industry. Initial conversation is imperative and I have been constantly working with people to find members of use and interest. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate do not worry! There are ways you can still help.

Please spread the word of the campaign by posting and sharing on social media. The more people become aware of this idea, the more likely Cosmic Eye will succeed. Indiegogo even has a convienent share tool to easily allow you to quickly share this campaign on many social media platforms. Anything can help!

Many thanks!

Ashton

story:
What is the problem?

Hanging your food in the backcountry is rudimentary, and can be a hassle. Have you ever tried tying a knot around a rock? It's tough. More often than not, backpackers find themselves struggling to hang their food & gear safely.  

 

What is the solution?

The Ultralight Food Hanging System is a complete system that equips you with everything you need to quickly and easily hang your food. It eliminates the struggle of tying a rope around a rock, or the hassle of getting the rope over the branch. It eliminates BFF (Branch Friction Frustration), and its unique pulley system gives you a 2-1 mechanical advantage. Meaning half the pulling force is needed to raise your food bag.   Total weight for this complete system is only 6.5oz.

 

 

How it Works

It's simple: Fill the ROCK SOK (neoprene pouch) with a few rocks.  Attach a carabiner and rope. Toss over a tree branch and use the unique pulley system to pull your food up high away from hungry animals. No more knots around rocks. No more struggles to get your rope over a tree branch. No more ropes cutting into the branch leaving your food hanging only a few feet off the ground.

story:
Whether you’re jet-setting abroad, or driving to a weekend getaway, space is always a premium, and no traveler enjoys the stress of not having enough space.  We’ve alleviated this problem by creating a compression bag that keeps clothes compact, organized, and folded.  Acteon bags maximize space because they use a separate compression zipper to flatten that bulky stack of clothes.

The struggle of keeping clean and dirty clothes separate disappears when using our packing cubes.  We engineered a gusseted divider between compartments that keeps clean clothes fresh by isolating them from worn smelly clothes.  This works pretty simply.  Start out your trip with all of your clothing on the clean side.  As your clothes get dirty, you move them one by one to the dirty side to keep them separated.  The expandable center divider transfers space from the clean side to the dirty side while not increasing the overall size of the packing cube.  In storing clothes separately, you can easily travel to multiple locations without worry. This also greatly simplifies unpacking.

How to use the Clean and Dirty Compartments

 

Without a compression cube, your clothes are going to shift and move during travel. This means you'll be left with a scattered and crumpled mess.  By using an Acteon bag, your clothes will remain in their space and have a better possibility of staying wrinkle free.

How to Pack and Compress a Cube

Packing List: 7 mens medium t-shirts, 1 pair of shorts and 1 pair of 32x32 jeans.

  • Ultra Lightweight: 4.2oz (120g) Large and 3.0oz (86g) Small
  • Ultra Compact
  • Durable Silicone Coated Ripstop Nylon Construction
  • Water Resistant
  • YKK Zippers
  • Separate Clean/Dirty Compartments
  • Nylon Webbing Carry Handle
  • Compression Zippers to save even more space
  • Corded Zipper Pulls

story:
Introducing the Everyday Bags

The Everyday Backpack (in 20L and 30L), Everyday Sling, and Everyday Tote are the newest additions to the Peak Design lineup. Successfully funded on Kickstarter on September 9th, they are now available for pre-order here on Indiegogo, as well as peakdesign.com and Peak Design retailers worldwide. Like all Peak Design products, our new bags are packed full of features and meticulously engineered. They are designed from the ground up to be both the best camera bags and the best everyday carry on the planet.

 

How to get them

Become a backer of this project. To do that, click on the Perk you want and enter your payment info. Your order will ship once we have finished fulfilling pre-orders made previously on Kickstarter. We expect all Indiegogo pre-orders to be shipped by December 2016.

Note: if you want to pre-order Range Pouch, click one of the pre-order links at the bottom of the Range Pouch section of this page.

 

Wait, are these camera bags?

Let's make one thing abundantly clear: these ain't just camera bags. They're Everyday bags—crafted by a team of designers, engineers, and photographers to meet the needs of everyone in the modern world. 

We may have cut our teeth in the camera accessories world, but these bags are for everyone, just like our (award-winning*) Everyday Messenger that we designed and launched a year ago with the help of renowned adventure photographer Trey Ratcliff. Peak Design Everyday Bags are unrivaled as camera bags and uncompromising as everyday companions.

                                                                                                                     
 

And now, meet the bags:

Everyday Backpack

Simply put, a backpack without compromises. Available in Charcoal and Ash, and in 20L and 30L sizes. Unless otherwise specified, all pictures are of the 20L Everyday Backpack.

What makes the Everyday Backpack so stacked?

 

Find your size

 

                                                                                                                                       

Everyday Tote

The classic tote bag, completely reimagined to protect, organize, and provide lightning-fast access to your camera gear and everyday carry (think beach, gym, traveling, diapers, etc). Available in Charcoal and Ash.

What makes the Everyday Tote so dope?

 

 

Everyday Sling

The ultimate low-profile, quick-access day bag for light carry and daily excursions. Makes a great bag for beginning photographers or pros who just want to carry essentials. Also a fantastic option for the non-photographer who just wants a sleek everyday bag. Available in Charcoal and Ash.

What makes the Everyday Sling so bling?

 

                 

Range Pouch

The Range Pouch is specifically designed to protect and carry lenses on belts, straps, or in bags, available in three sizes. Like our Everyday Bags, the Range Pouch is intelligently designed, expandable, versatile, and feature-packed. To pre-order Range Pouch, scroll down and click the links in the bottom of this section.
 
 
Why do we vouch for the Range Pouch?

How to pre-order the Range Pouch
Don't worry! Range Pouch is not listed with the rest of the Perks, but you can still pre-order it! Simply click one of the links below and provide payment info. Want more than one? Simply repeat the process.
When you click the link below, this page will reload and show the corresponding Range Pouch perk in the right column. Click "get this perk" and enter the required info. Then you're good to go!
  • Pre-Order a SMALL Range Pouch ($35)
  • Pre-Order a MEDIUM Range Pouch ($40)
  • Pre-Order a LARGE Range Pouch ($45)
  • Pre-Order ALL THREE ($120)
 

Comparison and Specs

 

Production Status

As we speak, Everyday Bags are being manufactured and shipped to one of our 5 global warehouses. Once all warehouses are stocked, and once we've finished fulfilling pre-orders from our Kickstarter campaign, we will ship out pre-orders made via Indiegogo. Items are expected to ship in December, 2016!

Everyday Tote assemblies awaiting additional sewing.

A stack of dies used to cut foam and fabric panels for our various bags.

Joey from the PD team doing a QA inspection of completed 20L Everyday Backpacks.

Everyday Backpack front panels awaiting one of their many stitching processes.

 

1% For The Planet

This year we have the privilege of joining 1% For The Planet. In doing so, we pledge to donate 1% of our revenue (gross revenue, not just profit) to a group of certified environmental nonprofits.

Thank you for your support!

We can't say it enough. Thank you for believing in us. We can't wait to get these new products in your hands.

 

FAQ

 

How do I order more than one bag?

You can only order 1 perk at a time (an Indiegogo limitation) so if you want multiple bags, you need to go through the ordering process multiple times. The downside is that you'll have to pay the shipping fee again, and your shipments will be sent separately. The upside is that you're still getting a great deal!

What is the warranty?

Lifetime, baby! All Peak Design products carry a lifetime guarantee. That means if any part becomes defective or dysfunctional over time we will repair or replace it free of charge.

What is the return policy?

 

While all of our products are guaranteed for life, we unfortunately do not offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo perks.

The support we get from our Indiegogo and Kickstarter backers is what enables us to run and grow our business, gather customer feedback, design new products and improve existing ones. In the crowdfunding community, the items that you receive after making a pledge are referred to as "perks" or "rewards" because they are not purchases in the traditional sense. They are gifts—in our case, sweet bags—that are sent to our supporters as a token of appreciation for their support of our business. In the same way that public television funds their service through the pledges of their supporters, who in turn receive gifts and continued programming, we have chosen to run and grow our business on a crowdfunded business model.

 

What size laptop will each bag hold?

 

 

The Everyday Backpack 20L/30L are designed to hold up to a 15 inch Macbook Pro, 2009 and later models.

The Everyday Sling and Everyday Tote is designed to hold up to a late model 13 inch Macbook Pro Retina.

We speak in terms of Mac models because a) we're based in San Francisco and it's what people do here and b) PC models come in a huge range of sizes. For those with PCs, here are the maximum outer laptop dimensions that our bags can fit:

Everyday Backpack 30L: 
16"x10.75"x1.5" (40x27x4cm)

Everyday Backpack 20L: 
15"x9.75"x1" (38x25x2.5cm)

Everyday Tote: 
12.5"x8.65"x.75" (32x22x2cm)

Everyday Sling: 
12.5"x8.65"x.75" (32x22x2cm)

If your laptop is within a cm of those dimensions, it should still work. But more than that and it probably won’t fit easily or at all.

 

What size tablet will each bag hold?

 

 

Everyday Backpack 30L: 
14" x 9" x 0.4"(33x23x1cm)

Everyday Backpack 20L: 
14" x 8.5" x 0.4" (33x22x1cm)

Everyday Tote: 
14.25"x9"x0.4" (33x23x1cm)

Everyday Sling**: 
12.5"x8.65"x.75" (32x22x2cm)

*Note that sling only has 1 sleeve, so can hold either a laptop OR tablet with these dims, but not both

 

 

To view our full FAQ, go to our Kickstarter Campaign Page and scroll all the way down to the bottom.

When you click the link below, this page will reload and show the corresponding Range Pouch perk in the right column. Click "get this perk" and enter the required info. Then you're good to go!


Pre-Order a SMALL Range Pouch ($35)


Pre-Order a MEDIUM Range Pouch ($40)


Pre-Order a LARGE Range Pouch ($45)


Pre-Order ALL THREE ($120)


   Comparison and Specs

 
Production Status
As we speak, Everyday Bags are being manufactured and shipped to one of our 5 global warehouses. Once all warehouses are stocked, and once we've finished fulfilling pre-orders from our Kickstarter campaign, we will ship out pre-orders made via Indiegogo. Items are expected to ship in December, 2016!

Everyday Tote assemblies awaiting additional sewing.

A stack of dies used to cut foam and fabric panels for our various bags.

Joey from the PD team doing a QA inspection of completed 20L Everyday Backpacks.

Everyday Backpack front panels awaiting one of their many stitching processes.
 
1% For The Planet
This year we have the privilege of joining 1% For The Planet. In doing so, we pledge to donate 1% of our revenue (gross revenue, not just profit) to a group of certified environmental nonprofits.
 
Thank you for your support!
We can't say it enough. Thank you for believing in us. We can't wait to get these new products in your hands.
   
FAQ
 
How do I order more than one bag?
You can only order 1 perk at a time (an Indiegogo limitation) so if you want multiple bags, you need to go through the ordering process multiple times. The downside is that you'll have to pay the shipping fee again, and your shipments will be sent separately. The upside is that you're still getting a great deal!
What is the warranty?
Lifetime, baby! All Peak Design products carry a lifetime guarantee. That means if any part becomes defective or dysfunctional over time we will repair or replace it free of charge.
What is the return policy?
 
While all of our products are guaranteed for life, we unfortunately do not offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo perks.
The support we get from our Indiegogo and Kickstarter backers is what enables us to run and grow our business, gather customer feedback, design new products and improve existing ones. In the crowdfunding community, the items that you receive after making a pledge are referred to as "perks" or "rewards" because they are not purchases in the traditional sense. They are gifts—in our case, sweet bags—that are sent to our supporters as a token of appreciation for their support of our business. In the same way that public television funds their service through the pledges of their supporters, who in turn receive gifts and continued programming, we have chosen to run and grow our business on a crowdfunded business model.
 
What size laptop will each bag hold?
 
 
The Everyday Backpack 20L/30L are designed to hold up to a 15 inch Macbook Pro, 2009 and later models.
The Everyday Sling and Everyday Tote is designed to hold up to a late model 13 inch Macbook Pro Retina.
We speak in terms of Mac models because a) we're based in San Francisco and it's what people do here and b) PC models come in a huge range of sizes. For those with PCs, here are the maximum outer laptop dimensions that our bags can fit:
Everyday Backpack 30L: 16"x10.75"x1.5" (40x27x4cm)
Everyday Backpack 20L: 15"x9.75"x1" (38x25x2.5cm)
Everyday Tote: 12.5"x8.65"x.75" (32x22x2cm)
Everyday Sling: 12.5"x8.65"x.75" (32x22x2cm)
If your laptop is within a cm of those dimensions, it should still work. But more than that and it probably won’t fit easily or at all.
  What size tablet will each bag hold? 
 
Everyday Backpack 30L: 14" x 9" x 0.4"(33x23x1cm)
Everyday Backpack 20L: 14" x 8.5" x 0.4" (33x22x1cm)
Everyday Tote: 14.25"x9"x0.4" (33x23x1cm)
Everyday Sling**: 12.5"x8.65"x.75" (32x22x2cm)
*Note that sling only has 1 sleeve, so can hold either a laptop OR tablet with these dims, but not both  
To view our full FAQ, go to our Kickstarter Campaign Page and scroll all the way down to the bottom.

story:
While the Breaker One is our first bag, this is definitely not our first rodeo. Years of design, research, planning, experience and creativity have gone into bringing the Breaker One to market.

Jon Paul, our lead industrial designer, has been iterating over his backpack designs, sampling prototypes (eight, to be exact), making adjustments and doing it all over again in an attempt to create an extremely versatile pack. He’s been plugging away for two years, and we feel he’s hit a design that’s worthy of the market.

Become a backer and help us kick start our company and let the Breaker One bag take you anywhere you want to go — in style, comfort, durability, and organizational perfection.

 

The Breaker One Bag is a travel backpack, a weekend warrior pack, an everyday commuter pack, a hiking pack or just about anything else you can think up. It's an extremely versatile pack that has all the features, pockets and compartments you need for all your stuff.  

 

 

 

3 pairs of pants, swim trunks, 5 shirts, 3 pairs of socks, underwear, shoes, laundry bag, glasses case, and a travel toiletry bag. All of this can fit in the main compartment leaving all the other compartments open to hold even more.

 

 

 

The Breaker One is a comfortable back pack. It distributes weight well, the shoulder straps are comfortable, and the padded back panel with air flow channels to keep you cool.  

 

Here are just a few suggested items you can fit into the bag.

 

Dimensions

Weight

 

 

Volume

 

Travel Accessories

 

All the accessories are included with the bag. 

 

 

 

The bag is made up of only the highest quality material and hardware. We want to make sure our bags will continue to keep your stuff protected and continue to take you around the world. 

 

 

 

 

1. Select your reward level.

2. Select your shipping destination.

3. Hit the "Continue" Button 

4. Confirm pledge

5. Sit back, relax, and get excited for your next trip with the Breaker One.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lead Designer: Jon Paul White

Marketing: David White

The Funds, The Moral Support & The Creatives: Jon & Susan White

 

 

Thanks to our family, friends, and everyone who has helped us throughout this excellent adventure. And thank you to all that have backed this campaign!

Shout out to:

Script: Matt Miller, Jon White

Music: Epidemic Sound

Video, brand, web & photography: Whitecap Interactive

 

Risks and Challenges

We've been working on the Breaker One bag for well over a year. The bag has evolved through a number of prototypes to tighten the design and functionality, and we're pretty stoked with the final result. 

The bag design is complete. Hardware is being ordered. The manufacturer is on standby. Shipping and fulfillment are in place. Once it is clear that the bag will fund, we will immediately begin production. We expect the first batch to ship by September 2018.

Of course there are always challenges and potential obstacles that can arise when trying to design, manufacture, and deliver a product to the marketplace. However we are confident that we are addressing all of these potential concerns, and fully expect to deliver a great product, and do it within the expected timeframe.

story:
What is MAKKER?

Skills and fun

MAKKER is a fantastically easy way for you to create a drone track for racing or precision flying. MAKKER doesn’t only make it fun to fly – you just can’t help getting better at flying the more you use it. 

MAKKER was originally developed for professional drone pilots but now it can fit any drone and, more importantly, any drone pilot can use it, regardless of skill or experience. That is why we are so proud to introduce MAKKER to you – it makes the great greater and everyone better.

 
The MAKKER that we use in this video are painted 3D shells, but what's inside is the actual thing!
 
 

Straight out of the box

With MAKKER you get a tag that attaches to your drone. You then simply place the three marks in order to make up the track anywhere you like. Then the MAKKER app will log your flying times and your precision progress. It is plug’n’play and works straight out of the box. When your drone passes or hovers over a mark, the tag itself lights up and the app gives you both visual and audible feedback as well as logging your time and improvements. It is as simple as that!

 

Getting ready to fly is as easy as one, two, three

1. Place the tag on you drone

2. Place the marks to build you racing or precision track

3. Open the app and fly

It really is that simple. You can place the marks inside or outside, on the ground, on the kitchen floor, under a table or in a tree. The great thing is that you can decide how difficult you want your track to be. When the drone passes over a mark it will be indicated by a blue flash as well as clear sound feedback from the app.

With the MAKKER app you can either choose precision or race mode to monitor your progress and flight times. The app will then help you determine who is fastest or the most precise (they are not the same thing at all) and you can challenge yourself or your friends to beat your own personal best. You can even duplicate tracks from the best drone pilots around the world and compare your flight skills and racing times against theirs.

 

Get racing

The MAKKER app measures the time spent from the first to last mark – it is that easy to get a race going and all the lap and split times are saved so you can monitor your progress. Even if you place a mark out of range, the tag will still remember passing the mark and transfer times once it gets within Bluetooth range.


FPV racing is a great challenge - and really great fun! Flying inside of an old abandoned building sounds fantastic!

Precision got even more precise

The app will measure time spent hovering over a mark. This can be used to improve the flying skills by keeping the drone stationery, even in crosswinds. And rotating the drone while keeping the drone stationary over a point in crosswinds is an even greater achievement.

Start flying. It is as simple as that!


Hovering over the same spot in a crosswind is not an easy task but will improve your drone skills.

Reliability is everything. As in EVERYTHING

We know that MAKKER simply has to work. Every time. So we are using tried, trusted and field-tested Bluetooth and infrared light technology.


The MAKKER tag


The MAKKER mark

The marks emit infrared light with a specific ID. The tag then registers the infrared light and forwards the information via Bluetooth to the MAKKER app in real time. 

A race is only ever over at the very end

MAKKER lets you easily set up a finishing line as well as waypoints to get both total times and split times when racing. Split times are like in Formula 1, the intermediate times between each point.

MAKKER will help you optimise turns and evaluate your overall performance and gives you the ability to compare your racing flight times with other FPV racers around the world. That is what the MAKKER community is for - just log in and duplicate the race track of your fellow drone pilots to compare race times.



“If we could get this thing – and it could track out lap times and act as gates when we race it would be a dream come true.”

                                                                            

Kenneth – drone race fanatic and engineering student

 

 

Bad weather? No problem!

 

Even indoors, MAKKER turns drone flying into a social activity by letting you compete in races as well as precision tasks and challenges. The tight spaces of your average living room mean you are going to have to push your skills even further.

 

“I often practice in hovering over a chair or a table, but it would be much more fun if I could get exact feedback on how much time I could stay at the same point.”
Lukas – 12 years

 

“I really feel that if I had one of these at home, I really would spend a lot of time every day practicing. It is really fun to work with precision, instead of just flying really fast over something.”
Aske – 12 years


Lucas and Aske challenging each other in the kitchen. Once they pull out the chairs the track becomes that much more challenging!

From school to prof

“MAKKER is the perfect tool for flight schools. Both instructor and student will benefit from its’ ability to monitor progress at the times when precise visual feedback is crucial.

Use MAKKER to practice and maintain your flying skills as a professional drone operator in order to increase the value and the product you deliver to your clients.

 

“I can see a huge potential in a product like MAKKER and would be happy to introduce it to the market. Given the coming development in drone technology, there is definitely a market opportunity. The various ways it can be used for play, training and competition opens for an enormous amount of possibilities.”
Kim Nielsen, owner of Morfars.dk – Denmark’s leading drone retailer.

 

The possibilities with MAKKER are endless – it's your imagination that makes great ideas.


Use your imagination to create challenging tracks.

Mount a mark on the roof of an RC truck and start the chase –  the possibilities are endless.

 

The story behind MAKKER
 


Mikkel Barker (commercial pilot, flight, and aerobatic instructor)

“In November 2016 I bought a Phantom 2 drone to use in my business and spent a great deal of time practicing and developing my flight skills. In this process, I really found I was missing something that could provide the feedback needed to improve.

For instance, when I was trying to rotate over the same position in even the mildest summer breeze it was a real challenge and with just a little wind it would be almost impossible.

This was the start of MAKKER, to create a tool that would give precise feedback from your drone. MAKKER has taken many forms since then but we have always stuck to the basic concept – to invent an electronic device that can give you real-time feedback from your drone”

 

And the team behind MAKKER


From left to right – Founder, Mikkel Barker, partner Michel Riis, partner Christain Duus.

Mikkel Barker: “MAKKER has long been my brainchild and together with the team of dedicated professionals I am very excited to bring MAKKER to the drone community.”

Christian Duus: "Being responsible for the user experience, it is my job to ensure that all development is made with the end-user in mind. I have a background in interaction design and storytelling, and I am super excited to be a part of the MAKKER team."

Michel Riis: “I am responsible for the design of MAKKER and design and quality is extremely important to me. All design decisions have to mean that the user gets the best possible experience. Having worked as a designer for Yamaha Motors my heart is on fire for the race side of MAKKER and I look forward to a lot of racing.”

 

But we are not the only ones!

In February this year, MAKKER partnered with Innovation on Wings as well as teaming up with the University of Southern Denmark’s Center for UAS, Centre for Integrative Innovation Management (C*I2M) and UAS Test Center Denmark.

We also collaborate with Amfitech, a company that has years of experience with LEGO and whos dedicated team of electronics engineers are focused on developing easy-to-use technology that brings value and fun to a range of end-user applications. Amfitech works within the fields of high performance, cost-efficient tracking, IR and wireless technologies.

 

Help us get MAKKER flying

We are in the final stages of the development and we need you. All the product details are specified, the technology frame is in place and we are raring to get over the finishing line.

We are a dedicated team looking for the extra capital to do further testing and development. We love drones and have identified an untapped corner of a market that builds and grows relationships, both with the drone itself and even more importantly through the drone to other users.

With you, we want to be part of that.


Hard work and coffee!


Our studio is filled with inspiration from the field.


Working with rapid prototyping has made it possible to test the concept from a very early stage.


We have tested MAKKER on fanatic droneyoungsters .


We have tested the MAKKER concept in a parking garage with cool FPV drone pilots!


The time-lapse above is from the making of our Indiegogo movie! A beautiful day outdoors and a great team to accomplish the task!


MAKKER has taken many forms during the design and testing process!
 


After teaming up with our tech partner we designed the PCB and had a shipment sent over.


Getting the parts home to complete the build of the first MAKKER.


Coding all day - and still coding. Things are looking great! :-)


Who said coding and testing was an easy task? Things work great! We have a good reliable Bluetooth connection, and sunlight doesn't spoil the infrared light signal! 

Risks and challenges

We are quite far in the development of Makker and have already experienced some of the risks and challenges associated with the creation of a new technology product! 

There are still challenges ahead, but we are doing our very best to tackle them as soon as they appear and we promise you, that we will be open and transparent and keep you well informed through the process!

We have teamed up with Amfitech in Denmark on the technology side, and their extensive experience in developing new technology is very important for the success. Among their customers are Lego, and together with them, we have the right people and the know how to see this project through – right till it lands on your doorstep!

We have already started preparing the production and we believe it is realistic to deliver MAKKER before Christmas. The MAKKER app is also planned to be available for download before Christmas! We expect to first deliver an android version and soon after the IOS version.
