story:
Carrying loads for an extended period, even when they are not heavy, during a trip is no fun.

You have already spent a lot on clothes, shoes and glasses to gear up for your trip and now it’s time to take good care of your NECK and SHOULDERS, making your trip EASIER and more CONVENIENT.

 WHAT BAG MATE MEANS

Comes with an air cushion to make loads feel lighter, to relax your shoulders and to improve your posture. 

Featuring functional & hidden pockets for added convenience during your trips.

When needed, It’s a spare pocket or can even be worn alone as a cross-body bag. 

It’s ultra-compatible and can be installed on any bags.

Customizable to meet your own requirements.

<

<

 

 

"IT FEELS JUST LIKE WEARING A PAIR OF NIKE AIR SHOES ON YOUR SHOULDER"

We were inspired by NIKE AIR shoes to adapt our own, patented, AIR TECH for NEX, and have made a bag mate that is compatible with 95% of the bags on the market. 

This innovative design evenly distributes the weight across your entire shoulder, making loads feel at least 30% lighter, while keeping your neck, back, and shoulders aligned in a relaxed position to improve your posture. 

The interlinked Air System connects each individual air unit with nitrogen. This gives better pressure distribution, making your shoulder feel comfortably supportive. 

"A PERFECT GIFT FOR ALL YOUR BAGS" 

Thanks to our innovative wrap-around method, NEX will fit on over 95% of bag straps, camera straps, messenger straps and baby carriers, Which means no problems or headaches when installing.

"YOU CAN CARRY MORE, BOTH IN YOUR BAG AND IN THE NEX"

Our functional pocket is the perfect convenience hack for travelers, commuters, and photographers.

It's expandable, meaning that it looks slim when empty, but is spacious when loaded. It can comfortably store your passport, power bank and phone at the same time.

"THE BAG MATE UPGRADES YOUR BAG INTO A $100 TRAVEL BAG IN JUST ONE SEC"

Access your phone at any time, even when it’s charging. 

Keeping your passport and flight ticket in your pocket is risky. Putting them in your bag isn’t much better, as pulling them out over and over again can be a hassle. NEX solves both of these problems with its functional pocket.

It’s also bigger than it looks. Each strap has 3 inner pockets that can store all of your essential items, not just some of them. That means your charging cables, earphones, extra batteries, SD cards, lens cap and much more.

"A SPARE CHEST POCKET FOR MESSENGER AND CAMERA BAGS"

Want to use NEX as a chest pocket? Just pull it down and that’s exactly what you’ll get. This feature makes NEX perfect for messenger and camera bags.

"KEEP YOUR VALUABLES SECURE AND LITERALLY INVISIBLE"

We designed the hidden pocket to carry small everyday items like cash, keys, and cards. 

It is covered by the upper strap and is completely secured. That means never having to worry about anything slipping out, even if it’s upside down.

An added benefit of it being hidden is safety. You won’t have to worry about anyone going into your pocket and taking your valuables.

"NO NEED TO CARRY ANY EXTRA BAG ON YOUR TRIP ANY MORE! YOUR BAG MATE IS THE ONE FOR YOU"

NEX also stands alone as a compact cross-body bag. All you have to do is clip it on and adjust the fit. Once it’s secured, you’ll be ready to go.

"A NIGHT RUN TOUR WITH NEX DURING YOUR TRIP IS SOMETHING YOU NEED TO TRY "

Tighten your strap with the simple slide-up function. Once the fit is just right, you can use NEX when jogging or at the gym.

*

"A CUSTOMIZED NEX BY YOU"

NEX comes in black, red, blue, green, or yellow.

Even better, you can mix and match your favorite color combination. This allows you to show off your personality and style while using your strap.

<You will be able to choose your color scheme in a survey after the Kickstarter Campaign ends > 

 

 "DON'T WANT OUR LOGO ON YOUE NEX? NO PROBLEM!" 

At Addon Design, we understand that some people like products with logos, while others do not. That’s why we keep our NEX strap blank. 

 

"NEX AND NIKE, THEY REALLY COST THE SAME " 

The best-looking and most functional strap in the world is still a bad deal if it is low quality. Luckily, we construct NEX with the highest levels of craftsmanship possible. We even use recycled materials to make it Eco-Friendly.

Spacious on the inside, 100% waterproof on the outside. 

NEX’s knitted mesh material is soft, has a good thickness, and incorporates Ultra-Cool Technology. The result is an incredibly breathable and comfortable wearing experience. 

Beautiful stitch free construction, with a natural, ergonomically designed shape. 

"The air cushion is literally undestroyable"

 

 

<You can upgrade your add-ons in the cart when you check out>

Cross-body Bag Add On 

For just $5, you can make your NEX a cross-body bag with 1 strap & 2 ring buckles.

 

Our journey begins in 2016.   

Addon Design is a collection of designers, photographers, and engineers with a single purpose: to give users the absolute best experience possible.   

The NEX, as well as all of our other accessories, are the result of this devotion to functionality, convenience, and quality.

 

 

Really appreciate your attention and interest in NEX.

Thank you!

- Song: Closer

-Artist: Duck House 

Risks and challenges

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we meet with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.

Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we meet with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.

UPDATE: We are officially SOLD OUT for our first shipment! 
Visit us as www.alderapparel.com to pre-order your pants for July 2020.
-------
Delivering end of May 2020, introducing the open-air pants by alder. designed for women, alder offers inclusive sizing (xs-4x) and creates comfortable, flattering, responsibly-made clothing packed with functionality. made to perform for every adventure and everyday wear, alder moves with you wherever you go. 


See more sizing images here.
 







 
  
  
alder co-founders, national geographic explorer mikayla wujec and top fashion marketer naomi blackman, created the open-air pant with ex-lululemon and Arc’teryx designers and crowd-sourced feedback from more than 600 women. the result? ultra-flattering pants that feature a high waist fit, a tapered leg, SEVEN pockets, a D-ring key clip, and innovative reflective strips for RECreating at night. they are breathable, moisture-wicking and have four-way stretch so you can be prepared, feel good and look great.

story:
All Pre-Ordered Bags Will Be Delivered November 2015



DRONEFLYERS | CROWDUNDING CENTRE | DRONEBLOG


The SWIZA Drone Transport Backpack is loaded with features that will maximize your drone experience including:



The feature rich SWIZA Drone Transport Backpack is designed & engineered to make transporting your drone easier & safer.


1).  When will I get my product?

All pre-ordered bags will be shipped November 2015

2).  What are the dimensions?

3).  What are the most common drones the backpack fits?

Nearly every commercially produced four arm drone along with some five and six arm drones.

4).  How strong is the velcro?

The quad strap system is designed using the same durable and heavy duty outdoor velcro found in standard camping equipments keeping even the heaviest drones in safe hands.

5). What's the SWIZA T-Shirt look like?

For generations the people of the Swiss Jura Mountain region have been meticulously crafting many of the world’s best timepieces. Over the years economical events have caused many of these legacy families and brands to contract and combine. A handful of industrialists and visionaries in the Jura canton have banded together to reverse this trend.

We envision a brand that is the trusted, helpful friend for the daily adventures of active people on their journey from home to their destination.

A 111 years old brand that is synonymous with all of the attributes of Swissness since 1904 and has now become the new standard of quality for versatile, durable, affordable and thoughtfully designed products. A brand that proudly continues the tradition and herit­age of quality built by our Swiss ancestors.

Born in 1904: SWIZA the next generation of Swiss brand.

story:
G-RO is the world's first bag in a whole new category: it's a companion bag—a bag specifically designed to accompany on-the-go people, whether they are traveling around the block or around the globe. 

We all know travel can be a hassle. The more you do it, the more tiring and frustrating it becomes. To get from here to there, too many of us depend on inferior bags, travel gear and accessories. 

So, we set out to design a bag that is better than anything else available. Here are six reasons we think G-RO really is different, and better, than any other bag: 

 

 

1. G-RO IS YOUR COMPANION BAG

It's a new kind of crossover bag: a companion bag. We designed it for on-the-go people to be large enough to take on a week-long trip yet maneuverable, durable and light enough for your daily commute.

2. WHEEL INNOVATION

All other rolling luggage is basically a box on casters. Their little wheels break more often; they travel badly over bumps, bricks, grates, snow and sand; they weaken the luggage design with more rivets, screws and reinforcements; they require more parts to assemble and break; they reduce the available volume; and they often cause awkward nooks in the interior space.  

But because of our ingenious patented wheel design, G-RO:  

  • feels lighter: the center of gravity of the load is closer of the center of the wheels;
  • rolls easier: the big wheels perform so much better over all terrains, and glide effortlessly on smooth surfaces;
  • lasts longer: the case and wheels are integrally designed and reinforce each other; 
  • packs smarter: there's more interior space than other bags of similar weight and volume;
  • looks better: form follows function, and these wheels tell you this is smart design.

3. TOP-NOTCH HANDLING

Our aircraft-grade aluminum handle is longer and stronger, too. It extends six inches further than the industry standard, with stops at multiple levels for people of all heights. This gives you better leverage than other rollaboards, and makes it extra comfortable to pull your G-RO.

4. BUILT TOUGH

We designed G-RO from the strongest and smartest materials:

  • Ballistic nylon
  • Aerospace and firearm-grade polymers
  • Top-quality YKK nylon zippers with a unique (and patented) "roller coaster" design that distributes any stress
  • Waterproof base and arched belly to stay dry and avoid scrapes.

5. ROOM FOR WORK AND PLAY

  • A spacious interior compartment for personal items
  • A compartment for work items — and it can charge your laptop while you travel
  • A personal pocket for essentials.

6. SUPER POWER

G-RO has a built-in tablet stand and charging station with two USB ports. And with G-RO Power and G-RO Tracker, your G-RO has:

  • A battery with enough juice (23,000 mAh) to charge your phone, tablet and laptop all at once—that's enough power to charge your smartphone up to 10X
  • A universal DC output to charge your laptop
  • A location tracker
  • A wireless proximity detector.

REINVENTING THE WHEEL

Most luggage is literally a drag. Back in 1596, the term “luggage” was coined from the word “lug” which means “to drag.” Surprisingly, over 400 years later, most of us are still lugging around our bags. Rollaboards were developed in the 1980's, but their small wheels, while an improvement, still haven’t done much to make a bag feel lighter.

Take a look at our wheels and we think you'll see why they work so much better:

G-RO's wheels make the bag to feel lighter while also being more spacious and more durable.

 

Because of their large diameter, the wheels support the load closer to its center of gravity, so your bag balances better and feels significantly lighter when you pull it. 

 

G-RO glides easily over any kind of terrain—cobblestones, curbs, steps, gravel, snow, sand.

 

Because our wheels are on the outside of the bag, our bag offers a larger packable space compared to typical rolling bags.

Our wheels are made of super strong aerospace and firearm-grade polymers that strengthen the walls of the bag. Unlike traditional bags, the wheels are the strength of this bag—not the weakness.

 

LONG, STRONG, ERGONOMIC HANDLE

G-RO's aircraft grade aluminum four-stage telescoping handle is more than six inches longer than the industry standard! The handle stops at multiple levels and is great for people of all heights. It provides better leverage and comfort.

SUPER STRONG MATERIALS

The body of G-RO is made of high quality Cordura ballistic nylon and mold-injected aerospace-grade polymers. It’s crush proof and water resistant, keeping your belongings safe and sound.

The zippers are high quality YKK zippers.  G-RO’s unique “roller coaster” zipper design helps distribute any stress across the zipper, creating a longer zipper life.

ARCHED BELLY DESIGN AND WATERPROOF BASE

G-RO’s arched belly design ensures the bag doesn’t scrape on the ground. 

To protect your items from water damage, G-RO's bottom protective panel consists of a plastic shell over a waterproof, plastic-coated ballistic nylon textile to ensure that nothing gets wet. 

 

WORK PLAY COMPARTMENTS FOR WORK LIFE BALANCE

G-RO has an internal compartment for your personal items and an external compartment for your work items, because no one likes to show their “unmentionables” at a business meeting (or at least most people).

G-RO helps your private items stay private, but gives you immediate easy access to the items you need while traveling or working. 

 

SPACIOUS INTERIOR COMPARTMENT FOR PERSONAL ITEMS

G-RO’s spacious and private interior compartment is designed for easier packing. It includes: 

  • A detachable flat packing divider for items you want to keep separate or wrinkle-free, 
  • Plenty of mesh pockets for packing options, 
  • A removable garment bag for your dress clothes, 
  • A TSA-friendly lock for added security

 

"NO FISHING" COMPARTMENT FOR WORK ITEMS

Ever feel like you’re blindly fishing for items in your bag? G-RO solves that problem with its organized, easy-access external compartment. It includes:

  • padded pockets for your 15” laptop
  • plenty of other places for your tablet, papers, pens, etc. 

 

 

 

PERSONAL POCKET FOR ESSENTIALS AND WATER BOTTLE HOLDER

Tucked in the area of G-RO's handle, this easy access pocket holds your passport or any other essential items you want to keep safe and close to you. It also has a convenient water bottle holder.

 

BUILT-IN CHARGING STATION AND TABLET STAND

A Built-In Charging Station is built into the top of each G-RO. This water-resistant charging station includes 2 iPad-strength USB outlets.

NOTE: To charge your devices from the Built-In Charging Station, you must first purchase and connect G-RO Power or your own portable charger to the charging cables located in G-RO’s interior compartment. See the "G-RO Power and G-RO Tracker" section below for details.

When open, G-RO's handle functions as a tablet stand! 

G-RO POWER & G-RO TRACKER

G-RO Power and G-RO Tracker (formerly known as the Optional Electronic Module) is a $175 value.

G-RO Power includes:

  • A 23,000 mAh battery
  • 2 USB ports (that connect to built-in wires, which power the Built-In Charging Station on the top of the bag)
  • 1 universal DC output
  • The charging adapters and cables you need for common laptops
And G-RO Tracker includes:
  • A location tracker 
  • A proximity detector
  • Integration with G-RO App

 

Because we’re confident in G-RO’s durability and we think it will stay with you for years, we chose not to build G-RO Power or G-RO Tracker into the bag. We realize that electronics often need an upgrade or need to be replaced. We also wanted to give you the option of using both components outside of G-RO! 

With G-RO Power, you can charge your laptop, tablet and smartphone all at once.

 

G-RO POWER: PORTABLE BATTERY

The Optional Electronic Module's G-RO Power has a 23,000 mAh battery, which is strong enough to charge your smartphone up to 10 times! 

G-RO TRACKER: LOCATION TRACKER AND PROXIMITY DETECTOR

G-RO Tracker uses GSM-GPRS technology for location tracking and Bluetooth Smart/Bluetooth Low Energy technology for proximity detection. Using G-RO's mobile app, you can track the global location and proximity of your G-RO. Our app is compatible with iOS and Android smart phones that support BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy). 

You’ll never lose your G-RO or have to join the crowd at the baggage carousel unnecessarily. You'll be alerted if the bag gets too far away from you. 

For those of you that want to track your bag beyond your immediate vicinity, you can sign up for sign up for the following affordable tracking subscriptions through our G-RO mobile app: (1) Month $4.99, (6) Months $19.99, or (12) Months $29.99. 

You will have unlimited, free proximity alerts with G-RO Tracker.

After 11 days of placing your order, you will receive a survey via email where you can select your color. 

We offer $15 SHIPPING to the United States. For the rest of the world, please check your shipping rate on the check-out menu while backing the project.

GUARANTEED FOR LIFE ...   

We designed and build G-RO to last a lifetime and we stand behind the quality and durability of our products. If your bag ever breaks down, just ship it back to us. We'll either repair it or replace it, and return it to you. It's our lifetime guarantee to you.

...BECAUSE THAT'S HOW WE ROLL.

The latest “game-changing” luggage configuration - the four-wheel “spinner“ luggage with 360 degree turning capabilities, was introduced globally by Samsonite in 1990, more than 25 years ago, but the problem with four-wheel luggage is that it doesn’t really work anywhere except on a perfectly flat surface.

More than half of the time people carry their four-wheeled bags in a tilted position, because it’s far more comfortable. If you’re moving over a rough surface, it’s impossible to pull a four-wheeled bag. You’re basically just dragging the weight. Ergonomically, it’s better for you to have the bag pulled slightly behind you than directly at your side. In tight spaces, it’s nearly impossible to roll a bag by your side, so four-wheel users tilt the bag and pull it behind themselves to cut through a crowd. Lastly, if the bag is heavy, maneuvering it can become tiring on the wrist, and with today’s mega terminals, it can be hard to push them for long distances.

Besides the impracticality of using a four-wheel bag in many scenarios, the four-wheel bags have wheels that protrude and therefore are more likely to catch and break. It’s particularly inconvenient when it’s the ones you need for walking with the bag tilted. Lastly, despite these negatives, one still must pay a 20-30% premium price for these four-wheeled models.

story:
Short Summary

Long Beach, NY is a barrier island off of Long Island that is home to 33,000+ people. In the wake of Hurricane Sandy, this city has faced unfathomable devastation with many of it's people losing priceless possessions, their homes, and in a few especially tragic cases, family members. If you are fortunate enough to have come away from Hurricane Sandy unscathed, I urge you to make a donation to help the city of Long Beach get back on it's feet.

 

The Impact: At A Glance

While we cannot accurately access the fiscal impact of the devastation, it's certain that goverment relief alone will not help all those affected by Sandy. To give you an idea of what the locals are currently dealing with:

- Long beach no longer has usable water as the sewage has seaped into the clean water supply.                                                                    

- There are reports of oil and fuel spills.                                                      

- Several homes in the canals were destroyed by fire.                            

- Bridges are open ONLY to first responders and walkers (anyone can leave)    

- There is no cell service. there is intermittent landline service.                      

- All neighborhoods experienced flooding, most cars are destroyed.                

- Certain homes had 2 stories of total flooding. At minimum, homes experienced basement and first floor flooding.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If anybody has clothes, blankets, canned food, or anything else you're willing to part with please send to our donation center located at:

157 E Sunrise Hwy

Freeport, NY 11520.

OR if you're a Long Beach resident, feel free to drop off donations at:

City Hall

1 West Chester St.

Long Beach, NY 11561

 

More Videos and Resources

https://www.facebook.com/LongBeachNyHurricaneInformation?fref=ts

http://www.news12.com/articleDetail.jsp?articleId=338811&position=1&news_type=news

http://www.newsday.com/users/user-content/long-beach-pummeled-1.4171466

story:
In The Press


Our Story

We were headed to Europe for a 2 week trip. After 6 months of planning and saving, we were ready to leave for Rome. Boarding the plane, my passport got denied by the gate agent because of 'wear and tear.' Even though I had used my passport before and thought it was in fine shape, the airline denied me getting on the plane. Total nightmare!

We were stuck in the States and had to fly to another city. All told, we lost 4 days on our trip and it cost $2500 to salvage the vacation. When we finally made it to Europe, I was wondering how I could have prevented the whole situation. I came up with the idea for The Passport Protector - a hardcore passport case to prevent what we went through. 

We're passionate about travel and making sure other people don't have the same mishap. Protect your passport so you can get on with the fun and beauty of travel. Plus, a percentage of sales from each unit will go towards study abroad scholarships to give more people the chance to travel. 

                       



What We Need & What You Get

  • We've spent the past 6 months working with designers and engineers to create the ideal case for world travelers.
  • Prototypes are finished and with your backing we can invest in manufacturing to launch the final product.
  • Our manufacturer estimates steel injection molding will cost around $20,000. 


Our Estimated Timeline 



The Impact: Ensuring Worldwide Travel

  • Instead of griping for the rest of our lives, we wanted to create a product that solves the problem. 
  • We've also been fortunate to be able to travel, and we want to use proceeds to allow more students to study abroad. 
  • A set amount from each unit sold will go towards study abroad scholarships.


Quick Facts

  • As a traveler, you are ultimately responsible for providing 'adequate documentation.' The airline is not responsible.
  • We had travel insurance and recommend it, but it does not cover any delays/cancellations for a denied or damaged passport.
  • New or renewed passport fees alone can cost $80 - +$300 and normal processing takes 4-6 weeks
  • If your passport is 'damaged' you must also present an original birth certificate to replace the old one
  • Passport FAQs


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Send our campaign to friends you think might be interested.
  • Let us know if you're connected to any bloggers or press who might be interested in our story.
  • Check out the product and give us some feedback.
story_txt:
In The Press
Our StoryWe were headed to Europe for a 2 week trip. After 6 months of planning and saving, we were ready to leave for Rome. Boarding the plane, my passport got denied by the gate agent because of 'wear and tear.' Even though I had used my passport before and thought it was in fine shape, the airline denied me getting on the plane. Total nightmare!We were stuck in the States and had to fly to another city. All told, we lost 4 days on our trip and it cost $2500 to salvage the vacation. When we finally made it to Europe, I was wondering how I could have prevented the whole situation. I came up with the idea for The Passport Protector - a hardcore passport case to prevent what we went through. We're passionate about travel and making sure other people don't have the same mishap. Protect your passport so you can get on with the fun and beauty of travel. Plus, a percentage of sales from each unit will go towards study abroad scholarships to give more people the chance to travel.                        What We Need & What You Get
We've spent the past 6 months working with designers and engineers to create the ideal case for world travelers.
Prototypes are finished and with your backing we can invest in manufacturing to launch the final product.
Our manufacturer estimates steel injection molding will cost around $20,000. 
Our Estimated Timeline The Impact: Ensuring Worldwide Travel
Instead of griping for the rest of our lives, we wanted to create a product that solves the problem. 
We've also been fortunate to be able to travel, and we want to use proceeds to allow more students to study abroad. 
A set amount from each unit sold will go towards study abroad scholarships.
Quick Facts
As a traveler, you are ultimately responsible for providing 'adequate documentation.' The airline is not responsible.
We had travel insurance and recommend it, but it does not cover any delays/cancellations for a denied or damaged passport.
New or renewed passport fees alone can cost $80 - +$300 and normal processing takes 4-6 weeks
If your passport is 'damaged' you must also present an original birth certificate to replace the old one
Passport FAQs
Other Ways You Can Help
Send our campaign to friends you think might be interested.
Let us know if you're connected to any bloggers or press who might be interested in our story.
Check out the product and give us some feedback.

story:
WHO ARE WE –

We are husband and wife duo, Jordan and Crystal Frank-Shannon and we are thrilled about VanGo being an opportunity for us to utilize our years of experience and knowledge in the automotive, business, and helping industries to make life easier for our community and fill it with more smiles. Camping, travel, unique adventures, family, and serving others are some of our favorites so VanGo makes sense.

 

WHAT THIS CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT –

Jordan’s dream has been to own an auto repair shop that goes over and beyond for customers, staff, and the community. One way we will achieve and deliver this dream is through renting VW Vanagon Campervans. Last fall, we packed up our family to road trip 5,500 miles and visit six Vanagon rental shops throughout the country. These companies reported that they cannot keep up with demand. Customers simply loved their old school retro road trip adventure. There are no VW Vanagon rental companies in the Midwest and VanGo does not want the Midwest to miss out on these classic rides any longer.

 

WHAT WE NEED SUPPORT FOR –

We need your support to help us get a fleet of four VW Vanagons on the Midwest roads. Currently, we have enough funds to complete our two current Vanagons; however, we need your help to update the next two vans (i.e. new bumpers, new fridge, awnings, replacing worn out parts, ensuring they are in tip top shape mechanically, etc.) purchased in March-April. Please help us gift the Midwest people with the opportunity to experience what the VW Vanagon Campervan hype is all about; after all, the rest of the nation is geeking out about it because it’s so cool. The chart below allows one to understand the benefits of the VanGo rentals.

 

HOW MUCH SUPPORT WE NEED –

To fund VanGo, we have put our life’s savings into this exciting venture, have two banks working with us, a nonprofit, Department of Economic Employment and Development, and personal loans from friends/family. The $12,500 we are campaigning for here will enable us put those last two classics reliably on the road and looking good. This dream and gift to the Midwest would not be possible without a community of supporters. Whoa – thank you for being a part of that community!

 

PERKS FOR SUPPORTING VANGO

No, not this cute baby Ivy but one of the perks is a vacation in the Vanagon behind us!

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

One of the largest obstacles is securing four quality Vanagons and preparing these classics to be rental ready. Two vans are almost rental ready and now we will purchase two more vans and update them in the quick turnaround time of a few months. This challenge doesn’t frighten us though because we are ambitious to make a dream become reality.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Please, please use Indigogo’s share tools or use the hashtag #VanGoAuto and tag us! Below you will find our links. If you have friends/family that enjoy the outdoors, camping, traveling, new experiences, classics – send them our way and maybe they will want to offer us their love through this communal campaign. Seriously, thank you for your support and involvement – it truly is a treasured thing!  Peace and Love, Crystal, Jordan, Ivy, and Ron

http://vangoautomotive.com/

https://www.facebook.com/vangoautomotive/

https://www.instagram.com/vangoauto/?hl=en

https://twitter.com/VangoAuto

story:
None of us want to pay to check in a bag. We want to travel with a single bag that we can take on board, that gives us easy access to the things we need. The Arcido Bag is the perfect carry-on bag that protects your stuff and keeps you super-organised.

Choosing the right bag relies on much more than looking good. It’s about feeling secure and comfortable when you travel, with enough versatility to adapt to different situations. The Arcido Bag was designed with your entire journey in mind. From packing to airport security and beyond. 



 

 

 

Our story

Felix and I met in Edinburgh last summer - we had both been pursuing our own bag projects independently and saw an opportunity to work together. I’d been buying bags and selling them online for a few years but was frustrated with the quality of design. Felix takes pride in designing quality products which people love, particularly soft products. He also loves travelling so between us we figured we could combine our experience to create and deliver something really remarkable. 

We're both passionate about one-bag travel. Our dream was to be able to take everything we need to work on the road in a single bag that goes as hand luggage. As people who work on our laptops, we want our tech to be well-protected and easy to access. We already have one bag in production and on the market. This allowed us to work closely with our manufacturers to create the initial designs, and around 6 months finalising the product. The result is The Arcido Bag!

Rewards

In return for supporting the project now, you can get you hands on a number of rewards first, at a heavily discounted price.
 

Design Process

‘One bag travel’ is all about functionality and convenience. The concept was to design a bag for those who don’t want their gear to hold their travel experience back. We travel a lot so our target group was initially ourselves although later we worked with friends, family and other people who spend lots of time on the move to understand what are the big travel annoyances which we can address. Following our research, we moved quickly from sketches to prototyping, trialling, testing and improving until now where we have refined the design and developed a production ready sample.

Production

We have searched far and wide for a manufacturer who can construct our products to the highest standard under fair working conditions. We spent many weeks working with our chosen manufacturing partner and we’re delighted with both the quality of workmanship and their demonstration of ethical business practice.

Distribution

We've tried to be as proactive as possible to ensure that we distribute the goods as quickly as possible. We've paired up with an extremely competent distribution company with warehouses across the world. We know that they're the best for the job!

Arcido

Arcido was set up to make one-bag travel easier and smarter. We’re based in Edinburgh, UK but spend as much time travelling as we can. Travelling with a bag on your back leaves you feeling more free do what you what you want so it’s definitely the way that we prefer to travel. We couldn’t find a bag that fulfilled our functional criteria so we’ve built a brand to make the best, beautiful carry-on bags.

Your Support

It’s already taken more than 6 months of hard work to get The Arcido Bag into what we think is the perfect carry-on bag. Now we’re looking for backers to help us fund our initial production run. Reaching our goal will mean we’ve got enough funds to cover our manufacturer’s minimum order requirement. Having received great feedback from product testers and reviewers, we’re confident The Arcido Bag is going to be a success. And we’re looking forward to making more travel bags in the future!

We want as many people to know about our project as possible so we would be really grateful if you were to share our campaign on Facebook and Twitter. We really appreciate your support!                             
 

 

 

 

 


Press

Interested in writing about our project? You can find a press release and  images here. Need something else? Fancy a chat? Just email us at press@arcido.com





Risks and challenges

Between us we’ve worked for a number of companies producing soft products handling all aspects of bringing new bags to market so this definitely isn’t our ‘first rodeo’!

We’ve also meticulously planned the campaign which should mean that the production and fulfilment process runs smoothly. That said, some eventualities are uncontrollable but we’ll do everything we can to prevent delays. We also promise to keep our supporters updated with progress.

What is Kickstarter?

Kickstarter is a crowdfunding platform that allows creators to fund projects. It's a way of guaranteeing us customers when we launch our product - your pledge goes into a total pot which we put towards the cost of producing and distributing our product. Once we have enough pledges, we'll have enough funds to go into production.

You aren't charged until our funding period ends. However Kickstarter will place a temporary block on your card for the amount you pledge.

If you pledge, it'll take a few months to receive your bag. That's because our manufacturing time is 40 days, and it takes around 30 days to ship the product to Europe/USA by sea. However, by backing our project now you'll get a much better deal on the bag - all our pledge tiers are lower than the RRP. You're also helping to support an early stage startup, and for that we're really grateful!

story:
Introducing TRON - XD

The Award-Winning world’s first fingerprint shackle lock eliminates the need for keys and combinations while securing bikes, scooters and even doors with an alloy shackle that’s light on weight but not on security. TRON – XD is the first shackle lock to combine smart biometric fingerprint recognition technology with the strength of an innovative alloy shackle and silicon overmoulding for style and safety. 

 

Fingerprint identification saves you from keys, combinations, and lock picking, protecting your bicycle, e-bike or even industrial doors, for the first time with the strength of an alloy shackle lock.

Multi-Use Locking

 

 

How it Works: Fingerprint Security

TRON – XD’s ANSI / INCIT 378 and ISO / IEC 19794-2 compliant fingerprint sensor opens in just half a second for fast access while 14 mm thick alloy shackle prevents cutting and deters theft. Setup is quick and easy, with no app or computer necessary: everything you need is in the lock itself.

Advanced Fingerprint Sensor

TRON – XD’s identification system is capable of high resolution (508 dpi), 360 degree all-direction scanning. Multispectral recognition reads your fingerprint whether dry, normal, wet or oily. TRON – XD’s "machine learning" adapts itself to your finger positioning, for better scanning over time.

 

More Features than the Average Lock

Lightweight silicon overmoulded shackle

Integrated silicon overmoulded design and alloy shackle prevent theft and protects bike frames from scratching.

Rainproof

TRON – XD’s design protects from rain and snow, so there’s no worry about damage from ordinary weather and usage.

Long-lasting battery life

Lithium polymer rechargeable battery provides 2200 openings on a full charge and can be easily recharged with a portable charger and Micro USB cable (included).

Emergency Manual Unlocking

TRON - XD fingerprint shackle locks come with a high security abloy key (2000 unique key combinations) for manual opening in the event of a battery discharge.

Withstands Sub-Zero Conditions

TRON - XD is tested at temperatures below freezing, so you can trust its reliability even in extreme environments.

Faster Than Any Other Lock

With TRON - XD there's no fumbling for keys or turning of dials.

TRON - XD: A Fusion of Design and Technology

Specifications

Total Fingerprint Capacity: 20

Dimensions: Regular Shackle: 74 x 128mm 

Fingerprint identification: Compliance with ANSI / INCIT 378 and ISO/IEC 19794-2

Battery: Lithium polymer rechargeable 420mAh 3.7V

Battery Life: about 2200 openings on a full charge

Weight: 566g (1.24lbs)

Operating Temperature:  –20°C to 45°C / -4°F to 113°F

Housing Material: ABS + Zinc Alloy

Shackle Material: Aluminum Alloy

Tensile Strength: 550kg (1212lbs)

This product is rainproof (equivalent to IPX4), though heavy rain and severe weather may damage the product; use with caution.

Charging: On low battery, the lock will beep 5 times. LED will turn red while charging and blue on full charge.

Emergency Charge: in case of low battery or malfunction, use Micro USB cable (included) and portable charger (not included) for temporary charge or use manual key to unlock

What's in the box: 1. TRON – XD Fingerprint Shackle Lock x 1  2. Micro USB Charging Cable x 1 3. Operating Manual 4. Spare key x 2 

Diagrams + Parts

Perks

To thank you for your support, we're offering your choice of perks featuring the TRON - XD Fingerprint Shackle Lock with either the Spyder Team mobile phone holder or the Piccadilly LTD multipurpose cable lock, or the Piccadilly LTD paired with one of two other popular locks from our collection: the Brooklyn Shackle Lock and the Type - VX folding lock.

The Spyder Team silicon phone holder from ULAC is designed to securely strap your phone, GPS, meters and other devices to your bike stems or frames of all sizes. The Spyder Team is easy to install and easy to remove. View our Spyder Team video. Another ULAC pioneering product, the Piccadilly LTD multipurpose cable lock combines functionality and aesthetics. Run the cable through wheels, saddle and frame to securely attach helmets and other accessories. View our Piccadilly LTD video.

 

An iconic fashion statement and original cult classic: the Brooklyn Allux shackle lock from ULAC is now enhanced with easy-to-clean seamless Silicon overmoulding technology. Weighing in at only 355 grams, this one of the lightest shackle locks out there. Lock with style! View our Brooklyn product page and video for product details. Please note: the Brooklyn is not a fingerprint lock. Secure, easy-to-use, and beautifully engineered folding lock embedded with solid steel that is tested with a hydraulic cutter. ULAC's Type - VX limited edition Neo Blade folding lock is solid steel in black and red. View our TYPE - VX product page and video for product details. Please note: the Type - VX is not a fingerprint lock.

 

Who We Are

Since its founding in Taiwan in 1982, ULAC has promoted consumer safety and security through the manufacture of dependable and fashionable bicycle locks and lights. With a sense for aesthetics and security, ULAC continues to strive to develop products which satisfy the needs and taste of the discerning cyclist. ULAC’s own manufacturing facility in Asia and emphasis on high quality production promises products that are reliable and user friendly with a long lifespan.

ULAC is proud of our milestones, from SafeGuard card locks (1980s) and alarm-fitted cable locks (1990s) to our industry first Allux alloy metallurgical technology (2001).

For 30 years, ULAC has been setting trends in bike accessory fashion for with one thing in mind: the discerning urban cyclist. With our Neo Lock collection, ULAC is challenging the idea that "safe" must mean "bulky" and "heavy." Neo Locks by ULAC are lightweight and easy to carry for strength that won't slow you down on the road.

Questions and Answers

Is there a warranty?

The Tron – XD is covered by a standard 6 month limited warranty.

The warranty terms for TRON – XD fingerprint shackle locks received as part of this Indiegogo campaign are as follow:

If you have received a damaged or defective product, please send it back to us along with the warranty card (in the manual).

Signs of wear and tear, such as scratches, received over the course of usage will not be considered as product defects, but as events generated by normal use and therefore not covered by warranty.

This warranty does not cover damage caused by accidents such as collision, crushing, dropping, etc. or by improper use or misuse of the hardware, due to alterations, repairs and handling not authorized by ULAC.

If your product has a defect in materials or production, the product may be returned and replaced for free of charge within six (6) months of your Indiegogo perk claim. ULAC will have right of final determination regarding defective products. Should the model in question be no longer available or is out of production, the customer will be offered the opportunity to choose a model of equal value.

To begin a product exchange, contact ULAC by e-mail at customercare@ulaclock.com and we will send you return shipping instructions.

The conditions of warranty are applicable worldwide.

When is the delivery date for TRON–XD?

The Tron – XD will begin shipping in end of October 2018. 

Please note: All international orders may be subject to additional customs and duty charges to be paid by the receiver.

I’m having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I contact?

Send an email to support@indiegogo.com

I would like a refund. How do I do this?

See https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367 for more information.

Have any other questions?

Feel free to reach out to us by posting a question in the public comments section, or by sending us an email at customercare@ulaclock.com

Secure, easy-to-use, and beautifully engineered folding lock embedded with solid steel that is tested with a hydraulic cutter. ULAC's Type - VX limited edition Neo Blade folding lock is solid steel in black and red. View our TYPE - VX product page and video for product details. Please note: the Type - VX is not a fingerprint lock.

 Who We AreSince its founding in Taiwan in 1982, ULAC has promoted consumer safety and security through the manufacture of dependable and fashionable bicycle locks and lights. With a sense for aesthetics and security, ULAC continues to strive to develop products which satisfy the needs and taste of the discerning cyclist. ULAC’s own manufacturing facility in Asia and emphasis on high quality production promises products that are reliable and user friendly with a long lifespan.ULAC is proud of our milestones, from SafeGuard card locks (1980s) and alarm-fitted cable locks (1990s) to our industry first Allux alloy metallurgical technology (2001).For 30 years, ULAC has been setting trends in bike accessory fashion for with one thing in mind: the discerning urban cyclist. With our Neo Lock collection, ULAC is challenging the idea that "safe" must mean "bulky" and "heavy." Neo Locks by ULAC are lightweight and easy to carry for strength that won't slow you down on the road.Questions and AnswersIs there a warranty?The Tron – XD is covered by a standard 6 month limited warranty.The warranty terms for TRON – XD fingerprint shackle locks received as part of this Indiegogo campaign are as follow:If you have received a damaged or defective product, please send it back to us along with the warranty card (in the manual).Signs of wear and tear, such as scratches, received over the course of usage will not be considered as product defects, but as events generated by normal use and therefore not covered by warranty.This warranty does not cover damage caused by accidents such as collision, crushing, dropping, etc. or by improper use or misuse of the hardware, due to alterations, repairs and handling not authorized by ULAC.If your product has a defect in materials or production, the product may be returned and replaced for free of charge within six (6) months of your Indiegogo perk claim. ULAC will have right of final determination regarding defective products. Should the model in question be no longer available or is out of production, the customer will be offered the opportunity to choose a model of equal value.To begin a product exchange, contact ULAC by e-mail at customercare@ulaclock.com and we will send you return shipping instructions.The conditions of warranty are applicable worldwide.When is the delivery date for TRON–XD?The Tron – XD will begin shipping in end of October 2018. Please note: All international orders may be subject to additional customs and duty charges to be paid by the receiver.I’m having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I contact?Send an email to support@indiegogo.comI would like a refund. How do I do this?See https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367 for more information.Have any other questions?Feel free to reach out to us by posting a question in the public comments section, or by sending us an email at customercare@ulaclock.com

story:
-> Delivered  


www.closca.co

THIS IS CLOSCA FUGA



- DOWNLOAD -

LOOK BOOK & PRESS MATERIAL


Closca Fuga represents the balance between Safety, Functionality and Style, transforming a safety element into a fashion accessory. Closca Design, thus stays committed to offering design and innovation in an ever-growing global market: the bicycle as a mean of transportation in our cities.

This is our 2nd generation of helmets. The creative process has been carried out taking into account the guidelines that urban cyclists themselves have feedback to us day by day, with contributions by means of opinions, preferences and wishes to be implemented in this new product. 




Half space- Just as safe 

"It's not magic, it's engineering"

Closca Fuga is not only a safety certified helmet but also it has a unique & worldwide patented foldable system allowing to become flat and to reduce its volume by more than the 50% for easy storage in any bag while you are not pedalling.
Safety certified and convenient

This very smart helmet comprises 3 mobile rings hinged together with 2 stable positions, foldable only when it is empty and providing the same safety level as any regular helmet does and exceeding the main safety standards worldwide. 
Certifications:
  • CPSC: United States (CPSC 16 CFR Part 1203)
  • EN1078: Europe, Latin America and Asia

More info: Closca Fuga Helmet Safety Standards



Recently featured


Closca: Your prêt-à-porter

                           "Change your outfit - interchangeable helmet dressing"


It is important to look good.  Closca offers an accurate assortment of materials and finishes, detached from usual standards for cyclist equipment and closer to product and fashion trends.  It’s another accessory of your own style.
Closca Fuga is provided with an interchangeable accessories system so you can dress your helmet combining it with your everyday outfit. 





Specs

"Not only a helmet, but a helmet"

- DOWNLOAD -
LOOK BOOK & PRESS MATERIAL



The Story

"Reason loves emotion"


We work to provide design and innovation to the urban cycling community.  

Carlos, Co founder, realized thanks to his wife, the common helmets were not adapted to the way urban cyclist live and understand the cities.

Closca redefines the cyclist helmet, wisely adapting it to the city, focusing on two important handicaps conventional helmets have: 

- Excessive volume, which makes carrying it difficult after pedaling.

- A look that is cut off from the personal style of those who choose bicycle as their transportation alternative and do not want to compromise their style.


To develop this smart and elegant product, Closca teamed up with 2 great partners:

  • The Polytechnic University of Valencia, one of best technologic centres according the Academic Ranking of World Universities (ARWU). And Biomechanics Institute of Valencia. Engineering and lot of talent to resolve the impact absorption, anthropometric   and comfort design.  
  • Culdesac, creative partner for product deconstructing and helping to get a very sexy product.



Bike to work

"We believe in better cities"


We believe in bicycles, not only as the best mean of transportation for cities but also the most beautiful. Our aim is to encourage as many people as possible to adopt a stylish two wheeled approach.


Our contribution:

  • Get Partnership with global brands like Airbus or Telefónica; promoting #biketowork among their employees.
  • Our new App - RideU - for smartphones that is capable of browsing over 240 municipal bicycle rental services in more than 25 countries. With RideU it is possible to check bicycle availability, find empty bicycle bays and know the general status of the service. Furthermore, this new app is compatible with the new Apple Watch and with Google Glass. 
Supporting also the talent of a 17 years genius of Mobile Programming @cecetaca 
Our app is now available for download at Apple Store and Android AppStore.
 


[Goal 3- $80k : Closca new App with NFC Integration] 
  • We Love Technology - Our helmet is the first with integrated NFC chip for bidirectional communication between helmet & smartphone.  Would you like if your helmet could give the instruction to call your emergency number only by approaching your smartphone? Can you imagine taking your public bike using your Closca helmet instead of your citibike card?  

Yes! This is possible today and Closca Design is working on it. 
Is there something else you would like us to include in the New App? Let us know  your suggestions :)

Sustainability: Awarded Eco Value proposal
As consecuence, we have been winners of the Accelerator Climate Kic-European Program, the EU’s main climate innovation initiative, promoting smart cities and CO2 reduction.


Design Process

"Our challenge: Urban Helmet Deconstruction"


Treating cycling as an icon itself, has inspired us to create an honest set, where form and function coexist in a balance, generating the personality of the product. So the helmet is explained intuitively by itself. 

Dieter Rams guidelines inspires today the Product Design in companies like Braun or Apple. These guidelines have influenced very positively in our Design Process, Closca Fuga is innovative, understandable, clean and timeless.
Design and innovation coexist in this useful helmet: the first safety certified and most efficient folding system. 



Favorite Perks

Color Selection with a Survey after campaign is over


We need your support for:

"This is just the beginning" 


Goal 1- $20k : To set up mass production for Closca Fuga 
Goal 2- $50k : Mass production for Aviator and Nordic Extra Accessories


Production Plan

"Closca Fuga is a validated helmet"


First batches of helmets has been produced and double certified (US-CPSC & EU-EN1078) for guarantee impact absorption and delivery time for all supporters.




Closca Team

"The balance between creativity and logic"

Closca Design is formed by a multidisciplinary team composed by creative minds, bicycles enthusiasts, freaks entrepreneurs, crazy engineers and design lovers.



Helmet Measures

 



Helmet Sizing



Only possible with

Partners, Customers, Friends...and you. 
Big Thanks to all

story:
I am traveling since I was 16 (now 26) and I have visited more than 80 countries in my ten years of travel. In 2008 I came to the United States for the first time. I was impressed with the nationalism of the American people and I tried, for the last 3 years of my life to inspire patriotism to my fellow countrymen. I am carrying my national flag everywhere with me, teaching people something about my country, teaching them words and inviting them to explore Romania and inviting them to come visit Dracula's castle and many other interesting places in my country. I even customized a pair of chucks with my country's flag colors. I am happy to see how the people of the United States have their national flag on clothes, shoes, cars and any product you can think at... and how they proudly carry it everywhere, especially in their soul. I tried the same with my country, I customized t-shirts and I tried to copy my model. I do not know if I succeeded but I am truly grateful to be inspired in the first place. And for this, I would like to invite you to participate to my campaign... People in the United States are a community and you guys help each other. I will give you an example - If somebody looks suspicious staying too long next to somebody's car, there will be a person that will call the police. If somebody does something wrong on the street, people will defend the one that did not do anything wrong. Even for a cat that hides under a bench, people will stop and try to help the owner. All these happened to me, one in Texas, Dallas, another in Ocean City, Maryland. It is amazing how Americans would simply stop and ask you if you need help if you just look confused - when in Europe you ask people on the street and they would simply ignore you and walk away, being, I guess, afraid you might do something wrong. I really like your culture, I like that people believe in ideas and they support what they believe in. USA is the country of opportunity and freedom. Just looking at the flag you fall in love. But once you step into the country and experience the culture, you will understand that if all the people would be like you, the wold would be better.

What's my goal? And what do I want with my campaign?

I will purchase an American Flag and will teach you how to travel for free. Sorry, actually, how to travel and get paid. My photos and movies around the world will be posted either on my like page on Facebook or my website. Of course, the American Flag will be present in all the pictures. Questions will be asked to the people of each city I'll be in. I would have asked for 35 dollars, because that is the price of the US Flag. However, Idiegogo's minimum sum is 500. - www.jiti.ro

story:
The Quiver's comfortable frame connects with swappable packs to provide a streamlined, purpose-built pack for every adventure. Whether it's to the office, from the gym to the bar, or on the trail, this is the last carry system you'll ever need.

Swap between packs to save time. No more frantic unpacking and repacking. 

 

Meet the frame to end all pack frames

 

By designing the Quiver around a removable frame, the packs are easy to repair and refurbish. This keeps our backpacks out of the landfill and on the trail.

Every adventure needs a unique pack. OddLot is excited to continue designing new packs that all fit the Thruster Frame, which saves you time, money, and space in your closet. Your Quiver can grow to fit your unique, adventurous lifestyle.

Meet the Packs

 

 

The Sidestep is a daypack designed for the modern hiker. It features zipper-free stretchy side pockets that are great for stowing snacks or a phone . With a water bladder sleeve and trekking pole / ice axe loops, the Sidestep is the ultimate day hiking backpack.

 

The Bandit is ideal for the daily grind, whether commuting by bike or train to the office or gym. The clamshell design makes it easy to organize everything you need for the day. It features a padded laptop sleeve that fits 15" laptops and doesn't interfere with the support of the frame. Interior organizer pockets keep cables and pens tight and easy to access.

 

You don't take a laptop into the woods, nor trekking poles into the office. The Quiver allows you to be purposeful in what you take with you.

Product Features

 

The Quiver is the best backpack system because it eliminates redundancy. No more compromising on features. The technical backpack frame supports your load no matter the adventure.

 YKK #8 waterproof zippers are easy to pull, durable, and keep out water. Our zipper pulls are also fully glove compatible. 

 

 

Swaps in 15 seconds or less!

 

 Unlike complicated modular systems, the Quiver swaps quick and easy without any hassle.

We are excited to offer The Quiver in new color options. If we meet these stretch goals, you have the option of choosing what colorway you want before fullfilment. We are still matching fabrics, so the colors could be slightly different than what is drafted above.

FUTURE QUIVER PACKS

 

The Quiver doesn't stop with the Bandit and Sidestep. Currently, a drybag pack is in development. We can't wait to share the progress with everyone. Every pack we make will fit the same Thruster frame. This saves our existing customers money in the long run because there is no need to buy a frame over and over. 

By designing the Quiver around a single frame, the amount of waste and material redundancy is reduced in the manufacturing processes, lessening our impact on the environment. 

 

SIZING AND FIT

 

We want these packs to fit everyone. The standard frame (pictured) fits most, while the XL frame will fit the taller humans. We recommend the XL frame for 5'11" and up.

Meet the Team

 

The Odd Lot team was formed by three outdoorsy gearheads who were convinced that there had to be a better, more efficient approach to the entire backpack industry. As both outdoor adventurers and urban travelers, the team knew that the current paradigm of buying one-off, unique, disparate and costly packs for each specific adventure was inefficient, frustrating and expensive. From the outset, their mission was to design long-lasting, efficient, affordable serious gear for un-serious people. Their groundbreaking backpack system, The Quiver, has been in the works for over two years.

Sustainability

We recognize that making any product using modern technical materials is inherently bad for the planet.

The most effective way to combat the impact a product has on the environment is by increasing that product’s useful lifespan.

That’s why we make our packs both durable and easier to repair. Our goal in the years to come is to implement a repair and refurbish program that will keep packs on your back, full of memories, and ready to pass on to the next adventurer.

The OddLot Guarantee

It is important for a brand to stand behind it's products. We have built our packs tough, durable, and timeless. In the unlikely event that a product does fail, we will right the situation.

Production Timeline

We've partnered with one of the best backpack manufacturers in the world. Their expertise and dedication to quality has helped Odd Lot bring this crazy idea to life. Our packs are proudly made in the Philippines.


 

We have fifteen GET IT NOW Quiver systems ready to ship as soon as we're funded. These systems are dialed and fully-functional.

 

We're fulfilling!

The Quiver packs have started shipping just in time for your summer adventures!

We got our first shipment of packs in and have already started sending them out. The first wave has already been sent out and we'll be getting the second wave of packs sent out through next week. We plan to have all Indiegogo orders sent no later than June 15th. 

Please take this opportunity to update your shipping address if needed.

We are incredibly stoked for all of you to receive your packs. We know you are going to love them as much as we do. The Indiegogo community has been great to work with bringing these packs to the public. We've worked closely with our factory to ensure this is the best possible pack and your new go to bag for your adventures.

 

Risks and Challenges

The Quiver is already designed and is ready for production. It’s our goal to deliver product in the months specified at each reward level. Get-It-Now Quivers are ready to ship to backers as soon as we’re fully funded. We are aware that sometimes potholes can occur, but we’re confident that we will deliver your gear on time.

We are committed to a transparent, accountable supply chain, and promise to keep you up to date as production moves along. Thank you for your support and for helping us change the way backpacks are made.

story:
Pledge now to lock in our best pricing and to discover how to make travel better and more fun by becoming a one bag traveler.

 

Mr. Davis has completed two successful crowdfunding campaigns (one for our best undershirt and the other for our best underwear) in the past and we are excited to bring our latest project to Indiegogo.

We know how important it is to deliver quickly, so that's exactly what we're going to do here. We have hundreds of great great rewards for early supporters.

 

Maybe you've never heard of one bag travel. 

It's still a quiet but burgeoning movement of people around the world who have discovered that a minimalist approach to both business and personal travel has a lot of advantages over the way most of us travel.

  • It's Faster: No more gate checking. No more searching for a big enough overhead bin spot. With one bag, you move faster and wait around less. 
  • It's Safer: Carrying multiple bags, particularly ones with wheels, marks you as a tourist, making you a target for thieves. When you travel with one bag, you blend in more and keep your stuff with you. 
  • It's Easier: When you're not dragging a bag behind you, your hands are free and it's easier to move through a crowded airport or public transport.
  • It's Less Expensive: Avoid baggage fees when you check and keep your bag with you when you explore. 
  • It's More Fun: Ever have a few extra hours on a trip that you ended up wasting? If you have wheeled luggage, you're stuck going only where it can go. With the Continuum, you can explore and take your stuff with you. 

Travel experts like Rick Steves and Conde Nast (among many many others) believe that one bag traveling is the best way to go.

These sites endorse the flexibility of one bag or carry-on only travel (links above).

Once you try one bag traveling - whether with the Continuum or another option - you'll never want to haul multiple bags again. 

The Continuum can easily handle a three to four night trip. If you're an efficient packer, you can get five to seven nights from a bag that will fit in any overhead bin, even on international and commuter flights. 

 

Frames and wheels have their place, but for most of your trips, they add weight, complexity and cost. They also take up space that could otherwise be used for your stuff. By going with a soft shell, we maximize capacity and minimize weight.

 
 

We found that a lot of the bags that people use for one bag travel weren't particularly friendly to laptops. Some add a padded laptop compartment, but even with a dedicated compartment you still need a way to carry your laptop during the day when you're not hauling everything else.

To address this issue, we built a matching laptop sleeve that actually becomes its own bag.

 

  • Two Sizes: If your reward includes a sleeve, you'll get to choose a 13" or 15" size when you complete your backer survey. As far as sizing goes, the 13" easily fits both MacBooks and MacBook Airs. The 15" sleeve accommodates most 15.6" laptops. The largest laptop we tested was this Dell, which is 15.1" x 10.1" x ~1.2". 
  • In-Sleeve Charging: Our double-zippered ingress opens wide enough that you can charge while your laptop is safe in its case. 
  • TSA Compliant: We comply with TSA specs so you don't have to remove your laptop from the sleeve to x-ray it.
  • Becomes a Bag: Our included d-rings attach to the bag's strap so you have a perfect small bag while you're on the road.
13" sleeve with a little extra room for your stuff.
 
 
 
 
The best way to make travel more fun is to make it easier. To that end we built the Continuum so you could carry it how you like depending on what you are doing. We offer two main carry options plus a third bonus option for getting around in tight spaces. 
 
 
 
Seasoned travelers swear by the backpack. They minimize your silhouette and distribute weight efficiently, so they're fantastic over distance. If your trip is going to require a decent amount of walking, we recommend wearing the Continuum as a backpack. 
 
 
 
 
Whether you just want something to help you to get out and see a new city at the end of a business trip or you're looking to buy a Eurail pass and hang out in Europe for a few months, we have you covered.
 
 
The backpack straps are reinforced, are lightly padded with a breathable mesh and feature an elastic chest stabilizer to help keep the Continuum close to your body.
 
 
When you're not using the bag as a backpack, the straps tuck away into a recessed zipper pocket so they won't tangle.
 
 
 
For shorter trips, you might prefer to wear the Continuum as a shoulder bag - messenger style if you will. Doing so makes the TSA pocket more accessible to help you speed through security and makes your laptop easier to grab.
 
 
 
If you're not going to spend that much time actually carrying your bag, we highly recommend traveling messenger style.  
 
 

Many of the world's best and most interesting destinations require buses or subways to see. 

When you're on public transport, the last thing you want is a big bag knocking into people or rolling over their toes. We've designed the Continuum to go strapless to minimize your footprint in a crowd.

 

 

If you want to carry just one bag, there a couple of key considerations:

Size: You want enough capacity to fit your stuff but not so much that you end up with too much weight, especially with people with smaller frames. After trying both larger and smaller options, we felt that 30 liters offered the best balance for the most trips for the most people. 

Shape: Most soft bags - both backpacks and duffels - are...roundish. This presents a problem because your stuff stays nicer when it's packed flat. We opted for the classic lines of an old Volvo - boxy but good - to maximize usable space while minimizing wrinkles. 

 

The boxy shape pays dividends when you have to store it as well. With a little practice, you'll be amazed at how much you can take with you in something that takes up so little space.

 

 

For a detailed list of all features, see our feature image at the top of the page. Below, we've highlighted some of our favorites. 

 

The shell is made of an innovative PVC Coated 300D Ballistic Nylon. Most premium bags go with a heavier weight, but uncoated nylon. By adding the PVC coating we're able to offer awesome protection (including fray resistance) with a lighter weight fabric. In terms of look and feel, the finer denier (basically thinner fibers) impart a softer hand-feel than you get from heavier denier bags.

As with all our products, we use premium materials throughout so the bag not only holds up but also resists scuffs and marks. It will continue to look good as you use it. 

Warranty: We stand by our product. The Continuum is guaranteed to be free from defects in materials and workmanship under normal use for 5 years from the date of receipt. If a defect appears during the warranty period, we will repair or replace your product.

 

To get through security as quickly as possible, it helps to have a place you can easily stuff your phone, passport, watch and wallet. 

We created a special fleece-lined pocket for stashing your valuables as your bag gets x-rayed. Every time we use this little pocket, we're thankful we're not digging around for our stuff in the main compartment or leaving it in the bin.

The stash pocket incorporates a cable port to connect to the main compartment so you can charge your phone while it's tucked safely away by connecting to our included USB charger pocket.

 

Several successful bags on crowdfunding sites have featured some sort of built in charging apparatus. We respect the ambition here, but the problem with this is that the second you add electronics to soft goods, you dramatically increase the regulatory cost of production to get various international certifications (read: you get long delivery times).

We liked the idea of integrated charging, but we suspected that most of our prospective backers already had one or more USB chargers lying around. So we just made a pocket that will support most 3rd party chargers to charge less for the bag and get it to you more quickly. 

The lining of the Continuum is made of ripstop nylon and features recessed zippers on all interior pockets. The USB charger pocket has a velcro strap to hold your charger in place while leaving your USB port(s) accessible.

 

The Continuum's shoulder strap is wide and well padded so it's easy to carry and comfortable to wear.  

When you're not using the strap for the main bag, you can use it to convert the optional laptop sleeve into its own minimalist satellite bag.

The sleeve offers just enough room for a day of meetings or a session at coffee shop. When you are traveling, you'll finally be able to leave your main laptop bag at home. 

 

Shoes are the bane of any efficient packer's existence, especially if you want to work out while you're on a trip that requires more than a pair of trainers. The Continuum features two large shoe pockets - one on each end - so you can keep your footwear, workout gear or dirty laundry separated from the rest of your stuff.  Pockets are big enough for dress boots as shown below.

We stopped short of calling it a bag built for runners, but we never travel without a pair of running shoes and in our experience, it makes running while on the road a lot easier. 

 

One of the most useful features of the Continuum is what it does when you are not using it. Because of its soft shell and its boxy shape, it will actually hang up in a spot in your closet. If you'd prefer to compress it into a drawer or another bag that's fine too, but we like hanging it. 

 

Get you space back. If you live in a big city, then you know how precious space is. By replacing wheeled luggage, the Continuum will help you reclaim a little room until you need to use it. 

 

When it rains, you want your stuff to stay dry. The Continuum isn't waterproof, but we wanted to help you be prepared for inclement weather, so we included a rain cover.

Some manufacturers charge up to $40 for rain covers, but we wanted to include one with every bag, because you never realize how much you need one until after you need it. 

It's not the same as a dry bag, but you'll be glad you have it. Packs down into about 3"x6".

We have two abiding travel fears: leaving our car keys back at the hotel room and having a delicious cold beer trapped in its own bottle. We decided to address them both by adding a bottle opener to our key keeper. 

The bottle opener is just a simple aluminum number, but if you have ever googled how to open a bottle without a bottle opener, then this bud's for you.

We really appreciate the time you've spent learning about this project. Mr. Davis wouldn't exist as a company without the support and feedback we've gotten from the crowdfuning community. 

If you ever have any issues with your reward or any other product you buy from www.mrdavis.com you can reach us at support@mrdavis.com and we'll make it right. 

Thanks for your support and please share this project with your friends and family.

- The Mr. Davis Team

story:
Save the Ride Repeat Tour Earlier this season, Restless Longboards, Paris Trucks, Rollin boardshop, Concrete Wave and the Push Culture cup came together and purchased an RV in order to create The Ride Repeat Tour.  The goal was simple, give riders transportation and lodging to multiple events, help promote the growth of the sport and offer a safe environment for the practice DH longboarding. On site, it provided the crowd with entertainment, offered product visibility for our sponsors and shelter for riders. In the early morning hours of Monday August 11th, while coming back from the Downhill Throwdown, one of the Push Culture Cup stops, something terrible happen. Scaling the hills of Vermont proved to be too much for the RV. A hole the size of a fist was punched through the engine block and left our RV out of commission on the side of the road. We are soliciting our followers to help us out and get the beast roaring and back on the road. In exchange, we are offering some very interesting products and services to fund the project and get a new engine installed into the RV.

http://youtu.be/WqiYMPWfbj8

story:
OUR CAMPAIGN IS OVER, BUT YOU CAN STILL GET OUR PRODUCTS ON OUR WEBSITE http://mylittlefactory.co/ 

X'TREMFISHROD™ is a complete, ready to use, compact survival fishing rod. 

Since march 2016, we are ready to prepare and ship your order everywhere in the world using tracking airmail.

Here, a resume of the final steps after production step and during the preparation for shipment.

 

 

X'TREMFISHROD™ - Quality Control Process

Quality Control Process : Important stage of the production before assembly your X'TREMFISHROD to prepare each parcel as requested according to the version and color chosen.

 

X'TREMFISHROD™ -  ready to be shipped.

Preparation for shipment : After check the product matches to your order, the box is closed to be wrapped with opaque plastic and dispatched to our postal carrier. 

Each parcel is sent with a tracking id.  Once the parcel is handled by your national postal service, you may track it on your local postal service (available for some countries).

 

X'TREMFISHROD™ story

The origin

This is the culmination of an idea came during a trekking in rainforest in Thailand where we have walked along a river without being able to fish in case of necessity or just enjoy fishing moments with friends. Once back home, we decided to design a fishing rod who can be easily carried in a pocket, a backpack or others similar items including the necessary to fish in fresh and salt water.

 

 

 

Trekking in Atlas Mountains, North Africa, 2015

 

Design

During the development phase, the product should meet the requirements in our technical specifications as robust, compact, lightweight, ready to fish and affordable. 

The most important point to be develop in the design phase was to preserve the rod to gather all the technical components while allowing the possibility to use X'TREMFISHROD™ as a survivor with just the reel, the hook and line. 

Now, you need one second to decide your fishing mode thanks to the one second click to take off the rod.

One rod, two modes... Let you drive by your instinct.

 

The distinctive design encloses all functions needed during fishing with the reel and its self-locking ring, the bobber, the lead-free sinker (selected to preserve the nature against toxic lead), the hook with its safe cap to protect you from injuries and a removable rod in fiber glass to make it strong and lightweight, to allow you to keep it smaller than you need.

 

 

Surely, the world's smallest fishing rod!

 

 

CAP'N HOOK™ - Safe Cap to secure hook

 

 

 

 

 

Sample of bobbers  - Adjustable along the line

 

Testing

Once the final prototype has been finished, we could begin the test phase. 

X'TREMFISHROD™ was tested in real conditions using the 2 different modes. Sometimes in harsh environments with basic baits as a worm to simulate survival conditions, other times, with artificial lures or sweet corn.

The tests have been realized in different places and environments as on riverbed in Africa and Asia, in natural and artificial lakes and rivers in France and aboard ship on sea. 

Some of us tested the street-fishing to enjoy the quality to get a complete and compact rod. 

 

 

 

The lightest weight on the market with only 20g in survival mode and the smallest complete fishing rod with an overall length of 270mm in tactical mode.

Built with its own accessory line.

Its small size makes a perfect buddy for an amazing improvised survival tool.

Developed, tested and made from high quality components selected in Provence, France.
 

 

Summer fishing - Vaucluse, France

 

Technical Specifications

  • High-carbon steel hook with "Palomar knot"
  • Adjustable bobber 
  • Removable lead sinker
  • Safe CAP’N HOOK™
  • 10 meters 4 strands braided fishing line (light/low water absorption, breaking strain : 14kg) 
  • 200 mm fiber glass rod fitted on handle 
  • Overall length in Tactical mode : 270mm
  • Fishing reel mounted with a self-locking ring 
  • Exclusive colors

 

 

X'TREMFISHROD™ - "X'clusive" colors!
 

X’TREMFISHROD™ Ready To Fish - Mojave Sand Color
 

 

Why get X'TREMFISHROD™?

  • Spend a good fishing time with friends and family. 
  • Pop it in your bag for trekking, camping or street fishing to follow you in all situations for fishing in fresh and salt water. Anywhere, anytime. 
  • Perfect for a gift.
  • Suitable for educational experience. 
  • Fishing from a boat, riverside or on ice. 
  • Complete your survival equipment.

 

About perks

 

 

 

 

TIMELINE

 

 

 

Why we launch Indiegogo campaign?

We have ourselves supported the development phase, from the design to the final tests.

The manufacturing settings are ready.

Together, we''ll build a community around X'TREMFISHROD™.

 

 

 

Click here to access to the press materials as release and pictures samples, or email us : hello@mylittlefactory.co

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

 

Our past experience in each step of the manufacturing process is an advantage to succeed. The manufacture and the control procedure is made in France to keep a close eye on the delivery deadline.

X'TREMFISHROD™ is not just an idea or a prototype in testing phase. We spent a lot of time to achieve this product working with trust supplier.

If you are regarding this message that means you have carefully read above and we would like to thank you for taking the time to review and contribute for this project.
We are committed to keep you informed of our progress both during and following the campaign.
