About perks


 
  


 

TIMELINE
 
 
 Why we launch Indiegogo campaign?
We have ourselves supported the development phase, from the design to the final tests.
The manufacturing settings are ready.
Together, we''ll build a community around X'TREMFISHROD™.


 
 
 

Click here to access to the press materials as release and pictures samples, or email us : hello@mylittlefactory.co 
 
  
  
  
  
 Risks and challenges
  
 Our past experience in each step of the manufacturing process is an advantage to succeed. The manufacture and the control procedure is made in France to keep a close eye on the delivery deadline.
 X'TREMFISHROD™ is not just an idea or a prototype in testing phase. We spent a lot of time to achieve this product working with trust supplier.
 If you are regarding this message that means you have carefully read above and we would like to thank you for taking the time to review and contribute for this project.We are committed to keep you informed of our progress both during and following the campaign.

story:
SEPT 2016 UPDATE - All-silver colored Lumbos are completely sold out for the 2016 season! However, you can still get a pair of your own Lumbos, as we have very limited numbers of black, blue, green, purple, or orange-colored Lumbos available to ship beginning Nov 2016. Please order via the perks on the right side of this page.

 

There haven’t been any major changes to snowboarding in over 40 years. It's high time for an evolution.

Lumbos™ Technology is a new type of snowboarding accessory that mounts between your board and your bindings, allowing one's feet to rotate bi-directionally for a more free and comfortable experience. This allows the rider to snowboard better, easier, safer, and funner than ever before!

BENEFITS:

  • Lumbos™ moves freely and is immediately responsive, allowing one to turn each foot independently at will on your snowboard, while remaining securely attached.
  • Lumbos™ allows you to shift positions/stances at any given moment while standing or riding. Experience any combination of rides in every single run down the slopes.
  • Lumbos™ allows quicker, tighter turns, increasing maneuverability and control of the snowboard; not to mention a plethora of more tricks.
  • Lumbos™ reduces leg fatigue commonly associated with snowboarding. When it’s time for a break, a rider can take a seat in the snow and choose to angle their foot and board in any direction that they want, so that they can relax, free from any excessive torquing of the knees and spine.
  • No more twisting and bending your knees in awkward positions while sitting on the lift or waiting in lift lines.  Navigate flat terrain like a skateboarder, even up-hill.
  • Lumbos™ are designed to be compatible with virtually any brand or model snowboard or bindings, and will not damage them in any way.
  • Lumbos™ installs quickly and easily in just a few simple steps with a Philips screwdriver.
  • Lumbos™ are built to last a lifetime, constructed out of durable and corrosion-resistant stainless steel.
  • One size fits all; meaning, a person can use the same pair as a junior rider and then keep on using them well into adulthood.
  • With the revolutionary advent of Lumbos™ universal snowboarding accessory, it provides riders a pre-emptive pivot response to lengthen response time and reduce or cushion injurious forces. And give them a chance to save themselves in case of loss of balance.
  •  Lumbos™ allows users to better control, find, and use various positional options in navigating terrain and in case of falls. It is postulated that Lumbos™ would allow a rider a chance to relocate forces and regain control. Making the experience more like skateboarding and surfing.
  • Lumbos™ has made it easier for beginners and experts to raise themselves from a kneeling, squatting, and sitting position. 
  • Lumbos™ all but eliminates fatigue associated with standing, skating, riding chair lifts and tow ropes. Allowing riders to comfortably navigate lift lines, congested areas, and flat terrain.
  •  Lumbos™ may reduce injuries common to snowboarders or lessen their effects. While there have been no studies conducted on the forces and pressures exerted on the body when snowboarding or at injury. 
  • Lumbos™ postulates that some of these may be reduced based on the ability of the rider to move from a fixed stance on the fly and only when initiated by the rider themselves. Empirical data gathered on the slopes reveals that the mechanism can not rotate without the volition of the rider. When both feet are planted on the board and gravitational forces are in play spontaneous movement is not observed.

 

SAFETY

Stability and Reliability - People's number one concern when they hear about Lumbos™ is that their feet will move out from underneath them, but nothing could be further from the truth. It seems counter-intuitive, but by having two feet that can turn independently, a rider is able to move more naturally and feels one with their board. When riders exert a load bearing force on one foot, the un-weighted foot is free to follow through and translate a rider’s intentions into more fluid swishing or swaying motions on slopes. Meanwhile, the weighted foot finds the most stable attack angle, keeping the other foot in check.

Fluidity of Motion - With Lumbos™, riders can make quicker, smaller, and tighter turn radiuses. As one’s load bearing force is focused on the lead foot; the snowboard itself is able turn simultaneously under the un-weighted rear foot, much like surfing and skateboarding. This makes snowboarding a whole new experience, and much more fun!

Board Flex - Approximately the same thickness as a pencil, Lumbos™ has minimal impact on flex or torsion. The turning turret is slightly raised above the board’s surface, not only to prevent marring, but to reduce impacting torsional flexibility.

Ease of Learning - Because new boarders can try out any number of stances as they are learning, Lumbos™ makes learning to ride significantly easier for kids and adults of all ages.

The Fun Stuff - Now, you can have unparalleled maneuverability and control of your snowboard, providing you with the ability to make split-second adjustments/decisions. Simply shifting your weight around and changing foot angles accordingly, you will be able to use any combination of positions/stances in a single run. Rethink all of the assumptions that you have made about how you perform tricks on your board—this is more like surfing or skateboarding, yet unprecedented. Maybe even with the potential to perform a snowboard 360˚ "shove-it" like Jeremy Jones!  [Disclaimer: Jeremy Jones is not riding on Lumbos™ in this video or affiliated with Lumbos™ in any way.]

The Comfort - Never again will you need to face the dreaded snowboarder’s shuffle in the lift line, twisting your body uncomfortably and putting strain on the knees. By disconnecting one boot or the other from the binding, you can scoot along (so to speak), making it especially useful on flat terrain, or when going up hill for that matter. Imagine finally sitting in a chairlift comfortably without twisting of your body or legs. Lumbos™ allows you to let your legs dangle down freely and in a natural position. And when it’s time for a break, you can take a seat in the snow and choose to angle your foot and board in any direction that you want, so that you can relax, free from any excessive torquing of your knee.

  • Lumbos™ will last a lifetime - Each pair is constructed from durable and corrosion-resistant stainless steel with an ultra low-friction coating.
  • Lumbos™ will never gum up, stick, or catch fire.
  • Lumbos™ are lightweight - Each unit weighs approx 1.5 lbs, making them approx 3 lbs for the pair (and working on making them even lighter.
  • Lumbos™ is/are easy to install - We timed several testers (adult and children) installing Lumbos™ on various snowboards and bindings. The average speed was approx 8-10 minutes. All you need to install it is a simple Philips screwdriver.
  • Lumbos™ won't damage or permanently alter your board in any way.
  • Lumbos™ has a very low profile - (approx. 3/8 inch) In fact, it has about the same width as a pencil!

 

Are you ready to try Lumbos™ and have fun?

 

Great! Pick a Reward on the right and a Demo Day below; and share this with your friends!

 

 

2015-2016 Demo Day Calendar:

  • Squaw Valley, Calif. - Dec 12-13, 2015
  • Kirkwood/Northstar, Calif - Dec 19-20, 2015
  • Tahoe, Calif. (TBD) - Jan 23-24, 2016
  • Park City/Canyons, Utah - Jan 30-31, 2016
  • Tahoe, Calif. (TBD) - Feb 6-7, 2016
  • Tahoe, Calif. (TBD) - Feb 13-14, 2016
  • Tahoe, Calif. (TBD) - Feb 20-21, 2016
  • Colorado (TBD) - Feb 27-28, 2016
  • Tahoe, Calif. (TBD) - Mar 5-6, 2016
  • Tahoe, Calif. (TBD) - Mar 12-13, 2016
  • Mt. Bachelor, Oregon - Mar 19-22, 2016
  • Tahoe, Calif. (TBD) - Mar 26-27, 2016

 

Reserve your Demo Day spot now: http://lumbos.reservio.com

Current and future backers of any reward level will receive priority on Demo Day time slots. Backers: please select your date and time slot as soon as possible before they fill up (we will try to accommodate late requests for certain spots). Priority deadline for backers is Dec 22.

Dates and locations subject to change. Backers may swap demo dates or locations upon approval by Lumbos™ staff.

story:
Hi all, thanks for visiting our page! The Stanpede Ralliers are a team of 2 Aussies, 1 Brit and 1 Kiwi attempting to complete the Mongol Rally, a 10,000 mile journey to Mongolia. This entails crossing 3 deserts, 5 mountain ranges and 20 countries all in a little 1.2L car.   

                                                                                                                                  For some people, this may sound like an amazing adventure, but this is not a feat to be undertaken lightly. There are some serious risks and dangers involved, including possible robberies, numerous amounts of bribes, multiple car break downs, risk of crashes and getting lost (hopefully to only be found again) and one team has even died trying to complete the rally in the past!


This is where you come in. One of the pros of this rally, is that in doing so, we are helping to raise money and awareness for our chosen charities. As a team, we are hoping to raise as much money as possible to donate towards our chosen charities: 


RP Fighting Blindness 
and 
Cool Earth.


Why donate to these charities you may ask? The question is more: why not?       

Every donation big or small can help these charities grow and you can be rest assured that the money will be directly given to those in need. All of the money we raise will go directly to our chosen charities who will put the money towards providing support to those who need it.


RP Fighting Blindness is a charity raising money for people suffering from retinitis pigmentosa (RP), which is a disease of the eye that leads to loss of vision and blindness. Often the first symptoms of RP are night blindness and loss of peripheral vision (tunnel vision) and in many cases leading to total blindness.
Affecting around 25,000 people in the UK and around two million worldwide RP is now recognised as one of the most common causes of loss of vision in people of working age. However RP can arise and be diagnosed at any age but most often it is seen in teenagers and occasionally younger children and babies. RP Fighting Blindness works hard to stimulate and fund cutting edge research to find a treatment or cure and support those affected.

Cool Earth is the charity that works alongside indigenous villages to halt rainforest destruction. Each minute, nearly 150 acres of rainforest are destroyed, releasing nearly 40,000 tonnes of CO2 into the environment – the equivalent of 4,800 laps around the planet. The Cool Earth Foundation aims to halt this process. Each of the projects ‘begin from a villages decision to save their forest.’ 

Not only does donating to this cause help save entire communities’ livelihood, rainforests are massive manufacturers of O2, freshwater and are home to the majority of the planet’s biodiversity- something that affects everybody on the planet!!


Remember any donation, big or small, helps make a difference to someones life in the world! If we do end up going above and beyond our fundraising goal (and I'm talking a lot), we hope to put a couple of hundred dollars towards helping support us actually making it on this crazy adventure- in the form of fuel, fuel and more fuel. (Exact figures will be updated to the site)

Now don't forget to spread the word, were trying to get everyone involved to help raise some awareness and funds for our charities!

story:
Surprise! I am officially moving to Europe! 

I am beyond excited to share this journey with you.  As some of you might know already, traveling is one of my most favorite things in life. Experiencing different cultures, meeting new people from different walks of life, and getting to be a part of something new is incredible. It has always been my dream to LIVE abroad and it is time for me to make that happen. 

To add to the surprise, I will be in a new location every month and you won't find out where I am until I'm there!

Funds raised will go towards:

- Transportation Expenses (Airfare, train tickets, bus passes, taxi fares)

- Accommodation Expenses

- Storage Costs

- Shipping Camera Equipment

IF WE REACH THE GOAL, each contributor (above $25) will receive an EXCLUSIVE naughty video made in Europe!

ANY DONATIONS ARE APPRECIATED and would be the perfect Christmas present! You will be helping my dreams come true :)

story:
Big enough for all your adventures  | Small enough to fit in your pocket

 

 

 

 

 

In the summer of 2016, we set out on a 4-day hike into the Garabaldi's. With over 7,600ft of elevation, our gear had to be light, compact, durable and built with maximum utility to not weigh us down - we managed to get our packs down to 60lbs. The one thing that was missing was a backpack that we could take with us on our day trips out from basecamp. A backpack that would be large enough to carry our day trip gear, light enough to not weigh us down on the way up, yet durable enough to survive our rugged journey. 

The Sea to Sky pack was born out of necessity. We designed the pack to be large enough to fit everything we needed, yet small and light enough to conserve space and weight. After going through dozens of prototypes and iterations, we finally created a bag we were happy to call our own.

        ---- Lightweight | Waterproof | Compact | Durable | Functional | Beautiful ----

The Sea to Sky Pack is made for all you world travelers and adventure seekers. Designed with durability, functionality, packability and style in mind, this compact and ultra-lightweight 24L pack will come in handy on your next adventure. 

 

 

Built with purpose. The Sea to Sky pack is lightweight, functional, and is jam-packed with essential features that make this the perfect addition to all your adventures.

Pack and Unpack In Seconds: Made with lightweight and durable CORDURA® material that easily and packs and unpacks in seconds.

Submersible 24L storage compartment built for the Pacific Northwest.

 

Made with 100% Waterproof Material: The main 24L compartment is completely waterproof and doubles as a dry sack.

Easily access your essentials on the go with the front pocket. This pocket is sealed with a water resistant zipper.

Water resistant 3M reflective zipper: Be seen at night, whenever you're on the go. 

Made for rugged adventures: Sand-proof, dust-proof, dirt-proof, simply wipe it down for easy cleaning.

Easily adjust the sternum strap for comfort when on the go. Sea to Sky Packs are made with a padded lightweight strap for comfort and durability.

Cordura® material meant for the great outdoors. Built with Cordura from top to bottom. This durable material is meant for rugged terrains.

ITW buckle and a 95dB whistle: Made with high-quality buckles and a 95dB whistle for emergencies.

Multifunctional side pockets are large enough to hold your water bottle or other accessories without you worrying about them falling out.

 

Adjustable stability straps for maximum fit and comfort. 

Roll top closure system ensures the main compartment stays 100% dry - doubling as a dry sack.

Day to Day - Designed for everyone. Take the Sea to Sky pack with you wherever you go. 

 

  

 

 

Built for the Pacific Northwest. Take the Sea to Sky Pack with you from the coasts of the Pacific Ocean to the tops of the Rocky Mountains.

 

 

 

 

                  Where will your next adventure take you?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Help us by sharing The Sea to Sky Pack with your friends! 

Know someone who would love the Sea to Sky Pack? Help us spread the word by sharing on your social media accounts! Sharing is caring <3
